title: Dual-disturbance-based privacy protection method for federated learning counterreasoning attack
abstract: The invention discloses a dual-disturbance-based privacy protection method for federal learning countermeasure reasoning attack, which comprises the steps of generating a countermeasure network setting classification feature extractor, and generating setting and training of the countermeasure network for conditions; generating and generating pseudo data by using a trained condition, and mixing the real data and the pseudo data according to a certain proportion to construct pseudo training data participating in the federal learning training; randomly initializing global model parameters through a central server, sending the global model parameters of the current communication turn to clients participating in training through a communication link, and training local models on private data sets by the clients; designing an objective function to construct a disturbance matrix to disturb the gradient of the full-connection layer in the model training process; then updating the model parameters; and updating all models from the client, and aggregating through the central server according to the weight of the sample size to obtain the global model parameters of the next round. Safety is guaranteed and the performance of the model is hardly reduced.

title: Privacy interface for data loss prevention via artificial intelligence models
abstract: The technology disclosed provides systems and methods related to preventing exfiltration of training data by feature reconstruction attacks on model instances trained on the training data during a training job. The system comprises a privacy interface that presents a plurality of modulators for a plurality of training parameters. The modulators are configured to respond to selection commands via the privacy interface to trigger procedural calls. The procedural calls modify corresponding training parameters in the plurality of training parameters for respective training cycles in the training job. The system comprises a trainer configured to execute the training cycles in dependence on the modified training parameters. The trainer can determine a performance accuracy of the model instances for each of the executed training cycles. The system comprises a differential privacy estimator configured to estimate a privacy guarantee for each of the executed training cycles in dependence on the modified training parameters.

title: PSI (program specific information) technology-based method for protecting privacy of federal learning prediction stage
abstract: A method for protecting privacy of a federal learning prediction stage based on a PSI technology comprises the following steps: firstly, a prediction service party calculates a prediction result of a model of the prediction service party, then the two parties execute an improved PSI protocol, and the prediction demand party decrypts a calculation result of a data provider by encrypting a part of model calculation results of the prediction service party in combination with self data to finally obtain a prediction result of a keyword id shared by the two parties. The method utilizes the PSI technology to encrypt data through the key derivation function, meets the privacy protection requirement in the federal learning prediction stage, gets through the last link of the federal learning privacy safety protection, and promotes the federal learning more application scenes to fall to the ground.

title: WiFi fusion indoor positioning method based on federated learning
abstract: The invention provides a WiFi fusion indoor positioning method based on federal learning, and relates to the technical field of indoor positioning. The WiFi fusion indoor positioning method based on federal learning comprises the following steps of 1) acquiring CSI and RSS data through WiFi equipment to obtain signal characteristic information, 2) cleaning the acquired CSI and RSS data to remove noise and abnormal values, and deep learning CS I and RSS signal characteristics by using GAT to extract richer and deeper space and environment information. According to the invention, by combining the CSI and the RSS fingerprint information, the signal characteristics are deeply learned by using the graph attention network, the richer and deeper space and environment information is extracted, the stability of the fingerprint information is improved, and the positioning accuracy is improved.

title: Multi-mode federal learning privacy protection method and system
abstract: The invention relates to a privacy protection method and a privacy protection system for multi-mode federal learning, which comprises the following steps: for the client only containing image data, adopting a countermeasure network algorithm based on differential privacy generation to process the image data to obtain the image characteristics of the image dataF v And uploading to a server; for a client only containing text data, processing the text data by adopting a sensitive word replacement algorithm based on localized differential privacy to obtain text characteristicsF t And uploading to a server; for simultaneous inclusion of image numbersAccording to the client side of the text data, aligning the image data and the text data through a first automatic encoder and a second automatic encoder respectively, and generating image characteristics to the middle layers of the first automatic encoder and the second automatic encoderF' v Text featureF' t Respectively adding epsilon-Laplace noise of differential privacy protection; image characteristics after adding noiseF' v Text featureF' t And uploading to a server.

title: Longitudinal federal learning privacy protection method and system based on deep hash
abstract: The application discloses a longitudinal federal learning privacy protection method and system based on deep hashing, and belongs to the technical field of distributed machine learning security. Obtaining abstract representation of samples through local models of all the partners, obtaining zero-mean continuous codes through a normalization layer, and obtaining hash codes after binarizing the continuous codes through a hash layer; uploading hash codes to a server side by each participant, aggregating the hash codes of each participant by the server side, calculating a predicted value through a top layer model, calculating a classification loss according to the predicted value and a label, calculating cosine similarity loss among the hash codes of each participant by using a pre-generated binary code, calculating gradients through the loss, updating the top layer model, distributing the gradients to each partner, and keeping the gradients unchanged when the local hash layer propagates. The application utilizes the deep hash technology, can not only not lose the performance of the model, but also greatly improve the calculation efficiency without the risk of reverse reconstruction of the model by an attacker on the premise of ensuring the safety of user data.

title: User data privacy protection system and method for Byzantine robust federated learning
abstract: The invention provides a user data privacy protection system and method for Bayesian robust federal learning, wherein each server utilizes an RPCA method improved by SecQR protocol and SecEigen protocol to perform safe dimension reduction processing on encrypted update local parameters to obtain dimension reduction results, and utilizes a clustering algorithm to cluster the dimension reduction results to obtain a clustering result so as to cooperatively update a global model. The invention emphasizes protecting the privacy of the client, applies SecQR protocol and SecEigen protocol to the encryption data processing, ensures the safety of sensitive information of the client and has good robustness to cope with potential threats, even if the malicious client adopts various Bayesian attacks, malicious model parameters can be removed as much as possible before model aggregation, and the robustness of the global model is ensured. The invention also has the efficient malicious client detection and local model aggregation capability on the premise of ensuring the robustness and the safety of the system.

title: Data protection method for federal learning intrusion detection based on GAN
abstract: The invention belongs to the technical field of intrusion detection, and particularly relates to a data protection method for GAN-based federal learning intrusion detection. The invention combines the loose differential privacy protection technology with the confrontation generation neural network, reduces the communication loss of each terminal in the federal learning framework, improves the learning efficiency, can well solve the condition of lower calculation force of each terminal in the federal, and improves the utilization efficiency of the machine. The dynamic fuzzy data generated by the anti-generation neural network used by the invention can expand the local training data set while the attacker can not judge the successful attack condition, thereby solving the possible problem of small samples. The invention can effectively reduce the communication loss in the federal learning framework, can effectively improve the training efficiency, simultaneously solves the problems of susceptibility to reasoning attack and small sample data and non-independent and same distributed data of the intrusion detection terminal in the federate learning, and can realize the federate learning intrusion detection for resisting the reasoning attack.

title: Method, apparatus, and device for optimization of vertically federated learning system, and a readable storage medium
abstract: A method, an apparatus, and a device for optimization of a vertically federated learning system, and a readable storage medium, the method comprising: a first device performs sample alignment with a second device to obtain first sample data of the first device, a data feature of the first sample data being different from that of second sample data, the second sample data being obtained from the second device performing sample alignment with the first device (S10); and the first sample data is used in coordination with the second device for training to obtain an interpolation model, the interpolation model being used to input data under the corresponding data feature of the first device, and output prediction data under the corresponding data feature of the second device (S20).

title: Block chain-based federated learning privacy protection method, system, device and medium
abstract: The invention provides a block chain-based federal learning privacy protection method, a system, equipment and a medium, wherein a main public/private key, a decryption key and an encryption key of each node are generated by a trusted third party according to a weight vector of each node, the main public key, the decryption key and the encryption key are sent to each node, each node downloads an initial model for training after an initial block is created by a main node and written in an initial model for issuing, each node uploads the initial model to a block chain after obtaining an encryption model by encryption of the encryption key, each node competes for generating the power of a model aggregation block after all the encryption models of each node are uploaded to the block chain, the node obtaining the power aggregates the encryption models of each node to generate a global model according to the main public key and the decryption key, uploads the global model to the block chain, and then the main node downloads the global model and performs ideal model judgment, the protection of node sources and model content privacy is increased, the service calculation cost is reduced, and the learning efficiency and the service quality are improved.

title: Federal learning privacy protection system and method based on hierarchical aggregation and blockchain
abstract: The invention provides a federal learning privacy protection system and method based on hierarchical aggregation and blockchain, wherein the system comprises a trusted mechanism, a blockchain, a federal learning module and IPFS distributed storage systems; the block chain is used for recording various data generated by the federation learning module and model addresses corresponding to training models of various versions of previous iteration in the training process; the federal learning module is used for realizing federal learning training; the user terminal acquires a current global model as a local model, and trains the local model on a local data set to acquire a new round of local model; the IPFS distributed storage system is used to store local model parameters and global model parameters. The system based on the invention solves the technical problems of low efficiency of the federal learning privacy protection mechanism, reduced model accuracy and high storage cost in the prior art, and can improve federal learning efficiency and global model accuracy.

title: Trusted and decentralized aggregation for federated learning
abstract: Techniques for distributed federated learning leverage a multi-layered defense strategy to provide for reduced information leakage. In lieu of aggregating model updates centrally, an aggregation function is decentralized into multiple independent and functionally-equivalent execution entities, each running within its own trusted executed environment (TEE). The TEEs enable confidential and remote-attestable federated aggregation. Preferably, each aggregator entity runs within an encrypted virtual machine that support runtime in-memory encryption. Each party remotely authenticates the TEE before participating in the training. By using multiple decentralized aggregators, parties are enabled to partition their respective model updates at model-parameter granularity, and can map single weights to a specific aggregator entity. Parties also can dynamically shuffle fragmentary model updates at each training iteration to further obfuscate the information dispatched to each aggregator execution entity. This architectural prevents the aggregator from being a single point-of-failure, and serves to protect the model even if all aggregators are compromised.

title: Federal learning method based on dynamic adjustment of model aggregation weight
abstract: The invention discloses a federal learning method based on dynamic adjustment of model aggregation weights, which comprises the following steps: the cloud server receives the local training model and the data quality index from each client, calculates contribution scores for each client according to the contribution of the data quality, the model precision and the model difference index to the model training precision if the client weight updating condition is met, and generates a global model by weighted average; and the cloud server transmits the updated global model to the client, each client receives the model training on the local training data, and uploads the local model and the data quality index to the cloud server again after the training is finished. The invention reasonably uses the client training data such as data distribution, model precision, model difference and the like, generates dynamic aggregation weight, fully digs available characteristics in the client training process, and forms a global model with higher quality, thereby improving model precision and convergence efficiency.

title: Federated learning privacy data processing method and system, device, and storage medium
abstract: A federated learning privacy data processing method and system, a device and a storage medium. The method comprises: receiving model parameter updates having masks sent by participating devices, wherein each participating device adds, on the basis of a first mask generated thereby, a mask to the model parameter update obtained by means of training thereof, so as to obtain a model parameter update thereof having a mask (S10); in a TEE module, generating second masks identical with the first masks, and performing mask removal on the model parameter updates having the masks on the basis of the second masks, so as to obtain the model parameter updates (S20); in the TEE module, combining the model parameter updates to obtain a global model parameter update, and using a generated third mask to add a mask to the global model parameter update to obtain a global model parameter update having a mask (S30); and sending the global model parameter update having a mask to the participating devices, so that each participating device performs mask removal on the global model parameter update having a mask on the basis of a fourth mask which is generated by each participating device and is identical with the third mask, so as to obtain the global model parameter update (S40). The method realizes a security mechanism, so that information of a participating device will not be leaked to a coordination device, without causing a significant increase in communication bandwidth requirements.

title: Longitudinal federal learning system optimization method, device, equipment and readable storage medium
abstract: The invention discloses a method, a device, equipment and a readable storage medium for optimizing a longitudinal federal learning system, wherein the method comprises the following steps: obtaining a sample alignment result obtained by performing sample alignment between local training sample sets of each participating device, wherein the data characteristics of samples owned by each participating device are not identical; obtaining multiple groups of input data with different data dimensions by cooperation with each participating device according to the sample alignment result; training a machine learning model to be trained with variable preset input data feature dimensions according to multiple groups of input data to obtain a target machine learning model. The invention realizes that the model can be independently used by the participants of the longitudinal federal learning under the condition of no coordination of other participants when the model trained by the longitudinal federal learning is used, thereby expanding the application range of the longitudinal federal learning.

title: Private and federated learning
abstract: Techniques regarding privacy preservation in a federated learning environment are provided. For example, one or more embodiments described herein can comprise a system, which can comprise a memory that can store computer executable components. The system can also comprise a processor, operably coupled to the memory, and that can execute the computer executable components stored in the memory. The computer executable components can comprise a plurality of machine learning components that can execute a machine learning algorithm to generate a plurality of model parameters. The computer executable components can also comprise an aggregator component that can synthesize a machine learning model based on an aggregate of the plurality of model parameters. The aggregator component can communicate with the plurality of machine learning components via a data privacy scheme that comprises a privacy process and a homomorphic encryption process in a federated learning environment.

title: Hyperparameter determination for a differentially private federated learning process
abstract: Techniques regarding determining hyperparameters for a differentially private federated learning process are provided. For example, one or more embodiments described herein can comprise a system, which can comprise a memory that can store computer executable components. The system can also comprise a processor, operably coupled to the memory, and that can execute the computer executable components stored in the memory. The computer executable components can comprise a hyperparameter advisor component that determines a hyperparameter for a model of a differentially private federated learning process based on a defined numeric relationship between a privacy budget, a learning rate schedule, and a batch size.

title: Hierarchical security federal learning method, hierarchical security federal learning device, electronic equipment and storage medium
abstract: The invention provides a hierarchical security federal learning method, a hierarchical security federal learning device, electronic equipment and a storage medium, wherein the hierarchical security federal learning method comprises the following steps: issuing a global model to each local user, and indicating each local user to send the local model generated after training the global model to an intermediate layer; acquiring a user behavior identifier and a user behavior score which are generated after the middle layer performs anonymous processing on each local model; the anonymization processing comprises the steps that the middle layer carries out model shuffling and disturbance adding on each local model to generate an anonymization model, and then carries out abnormality detection processing on the anonymization model to obtain the user behavior identification and the user behavior score; and determining and blocking the malicious user according to the user behavior identification and the user behavior score. The method of the invention realizes the improvement of the safety and reliability of privacy protection by anonymously protecting and detecting the abnormality of the privacy information carried by each local model through the middle layer.

title: Method and device for processing model parameters in federal learning process and related equipment
abstract: The invention discloses a method for processing model parameters in a federated learning process, which is applied to the technical field of artificial intelligence and is used for solving the technical problem that user privacy data are easy to leak when mutual information representation between gradient of model parameters and sample data is overlarge in the federated learning process. The method provided by the invention comprises the following steps: sampling a sample data set used for training a local model to obtain a plurality of sampling samples; acquiring the gradient of a parameter obtained by training the local model through the plurality of sampling samples; inputting the sampling sample and the gradient of the parameter into a pre-trained statistical model to obtain a mutual information value between the sampling sample set and the gradient; when the mutual information value is larger than or equal to a preset value, sending a risk prompt that privacy disclosure exists in the gradient of the uploaded parameter; and when the mutual information value is smaller than the preset value, uploading the gradient of the parameter to a server.

title: A verifiable privacy-preserving federated learning method and system
abstract: The invention discloses a verifiable privacy protection federal learning method and a verifiable privacy protection federal learning system, belongs to the field of federal learning safety, and solves the problem faced by privacy protection federal learning based on homomorphic encryption of multiple keys, namely that an aggregate ciphertext returned by a server at least needs two clients to be decrypted cooperatively, and the problem that a single client cannot decrypt independently, so that the key of the client is revealed under the condition that the server is not trusted is solved. The method comprises the steps of system initialization, key generation, local model training, encryption uploading, model aggregation, partial decryption and complete decryption. The invention is used for protecting the privacy and federal study.

title: Federated learning security and privacy approach for user behavior
abstract: The invention discloses a federal learning security and privacy method facing user behaviors, which specifically comprises the following steps: the terminal user utilizes Gaussian noise to protect personal sensitive information, the server calculates cosine similarity between the uploading model parameters of the terminal user and a root model, euclidean distance and the performance of the verification set combined with historical trust value according to a secure aggregation scheme, and weight of the user participating in aggregation is obtained based on a calculation result. The invention considers the behavior of the terminal user, distributes trust values according to the historical behavior of the terminal user, adds Gaussian noise in the whole process so as to solve the reasoning attack problem of an untrusted server, further protects the sensitive information of the user and improves the safety and privacy in a federal learning system; the terminal user only carries out noise processing on the sensitive information additionally, so that the calculation overhead of the terminal is reduced, and the sensitive data processing time of the terminal is shortened.

title: Privacy-preserving federated learning method, system, device and medium in distributed environment
abstract: The embodiment of the application relates to the technical field of distributed machine learning, in particular to a method, a system, equipment and a medium for protecting privacy in a distributed environment for federal learning, wherein the method comprises the following steps: firstly, respectively generating a homomorphic encryption public key and a homomorphic encryption private key; then, initializing model parameters to obtain a global model; encrypting the global model by using the homomorphic encryption public key to obtain an encrypted global model, and sending the encrypted global model to the client; next, based on the encrypted global model, the client performs local training; then, the server carries out weighting and aggregation treatment on the local model to obtain a new global model; and finally, repeating the local training and the weighting and aggregation treatment on the local model until a final global model is obtained. According to the method and the device, the client model can be protected and the communication bandwidth can be optimized under the privacy protection federal learning technology.

title: Federal learning model training privacy protection method and system based on hybrid strategy
abstract: The invention discloses a federal learning model training privacy protection method and system based on a hybrid strategy, which are characterized in that a confusion self-encoder network is combined into a federal learning participant local model training process, and data labels are subjected to confusion mapping, so that the relation between gradient information and data information is cut off, and an attacker is prevented from reconstructing user original data by using the gradient information; the localization differential privacy mechanism is combined to the parameter transmission process of federal learning, gaussian noise meeting (epsilon, delta) -localization differential privacy is added to gradient parameters, so that gradient information is disturbed, meanwhile, the contribution of a single participant is hidden through approximate average aggregation of the randomization mechanism in the central server aggregation process, and inference attack by an attacker is prevented. The invention can construct a federal learning system with privacy safety, resist various privacy risks caused by gradient leakage in the federal learning model training process, and achieve better balance between model performance and privacy safety.

title: Privacy protection method and device for federated learning
abstract: The embodiment of the invention provides a privacy protection method and a device facing federal learning, which comprises the following steps: the method comprises the steps of parameter setting, data dividing, first training, second training, first calculating, second calculating and confrontation sample generating. In the embodiment, a concept of resisting samples is adopted, a certain amount of distribution characteristics of noise disturbance parameters are added in parameter updating, and after passing through a privacy attribute inference model, a privacy inference result is output randomly according to probability distribution expected by a user so as to resist privacy attribute inference attacks, so that the privacy attribute disclosure problem of federal learning is relieved.

title: Optimization method for modeling based on federated learning, and electronic device, storage medium and program product
abstract: Disclosed in the present application are an optimization method for modeling based on federated learning, and an electronic device, a storage medium and a program product, which are applied to a federation participant. The optimization method for modeling based on federated learning comprises: acquiring first noise data, and mapping the first noise data to initial particle network models according to a local generative network model; acquiring local sample data, and respectively performing iterative training and updating on the initial particle network models according to the local sample data, so as to obtain respective target particle network models; acquiring second noise data, and performing federated learning based iterative training and updating on the local generative network model according to the target particle network models and the second noise data, so as to obtain a federated generative network model; and acquiring a locally selected noise sample, and converting the locally selected noise sample into a federated prediction network model according to the federated generative network model.

title: Federal learning privacy protection method based on homomorphic encryption
abstract: The invention discloses a federal learning privacy protection method based on homomorphic encryption, which comprises the following steps: (1) encrypting the client; (2) storing client data; (3) the client runs a local neural network; (4) training local data; (5) gradient encryption; (6) safe polymerization; (7) and (6) decrypting the parameters. The invention belongs to the technical field of computers, and particularly relates to a federal learning privacy protection method based on homomorphic encryption.

title: Federal learning privacy protection method based on homomorphic encryption and secret sharing
abstract: The invention discloses a federated learning privacy protection method based on homomorphic encryption and secret sharing. By adopting a gradient protection method based on homomorphic encryption, the protection of the gradient is realized, and the aggregation of the gradient ciphertext can be completed, thereby effectively preventing the leakage of the gradient privacy information and realizing the safe aggregation of the gradient; by the secret sharing-based random number protection method, the gradient ciphertext is protected, and the random number protected by the gradient ciphertext is protected, so that collusion attack among the aggregation server, the key generation server and the participating party can be effectively prevented, and the safety of gradient information in the interaction process of the aggregation server, the key generation server and the participating party is further ensured.

title: Processing device, accelerator, and method for federated learning
abstract: A processing device for federated learning, including: a modular exponentiation module including at least one modular exponentiation engine; a pre-processing module for providing operations corresponding to a plurality of operator modes; a montgomerization module for providing montgomerization operations; a confusion calculation module for providing modular multiplication operations in montgomery space; a montgomery reduction module for providing montgomery reduction operations; and a controller for determining, according to an input operator mode, whether to enable at least two modules out of the pre-processing module, the montgomerization module, the confusion calculation module, and the montgomery reduction module, so as for cooperatively performing the input operator mode together with the modular exponentiation module.

title: Federated learning with partitioned and dynamically-shuffled model updates
abstract: Techniques for distributed federated learning leverage a multi-layered defense strategy to provide for reduced information leakage. In lieu of aggregating model updates centrally, an aggregation function is decentralized into multiple independent and functionally-equivalent execution entities, each running within its own trusted executed environment (TEE). The TEEs enable confidential and remote-attestable federated aggregation. Preferably, each aggregator entity runs within an encrypted virtual machine that support runtime in-memory encryption. Each party remotely authenticates the TEE before participating in the training. By using multiple decentralized aggregators, parties are enabled to partition their respective model updates at model-parameter granularity, and can map single weights to a specific aggregator entity. Parties also can dynamically shuffle fragmentary model updates at each training iteration to further obfuscate the information dispatched to each aggregator execution entity. This architectural prevents the aggregator from being a single point-of-failure, and serves to protect the model even if all aggregators are compromised.

title: Difference privacy protection method and device for federal learning
abstract: The invention provides a differential privacy protection method and a differential privacy protection device for federal learning, wherein the method comprises the following steps: acquiring model weight differences uploaded by various clients participating in current round of learning; respectively executing cutting operation on the model weight difference uploaded by each client according to the cutting parameters corresponding to the current learning round; aggregating the model weight differences after the cutting operation is executed, and carrying out noise adding processing on the aggregated model weight differences according to Gaussian noise distribution corresponding to the current round learning to complete model updating of the current round learning; the Gaussian noise distribution corresponding to the current round learning is determined according to the noise scale corresponding to the current round learning and the cutting parameters corresponding to the current round learning, and the noise scale corresponding to each round learning is gradually reduced along with the increase of the learning rounds. The method can enable the added noise to be attached to the characteristics of the model weight information uploaded by the current client, thereby obtaining higher model precision and effectively reducing the privacy budget in differential privacy protection.

title: Private data processing method, equipment and system for federated learning
abstract: The invention discloses a method for processing private data of federated learning. The privacy data processing method comprises the following steps: receiving the aggregation model parameters sent by the coordination equipment or other participating equipment; acquiring training data, generating an updating model, and outputting updating model parameters of the updating model; performing secret calculation on the update model parameters by using an encryption algorithm to generate ciphertext data, and in the process of the secret calculation, disassembling a first operand into a plurality of second operands, wherein the bit number of the first operand is greater than that of the second operands; and sending the ciphertext data to the coordinator or other participants to obtain a global model. According to the invention, the requirement of a machine instruction is met by disassembling the first operand in ciphertext calculation into a plurality of second operands, and the execution of a ciphertext calculation task of federal learning can be realized on a general processor.

title: Edge privacy protection method based on federal learning
abstract: The invention relates to a federal learning-based edge privacy protection method, which comprises the following steps: the edge device downloads the model from the server and initializes the federal training model, and the edge device trains the model by using local data; adding disturbance to the gradient parameters of the local model by using a localized differential privacy technology, and uploading the encrypted parameters to a server; and the server receives the local model parameters subjected to the local differential privacy encryption, aggregates the local model parameters and updates the global model parameters. The local differential privacy is applied to federal learning, so that the local training and aggregation model of data in edge equipment can be completed when the edge users are guaranteed to share data safely, the data do not need to be uploaded in the whole process, the privacy safety of the edge user data is guaranteed, and the purpose of protecting model parameters is achieved while the accuracy of the model is guaranteed.

title: Subject-Level Granular Differential Privacy in Federated Learning
abstract: Group-level privacy preservation is implemented within federated machine learning. An aggregation server may distribute a machine learning model to multiple users each including respective private datasets. The private datasets may individually include multiple items associated with a single group. Individual users may train the model using their local, private dataset to generate one or more parameter updates and to determine a count of the largest number of items associated with any single group of a number of groups in the dataset. Parameter updates generated by the individual users may be modified by applying respective noise values to individual ones of the parameter updates according to the respective counts to ensure differential privacy for the groups of the dataset. The aggregation server may aggregate the updates into a single set of parameter updates to update the machine learning model.

title: A ubiquitous intelligent federated learning privacy protection system and method for cloud-edge-device collaboration
abstract: The invention discloses a cloud-side-end-collaborative ubiquitous intelligent federal learning privacy protection system and a method, wherein the system comprises terminal equipment, a parameter server, an edge server and a central cloud server; the method comprises the following steps: s1, setting a mask-based terminal training output protection mechanism; s2, adding self-adaptive differential disturbance of a local model; s3, global model aggregation and adding adaptive differential disturbance. The invention provides a lightweight privacy protection scheme, which is characterized in that partial model training is carried out on terminal equipment, and a matrix mask is added to ensure safe transmission between a terminal and an edge server; in addition, performing residual model training and adding differential disturbance on the edge server; and adding noise after aggregation at the cloud end and feeding back the noise to the edge server. Experimental results show that the scheme can achieve 86% of accuracy on the CIFAR10 data set on the premise of ensuring privacy, and can well meet the ubiquitous intelligent requirements, so that the method is very suitable for large-scale popularization and application.

title: A method, system, medium, device and terminal for protecting privacy in federated learning
abstract: The invention belongs to the technical field of federal learning privacy protection, and discloses a federal learning privacy protection method, a federal learning privacy protection system, a federal learning privacy protection medium, a federal learning privacy protection device, a federal learning privacy protection terminal, a federal learning privacy protection device and a federal learning privacy protection terminal, wherein in an initialization stage, a server and a client finish initialization of an authentication key pair, a secret sharing auxiliary function and a secret sharing key pair; the method comprises a key distribution stage, a mask generation and client authentication stage, a client generation and authentication stage, a server aggregation model parameter and broadcasting list stage, a model aggregation stage, a client calculation secret sharing parameter, a server recovery off-line client mask and an on-line client random number mask, and a server completion aggregation and broadcasting parameter. The invention realizes the rapid distribution of the secret key and ensures the privacy of the secret key.

title: Non-invasive enterprise load decomposition method based on federal learning
abstract: The invention discloses a non-intrusive enterprise load decomposition method based on federal learning, which comprises the following steps: s1: preprocessing load prediction data; s2: establishing a local model based on the hole convolution and the LSTM network; s3: and the server side realizes joint training based on the improved federal learning model. The non-invasive enterprise load decomposition method based on the federal learning provides a time sequence network-based federal learning algorithm based on a model of long-short term memory and federal learning of cavity residual convolution, and is used for solving the problem of data isolated island of load decomposition. The patent algorithm model not only protects the privacy problem of the user, but also can greatly improve the prediction speed. Federal learning is used as novel distributed machine learning, privacy and safety of users are guaranteed through a distributed encryption training technology, and the trust of the users to current artificial intelligence technology is improved.

title: Batch label recovery method and device for privacy disclosure attack of federal learning
abstract: The application discloses a batch label recovery method and device for privacy disclosure attack of federal learning, wherein the method comprises the following steps: calculating the quotient of the weight and the biased gradient in the full connection layer of the model according to a chain type derivative rule, high similarity of embedded classes and low entanglement of the gradient between the classes to obtain class average embedding of approximate reconstruction; sequentially embedding the average of each class of the approximate reconstruction into an input full-connection layer according to an approximate substitution principle and obtaining class average probability through softmax operation; and establishing a linear equation set consisting of probability, gradient and label based on the derivation of the model output gradient and the class average probability, and solving a least square solution of the linear equation set by utilizing a Moore-Penrose pseudo-inverse algorithm to obtain the sample label and the number of examples of each class. The method solves the limitation that the label recovery attack based on the gradient information under the federal learning scene can only determine the existence of the sample class in the training batch, but cannot acquire the number of specific examples of a certain class of samples.

title: Federal learning privacy protection method based on differential privacy and homomorphic encryption
abstract: The invention provides a federal learning privacy protection method based on differential privacy and homomorphic encryption, and belongs to the technical field of network security data information privacy protection. According to the invention, a small amount of noise is added to the gradient in the local model training process, so that member inference attack and other possible privacy attack methods are effectively resisted, and the privacy data can be protected. By encrypting the model parameters in the training process by using the threshold homomorphic encryption algorithm, each participant has different private keys, and compared with the traditional homomorphic encryption algorithm, the risk of destructive striking of the whole federal learning privacy caused by the leakage of the secret key of a certain participant is greatly reduced. The nodes of each participant in the method have no structural influence on the basic framework of the framework, and the addition and deletion of the participants only influence the setting of threshold parameters, so that the method can flexibly adapt to the dynamic adjustment condition of the number of the participants. The invention provides an effective technical scheme for fully realizing federal learning data privacy and realizing safe communication and integration of data information.

title: Power data privacy protection method, system, equipment and medium under multi-party cooperation
abstract: The invention discloses a method, a system, equipment and a medium for protecting privacy of electric power data under multiparty collaboration, wherein the method comprises the following steps: updating parameters of an energy credit rating model under multiparty cooperation constructed based on federal learning through gradient values; finding out the input data gradient with highest accuracy of the credit rating model after parameter updating through a model loss function; performing gradient clipping on input data according to a minimum risk function in the model training process, and adding disturbance; and protecting the input data subjected to gradient clipping and disturbance addition by using homomorphic encryption. The invention adopts federal learning to protect data safety and user privacy, and fully utilizes scattered data sources to improve the performance of the model. Meanwhile, input data gradient clipping and disturbance adding are carried out, so that the data privacy safety of model training under multiparty cooperative data sharing can be effectively ensured. In addition, the homomorphic encryption can effectively protect the user privacy and the data security in federal learning.

title: Decentralized federated learning method and system based on personalized local differential privacy
abstract: The invention provides a decentralised federal learning method and system based on personalized local differential privacy, which relate to the technical field of federal learning and comprise the following steps: initializing a blockchain network for federal learning; each client receives training tasks from the blockchain, carries out local iterative training on a global model downloaded from the blockchain by using a local data set, carries out self-adaptive allocation on privacy budget and carries out local differential privacy processing on local model parameters until the conditions of iteration stopping are met, obtains trained local model parameters, and uploads the trained local model parameters to the blockchain; the block chain carries out weighted aggregation on local model parameters uploaded by the client to obtain an aggregated global model, and the aggregated global model is transmitted back to the task publisher; the invention combines federal learning with blockchain, and uses personalized privacy budget allocation and a weighting aggregation algorithm based on parameters, thereby ensuring effective trade-off between federal learning privacy, accuracy and robustness.

title: Vertical federated learning privacy protection method and system based on multi-key homomorphic encryption
abstract: The invention belongs to the technical field of federal learning, and discloses a longitudinal federal learning privacy protection method and a longitudinal federal learning privacy protection system based on multi-key homomorphic encryption; the method comprises the following steps: s1) initializing parameters; s2) initializing a model; s3) training the client side; s4) training at the server side; s5) updating the model; s6) model decryption. The invention supports the participants with different feature space data sets to realize efficient longitudinal federal neural network training on the premise of protecting the privacy of local data. The multi-key homomorphic encryption is adopted, different homomorphic encryption keys are distributed for different participants, and the problem that privacy cannot be guaranteed to be leaked among the participants by utilizing the traditional homomorphic encryption is solved. And an additional third party is not required to be introduced to manage the secret key and decrypt the secret key, and all the participants can perform cooperative decryption in a distributed mode, so that the safety of the trained model is further improved.

title: Block chain-based federated learning privacy protection method
abstract: The invention provides a block chain-based federal learning privacy protection method, which belongs to the technical field of federal learning, privacy protection and block chains, and adopts the technical scheme that: the method comprises the following steps: global initialization, a system administrator constructs a block chain and distributes security parameters for all participants of the task; the participants train the local model, and encrypt the model parameters by using the security parameters and the Chinese remainder theorem; leading selected by the consensus mechanism executes ciphertext aggregation; the participant decrypts the aggregated ciphertext and updates the local model; the model owner obtains the final model and the participant invokes an incentive contract to obtain rewards. The invention has the beneficial effects that: the invention records the federal learning process by using the block chain, realizes the security parameter distribution and the model aggregation, protects the privacy by using the Chinese remainder theorem and the blinding technology, avoids the possibility that the aggregation party and part of the participants conspire to steal the privacy of other participants, and enhances the security in the federal learning process.

title: Data privacy protection based on crowd sensing based on adaptive differential privacy and federated learning
abstract: In crowd sensing, the existing research on privacy protection is mainly to upload data to a sensing platform and perform model training through a server. This will prolong the communication time and also cause leakage of personal information. Aiming at the defects, the invention adopts a federal learning method, does not need to share sensing data, and locally stores and trains the data submitted by sensing users to form a local model. And secondly, gaussian noise is added by utilizing differential privacy to disturb and sense a local model uploaded by a user, so that information leakage is prevented. And uploading the processed local model to a perception platform for aggregation. And finally, a self-adaptive differential privacy mechanism is adopted to adjust the clipping value in real time, reduce errors caused by noise and parameter clipping, and reduce communication cost. The method combining differential privacy and federal learning is adopted to research the privacy protection problem in crowd sensing, so that the privacy protection efficiency is improved, and the time and calculation overhead are low.

title: Secure privacy computing method, server, system and storage medium
abstract: The invention relates to a safe privacy calculation method, which comprises the following steps: receiving, at a trusted computing environment, a first plurality of data from a plurality of sources; computing, in the trusted computing environment, the first plurality of datasets to build an anti-fraud model; performing tag prediction on a second plurality of data from the plurality of sources based on the anti-fraud model; generating feedback data based at least on the tag predictions and the properties of the plurality of sources; and updating the anti-fraud model according to the feedback data.

title: Federal learning method, apparatus, electronic device, and computer-readable storage medium
abstract: The embodiment of the invention discloses a federal learning method, a federal learning device, electronic equipment and a computer readable storage medium; after training the local model and sending the first model information of the trained first local model to the server, receiving the first federal model returned by the server, verifying the first federal model, performing disturbance processing on the first verification information, updating a preset disturbed first verification information set based on the disturbed first verification information, screening out target disturbed first verification information from the updated disturbed first verification information set, constructing a model index corresponding to the target disturbed first verification information, and sending the target disturbed first verification information and the model index to the server so as to generate the trained federal model by the server; the training efficiency of federal learning can be improved by the scheme, and the embodiment of the invention can be applied to various scenes such as cloud technology, artificial intelligence, intelligent traffic, auxiliary driving and the like.

title: Block chain enabling federal learning system suitable for edge car networking
abstract: The application provides a blockchain enabled federal learning system suitable for the edge vehicle networking, which comprises: the system comprises edge vehicle equipment, an edge server, a task publisher and a cloud server; the mobile vehicles in the Internet of vehicles are defined as edge vehicle devices, all edge vehicle devices and edge servers are respectively registered as blockchain roles, and then the edge vehicle devices and the edge servers together with task publishers, cloud servers and the like form participants of the blockchain system; the set of edge vehicle devices {1,2,..k } and the set of mobile edge servers {1,2,..l } in the participants are divided into two classes, model nodes and consensus nodes, according to blockchain architecture functionality. The blockchain architecture of the blockchain system automatically coordinates the joining and leaving of each model node, promoting the independence and modularization of federal learning.

title: Federal learning-based software defect prediction privacy protection method
abstract: The invention relates to a privacy protection method for software defect prediction based on federal learning, which is used for predicting software defects based on a random forest model constructed by a decision tree and solving the privacy leakage problem of model training by relying on enterprise private data stored in a centralized manner. Firstly, constructing a software defect prediction model, decomposing the software defect prediction model into a data set for preprocessing, and creating a training set for each decision tree by adopting a Bootstrap sampling strategy and forming a random forest model part based on the decision trees; secondly, forecasting and training on each internal department by using the constructed model, and calculating loss and local gradient; then, carrying out gradient clipping on the local gradient, adding a local differential privacy technology to obtain a protected gradient, and uploading the protected gradient to a server; and finally, aggregating the gradients by the server, updating global model parameters and distributing the global model parameters to each department. The invention uses a privacy protection mode and a large amount of data to train a model so as to train an accurate unbiased software defect prediction model.

title: Model training method based on federal learning and federal learning system
abstract: A model training method based on federal learning and a federal learning system are disclosed. The method is applied to a federated learning system comprising a server and N nodes, N > 1, and comprises: in the ith operation of model training, the following steps are performed: the server issues the model parameter set to M i A node, wherein M i ≤N，M i Each node performs gradient calculation by using a local training sample to obtain an original gradient, and performs joint optimization on a performance maintaining index and a privacy protecting index related to the original gradient to obtain a transformation gradient; and the server acquires the transformation gradient and updates the model parameter set. The performance maintenance index can measure model performance variation, and the privacy protection index can measure privacy disclosure risk. By jointly optimizing these two metrics, the present invention canTo obtain a perturbation point where data privacy is surely protected and model performance degradation is minimal. The invention can also accelerate the convergence of joint optimization through an improved initialization strategy.

title: A privacy-preserving federated learning method with verifiable aggregation results and testable gradient quality
abstract: The invention discloses a privacy protection federal learning method with verifiable aggregation results and verifiable gradient quality, which comprises the following steps: system initialization, gradient security submission, model selection, model aggregation, model distribution and aggregation verification. Aiming at the problems of data privacy protection and model performance caused by a malicious participation set formed by a malicious user and a malicious server in federal learning, the invention provides an anti-malicious federal learning scheme under a double-service model, and the security threat of the malicious participation set is dealt with based on cosine value detection and homomorphic hash verification methods. Privacy protection is provided for model updates by adding masks and performing homomorphic encryption prior to local model updates. In the model selection stage, harmful data are removed through a cosine value-based model selection method, and the usability of the model is improved. The invention realizes high privacy, excellent safety and excellent usability in federal learning of malicious participation sets, and has stronger practical application value.

title: Federal learning security aggregation method
abstract: The invention discloses a federal learning security aggregation method, which adopts a threshold Paillier homomorphic encryption algorithm for distributed key generation and a Gaussian mechanism of differential privacy to carry out privacy protection on model gradients uploaded by participants on a federal learning frame based on a blockchain, and adds Gaussian noise to encrypt the model gradients by the Paillier homomorphic encryption algorithm after obtaining the model gradients through local training. Wherein the Euclidean distance between gradients is calculated in the ciphertext state and thereby the gradients are mass scored to resist poisoning attacks. The invention comprehensively applies technologies such as a Gaussian mechanism of differential privacy and Paillier homomorphic encryption generated by a distributed secret key, effectively protects privacy data of participants, ensures safety and correctness of federal learning, and provides a method for calculating Euclidean distance between gradients in a ciphertext state and grading the gradients in quality to resist poisoning attack by the Euclidean distance, and experiments prove that 30% of poisoning attack can be resisted.

title: Federated learning for preserving privacy
Application of Federated Learning in Power Data Analysis and Privacy Protection Methods
abstract: The application of federal learning in electric power data analysis and privacy protection method is that a client trains a model together under the coordination of a central server, the client receives an initialization model issued by the server, trains a local model according to local data and uploads the local model to the server, the server carries out safe aggregation on model parameters uploaded by the client and feeds back the model parameters to the client, and the client carries out the next iteration according to the updated model, and the iteration is carried out for a plurality of times until the model converges; the method of combining homomorphic encryption and differential privacy is adopted, noise is added to model parameters delta i uploaded by participants by using the differential privacy, so that epsilon-differential privacy is met, and then homomorphic encryption is used for the parameters added with the noise. The federal learning method can effectively ensure the privacy of the sensitive data of the client, the application utilizes the principal component analysis to extract the characteristics, the recognition model obtains better performance, and meanwhile, the federal recognition model has the performance equivalent to that of the centralized method.

title: A Client Membership Reasoning Attack Method Based on Federated Distillation Learning Framework
abstract: The invention discloses a client member reasoning attack method based on a federation distillation learning framework, which comprises the steps of (1) adopting a knowledge distillation communication enhancement algorithm to carry out privacy protection scheme design on federation learning, and realizing a federation learning model with high performance and high stability and a corresponding privacy leakage assessment scheme by gradient logic layer parameter conversion, client knowledge distillation and random client model uploading mechanisms for meeting the requirements of the federation learning framework on private data privacy protection of participants; (2) The federal learning high privacy protection framework enhanced by the knowledge distillation algorithm is used for designing member reasoning attack based on the client, and the knowledge distillation-based model behavior similarity theory is utilized to realize the shadow-like model construction of the malicious client. The invention adopts a federal distillation communication algorithm with high privacy protection and a member reasoning attack scheme based on a malicious client to realize attack on a distributed machine learning framework with privacy protection function.

title: Robust federated learning method, system and storage medium based on Euclidean distance
abstract: The application relates to a robust federal learning method, a system and a storage medium based on Euclidean distance, wherein the method comprises the following steps: the split local gradient data sent by each client are respectively received through a server; performing interactive calculation between servers, and determining Euclidean distance between the local gradient data of each client and a target aggregation gradient in the previous federal learning; performing gradient aggregation based on the Euclidean distance corresponding to each client, respectively obtaining local aggregation gradients in two servers, and sending the local aggregation gradients to each client; the method comprises the steps of encrypting interactive calculation among servers by adopting multiplication triples; and obtaining a target aggregation gradient according to the local aggregation gradient through each client, updating a local training model based on the target aggregation gradient, and performing the next round of federation learning until the iteration condition is reached. The method and the system can efficiently ensure the data safety and privacy of each client, and solve the problem that the efficient federal learning privacy enhancement cannot be realized.

title: Non-invasive load monitoring method based on hybrid federal learning and cross-transducer
abstract: A non-invasive load monitoring method based on hybrid federal learning and cross-transformation belongs to the technical field of power system management and energy efficiency, and solves the problems of insufficient accuracy, expansibility and privacy protection in the prior art. The method comprises the steps of combining a hybrid federal learning framework of centralized federal learning and decentralized federal learning, constructing a communication topology of the decentralized federal learning through a graph neural network, encoding deep graph structure information into embedded representation of a client by using the graph neural network, enhancing privacy protection of the federal learning through a layer sensitivity pruning and robust aggregation method, processing an input bus power sequence through a one-dimensional convolution layer and a shared transducer encoder, realizing prediction of a plurality of load working modes through a plurality of load branch structures, and judging whether the model is converged or not through a voting mechanism in the decentralized federal learning training. The invention is suitable for monitoring the energy consumption of various load devices in the monitoring environment.

title: A privacy-preserving federated learning method based on blockchain anti-poisoning attack
abstract: The invention provides a privacy protection federation learning method based on block chain poisoning attack resistance, and belongs to the technical fields of federation learning, privacy protection and block chain. The technical problems of poisoning attack and malicious aggregation in the privacy protection federal study are solved. The technical scheme is that the method comprises the following steps: s10, global initialization of a system; s20, training a local model; s30, malicious participant identification, and MO and SM cooperate to determine whether the participant performs normalization operation; s40, gradient ciphertext aggregation; s50, updating the model by the participant and the MO. The beneficial effects of the invention are as follows: the invention protects the privacy of the participant model gradient by using the homomorphic encryption algorithm CKS, identifies the malicious gradient in the gradient ciphertext by using a cosine similarity method, and calculates and verifies the aggregation result by using a block chain consensus mechanism.

title: Federated learning privacy protection model training method and system based on knowledge distillation
abstract: The invention provides a federal learning privacy protection model training method and system based on knowledge distillation, wherein in the method, a central server sends global model parameters to a client in each round of iterative training process of a transverse federal learning global model to update local model parameters; carrying out local model neural network training on each client by using the preprocessed long-tail distributed data set, and simultaneously integrating a knowledge distillation technology of a teacher-student mode to obtain processed model parameters; after encryption processing is carried out by using a hybrid encryption technology, combined encryption information is obtained; the center server decrypts to obtain the processed model parameters; the central server returns the updated global parameters to each client, and the clients obtain updated and trained local models; the invention can reduce the calculated amount, reduce the training time and improve the training efficiency, and simultaneously can improve the performance of the model, the training effect of the model and the safety of federal learning parameter transmission.

title: Federal learning method, system and device based on user grouping cooperation
abstract: The application provides a federated learning method, a federated learning system and a federated learning device based on user grouping coordination, wherein the federated learning method based on user grouping coordination provides a federated learning privacy protection framework based on user grouping coordination, a transmission method with two scales is used, local calculation is added on a traditional federated learning framework, the number of connections with a server is reduced, and the problem of user collusion can be effectively solved. The system uplink consumption time prolonging caused by reducing the chain structure by changing the group number is superior to that of a classical federal learning average aggregation algorithm. Even if the users mutually collude, the privacy can still be protected, and the accuracy of model training is not influenced.

title: Random multi-model privacy protection method based on federal learning
abstract: The invention discloses a random multi-model privacy protection method based on federal learning, which comprises a participant selection step, a model sharing pool construction step, a randomization processing step and a model evaluation step. Compared with the prior art, the invention has the advantages that: not only can the problem of unbalanced data distribution of all parties be solved, but also the data privacy protection intensity can be increased through a differentiation mechanism; the concept of sharing the model pool is introduced, so that hidden dangers such as model attack and the like are well avoided; different concepts are introduced, and different models are selected to participate in training according to the actual conditions of all the participants; enhancing the randomization concept, and confusing the memory of the server to the data of each participant so as to protect the privacy of the data of the participant; a heuristic selection strategy is introduced, and participants are selected symmetrically according to the data of the same application of different users.

title: Federal learning privacy protection system and method based on blockchain and privacy computing technology
abstract: A federal learning privacy protection system based on a blockchain and privacy computing technology comprises a federal learning module and a blockchain module; the federation learning module is deployed at each federation learning participant, and the blockchain module is deployed at the cloud; the federation learning module adjusts each round of training process of the local model, adds noise to the local model in the training gradient through a self-adaptive differential privacy algorithm, and sends the noise-added local model to the blockchain module; the block chain module is used for carrying out distributed storage on local model parameters of the federal learning participants in the block chain, carrying out model aggregation to obtain a global model, and sending the global model to the participants for continuous training; and carrying out data consensus among the block chains by adopting a node contribution quantity proving algorithm. The invention solves the balance problem of model precision and privacy protection performance of the traditional federal learning model based on the blockchain, and further solves the problem of high calculation and communication expenditure.

title: Block chain-based privacy protection method and system for resisting federal learning gradient attack
abstract: A privacy protection method and a system for resisting federal learning gradient attack based on a blockchain relate to the technical field of data privacy protection. The technical key points of the invention include: when the participant finishes training and uploading the gradient data, the intelligent contract automatically adds a noise value related to the gradient hash value, and the block chain stores the gradient after noise addition, so that the user data cannot be recovered directly by a gradient leakage method; when the central server aggregates data, the participant uses the hash value of the gradient data as a parameter to call an intelligent contract, and the intelligent contract verifies the uploaded gradient data and then carries out the next operation; the intelligent contract recalculates the noise value and randomly divides the noise value into a plurality of parts, and each part is stored in a block chain; the central server calculates the shared noise value of all the participants by the intelligent contract and then directly returns the noise sum; and finally, calculating the latest model parameters. The invention effectively solves the problem of user privacy disclosure and improves the problem of model precision reduction.

title: A federated learning method for non-steady-state multi-armed bandit and probabilistic Shapley values
abstract: The invention discloses an unsteady multi-arm slot machine and a federal learning method of probability decleration values, wherein in the method, a server side extracts a super-arm by utilizing an unsteady multi-arm slot machine model according to probability distribution of the current super-arm; the server calculates probability sharp values of all clients in the selected super arm by utilizing a truncated Monte Carlo algorithm, and sums and normalizes the probability sharp values; the server updates the loss estimation for each affected super arm, and updates the accumulated loss and probability of all super arms; each client in the selected super arm performs local model training and uploads the changes of model parameters to the server; the server calculates the change of the global model parameters based on the received change of the client model parameters and combining the probability Xia Puli values of all the clients in the selected super arm, thereby updating the global model parameters and issuing the global model parameters to all the clients; repeating the steps until the global model parameters reach the preset requirements.

title: Asynchronous aggregation and privacy protection method in resource-limited federal edge learning
abstract: The invention discloses an asynchronous aggregation and privacy protection method in resource-limited federal edge learning, which relates to the field of distributed machine learning and comprises the following modules: system initialization, client selection, asynchronous federal training, personalized differential privacy protection and resource monitoring. The delay compensation mechanism is improved, the delay compensation is carried out on model parameters in the threshold range of the model obsolescence, the attenuation coefficient adopts a bell-shaped curve function, and the attenuation is faster when the obsolescence is larger; and (3) for the client exceeding the old degree threshold, synchronizing with the current global parameter is forced, and the next round of local training is carried out.

title: A blockchain supply chain financial risk control method, system, storage medium and electronic terminal based on federated learning
abstract: The invention relates to a block chain supply chain financial risk control method and system based on federal learning, a storage medium and an electronic terminal, and belongs to the technical field of block chains. The method comprises the following steps: s1, connecting all the participants together based on a blockchain to form a network, wherein all the participants in a supply chain become single member nodes in the network; s2, acquiring related information of each participant of a supply chain, and uploading the related information; s3, constructing a supply chain information transmission system through a block chain based on the information of each participant of the supply chain of the uplink; s4, a data classification module is pre-established by a data owner, and data inspection is carried out on the common public data and the privacy protection data of the uplink again; s5, the privacy protection data are shared after federal learning training and homomorphic encryption algorithm. The invention ensures the information privacy of the transaction party behind the data while realizing information sharing, reduces the maintenance cost of the information and improves the service efficiency.

title: Heterogeneous federal learning privacy protection method and system based on diffusion model
abstract: The disclosure provides a heterogeneous federal learning privacy protection method and system based on a diffusion model, which relate to the technical field of federal learning privacy protection and comprise the steps of establishing a communication channel between a server side and a client side; acquiring data with uneven category distribution of a client side, uploading the data to a server side, taking the data with uneven category distribution as input of a denoising diffusion model, and generating an image conforming to data distribution at the server side; the server initiates global model parameters by utilizing the generated image data to train heterogeneous federal learning, distributes the global model parameters to the randomly selected clients, utilizes a knowledge distillation method to treat the global model as a teacher network, treats the local model of the previous round as a student network to train and upload parameters of the local model, and utilizes the uploaded local model parameters of each client to aggregate the global model to finish knowledge migration.

title: Differential privacy federal dynamic aggregation method and system based on important gradient protection
abstract: The invention discloses a differential privacy federal dynamic aggregation method and a system based on important gradient protection, which construct a gradient noise adding mode based on sparse vectors, and based on the local model training loss function and the local data volume of the client, calculating the dynamic aggregation weight of the gradient, and finally realizing gradient aggregation of the global model. Because a large amount of differential privacy noise is added to the original gradient, the information contained in the gradient can be severely distorted, so that the accuracy of the federal learning global model is greatly reduced, and even the global model is disabled. For each local client, most of the gradient values of the client updates are minimal, and only gradients containing important parameter update information are of protected value. Therefore, adding privacy noise to only a portion of the important gradients can prevent excessive noise addition and improve global model accuracy.

title: Data security aggregation method and system based on polymorphic attributes
