abstract: The invention relates to a data security aggregation method and system based on multiple homomorphism attributes, wherein a user uses seeds as privacy parameters to generate a random mask, the privacy input of each user is covered by the random mask, the privacy parameters are encrypted by using a temporary key and a global public key, and ciphertext and covered privacy input are sent to an aggregation server; the aggregation server aggregates the received ciphertext of each user and feeds back an aggregation result to the user; the user uses the temporary key, the private key of the client and the public key of the server to perform conversion calculation on the aggregation result and send the conversion calculation result to the aggregation server, the aggregation server uses the private key of the server to decrypt the conversion result, obtain a seed sum, obtain a random mask sum by using the seed sum, obtain a privacy input sum by aggregating the privacy input covered by the aggregation, and obtain global parameters in federal learning by using the privacy input sum to subtract the random mask sum. The method and the system can improve the aggregation efficiency and are suitable for federal study of large-scale mobile terminals and Internet of things equipment.

title: A method and system for protecting the privacy of federated learning in the whole process based on pairwise masking and elastic differential privacy
abstract: The invention relates to the technical field of federal learning privacy protection, in particular to a federal learning full-flow privacy protection method and a federal learning full-flow privacy protection system based on paired masks and elastic differential privacy, wherein each client uses local data to carry out local training on the basis of global model parameters to obtain local model parameters, noise is added to the local model parameters by using an elastic differential privacy noise adding algorithm, the noise added model parameters are encrypted by using an encryption transmission algorithm, encrypted ciphertext is uploaded to a federal learning server, and the encryption transmission algorithm adopts pairwise negotiated paired masks of the client to carry out covering encryption on the noise added local model parameters; the federal learning server aggregates the local model parameters and performs global model updates by weighted averaging and elimination masking. According to the invention, the encryption technology is used for protecting the transmitted parameter update, so that the model parameter exists in a ciphertext form in a transmission stage, and the differential privacy technology is used for adding noise in the training process of the model, so that an attacker cannot accurately infer the data information of each node, and the efficient full-flow privacy protection federal learning is realized.

title: Distributed photovoltaic energy intelligent group dispatching and control system based on machine learning
abstract: The invention relates to a distributed photovoltaic energy intelligent group regulation group control system based on machine learning, which adopts a layered architecture of a sensing layer, a network layer, a platform layer and an application layer, and realizes layered distributed acquisition of multi-source heterogeneous data such as photovoltaic power generation, user load, energy storage state, electric energy quality and the like by fusing multi-mode sensors in the sensing layer; the network layer synthesizes the multilayer security technology, construct the private network of the thing of energy and allies oneself with; the platform layer end-edge cloud collaboration is used for carrying out multi-granularity model training and full-dimension intelligent computation, and realizing data security sharing by fusing technologies such as block chain, federal learning and the like; the application layer optimizes the whole flow of enabling through machine learning, and the block chain is used for confirming the right and increasing the information, so that a new intelligent energy state of source network charge storage coordination is formed. The system builds a privacy protection and endogenous security defense system covering the whole life cycle of data while improving the considerable and measurable controllable capability of the distributed photovoltaic, and effectively solves the problem of high-permeability grid-connected absorption of new energy.

title: Subject level privacy attack analysis for federated learning
abstract: Subject level privacy attack analysis for federated learning may be performed. A request that selects an analysis of one or more inference attacks may be received to determine a presence of data of a subject in a training set of a federated machine learning model. The selected inference attacks may be performed to determine the presence of the data of subject in the training set of the federated machine learning model. Respective success measurements may be generated for the selected inference attacks based on the performance of the selected inference attacks, which may then be provided.

title: A privacy protection method for federated learning based on homomorphic encryption
abstract: The invention discloses a federal learning privacy protection method based on homomorphic encryption, which comprises the steps of encrypting local model parameters, initializing homomorphic encryption safety parameters and public parameters of multiple keys by a key generation center, generating different private keys for each participant, and simultaneously, locally completing the initialization of various parameters by the participant, wherein the initialization comprises model parameters, key pairs, random numbers and sharing; the participants perform model training locally, then calculate the gradient in each round of training, encrypt and blinde the gradient, and then upload the random number shared and blinded gradient ciphertext. The method can realize privacy protection in federal learning with high efficiency and light weight, ensure the accuracy of federal learning while guaranteeing the privacy, and reduce certain calculation cost.

title: Federated learning with single-round convergence
abstract: A method including classifying a cluster training dataset by, for each datapoint of the cluster training dataset: obtaining a student prediction from each of a plurality of respective student machine-learning models for each a plurality of nodes of a cluster; performing a voting of the student predictions from the plurality of respective student machine-learning models of at least a portion of the plurality of nodes of the cluster to determine a respective classification for the datapoint; and labeling the datapoint of the cluster training dataset with the respective classification. The method also can include training a cluster machine-learning model of the cluster using the cluster training dataset, as classified. Other embodiments are described.

title: A privacy protection method for federated learning of power data based on efficient homomorphic encryption
abstract: The invention relates to a power data federation learning privacy protection method based on efficient homomorphic encryption, which comprises the following steps of 1, initializing a neural network model by a client, 2, encrypting and updating local neural network model gradient parameters uploaded by the client by the server, 3, executing gradient average aggregation operation by the server, directly calculating the encrypted gradient parameters uploaded by the client without decryption by the server, calculating an average value to update global gradient parameters, 4, carrying out decryption calculation operation after each client receives the updated global gradient, 5, loading the updated neural network model weight parameters into a local neural network model, and training the neural network model by utilizing a local data set.

title: Cross-domain recommendation method based on federated learning and privacy protection
abstract: The invention relates to a cross-domain recommendation method based on federal learning and privacy protection, and belongs to the technical field of cross-domain recommendation. The method comprises the steps of S1, aligning common users in different fields, respectively searching similar users of a cold start user in a source domain and a target domain according to similarity thresholds, S2, constructing a heterogeneous information network according to a meta-path and a random walk strategy, inputting the similar users into the heterogeneous information network, extracting potential characteristics of the source domain of the cold start user, obtaining a user-project interaction characteristic matrix by utilizing the characteristics, S3, constructing and training a federal learning model locally, specifically, adopting CNN to identify the user-project interaction characteristic matrix, then adopting federal learning to encrypt and exchange intermediate results in combination with homomorphic encryption, adopting a gradient descent algorithm to optimize the encrypted targets, and finally updating a gradient and loss function of the model, and S4, generating accurate recommendation results for the users by utilizing the trained local federal learning model.

title: Privacy-preserving verifiable secure aggregation method and system based on federated learning
abstract: The invention discloses a federal learning-based privacy protection verifiable security aggregation method and a federal learning-based privacy protection verifiable security aggregation system, wherein the method comprises the following steps: the first random number and the second random number are converted into secret sharing shares through the public key and the private key and sent to the cloud server, so that the cloud server is prevented from forging an aggregation result; then calculating a training model gradient, encrypting the gradient through a first random number to obtain a mask gradient, and hashing the gradient through a second random number and a hash function parameter to obtain a verification tag, so that the server cannot extract private data about a user, and meanwhile, the server cannot initiate a model recovery attack from the masked hash value; and finally, reconstructing the first reconstruction number and the second reconstruction number by utilizing homomorphism, transmitting the first reconstruction number and the second reconstruction number to the security of user verification aggregation, and jointly carrying out the security of the equality verification aggregation result by reconstructing the verification result and the twice aggregation result, so as to further strengthen the security guarantee of the aggregation result.

title: Method, system and apparatus for training privacy protection model
abstract: Disclosed in embodiments of the present specification are a method and system for training a privacy protection model. The method is implemented by a certain data party in a plurality of data parties participating in training, and the method comprises: performing multi-round iterative updating on a model held by a data party, the model comprising a shared part and a special part, wherein one-round iterative updating comprises: performing iterative training on the model on the basis of the training sample held by itself to obtain model data; transmitting first shared data to a server, such that the server determines second shared data on the basis of the first shared parameter of the plurality of data parties; obtaining the second shared data returned by the server, and updating the shared part of the model on the basis of the second shared data; and carrying out the next round of iterative updating on the basis of the updated model, or taking the updated model as a final model.

title: Heterogeneous processing system for federated learning and privacy-preserving computation
abstract: A heterogeneous processing system for federated learning and privacy-preserving computation, including: a serial subsystem configured for distributing processing tasks and configuration information of processing tasks, the processing task indicating performing an operation corresponding to computing mode on one or more operands; and a parallel subsystem configured for, based on the configuration information, selectively obtaining at least one operand of the one or more operands from an intermediate result section on the parallel subsystem while obtaining remaining operand(s) of the one or more operands with respect to the at least one operand from the serial subsystem, and performing the operation on the operands obtained based on the configuration information.

title: A privacy protection method based on alliance chain federated learning
abstract: The invention relates to a privacy protection method based on federation chain federation learning, and belongs to the technical field of federation learning privacy protection. According to the method, the adaptive Laplace noise meeting the difference privacy is added according to the correlation between the data characteristics and the model through the adaptive difference privacy technology, and the reduction of the model accuracy is reduced as much as possible under the condition of protecting the data privacy. Through the alliance chain technology, a distributed federal learning privacy protection scheme is further realized to solve the problem of single-point failure. The method has better performance of privacy protection and model training accuracy. The method adopts the self-adaptive differential privacy technology, adds self-adaptive noise meeting differential privacy in the local model training process, guarantees the accuracy of model training under the condition of guaranteeing the data privacy of the client, solves the centralization problem of the traditional federal learning privacy protection scheme, and enhances the privacy protection performance of the system.

title: Federal learning privacy protection method and device based on multi-key homomorphic encryption
abstract: The application discloses a federal learning privacy protection method and a federal learning privacy protection device based on homomorphic encryption of multiple keys, wherein the federal learning privacy protection method comprises the following steps: the method comprises the steps that a user side collects data to form a data set, and the user side obtains a first secret key; the user side trains a preset training model, encodes and encrypts the training model to obtain a ciphertext, and sends the ciphertext to the server; the server detects whether the ciphertext is lost, and if so, generates a supplementary ciphertext to aggregate; if not lost, aggregating the ciphertext; in the aggregation process, judging whether the noise budget of the complementary ciphertext or ciphertext is sufficient, and if so, continuing to aggregate the complementary ciphertext or ciphertext to obtain aggregated ciphertext; if insufficient, carrying out noise refreshing on the complementary ciphertext or ciphertext, and after noise refreshing, continuing to aggregate the complementary ciphertext or ciphertext to obtain aggregated ciphertext; and returning the aggregated ciphertext to the user side, and decrypting by the user side according to the first key. The application ensures the encryption security and the high efficiency through the encryption process.

title: A privacy-preserving method for federated learning based on adaptive differential privacy
abstract: The invention discloses a federal learning privacy protection method based on self-adaptive differential privacy, which comprises the following steps: controlling each local user to download an initial model from a server; controlling each local user to randomly select h samples from a sample data set of the target local user, and calculating a gradient by adopting a gradient algorithm of each sample; performing two-norm clipping on the gradient; adding Gaussian mechanism noise to the cut gradient; according to the gradient with noise, adopting a self-adaptive differential privacy algorithm to obtain self-adaptive noise; performing gradient descent training of the local model by using adaptive noise; transmitting the parameters of the local model after gradient descent training to a server; the control server side performs federal average aggregation operation on all the local models after gradient descent training and updates the global model according to federal average aggregation operation results to obtain an updated global model; the control server broadcasts the updated global model to the local models participating in gradient descent training.

title: Supply chain management method based on federal learning
abstract: The invention relates to the technical field of information, in particular to a supply chain management method based on federal learning, which comprises the following steps: establishing a block chain data module; each enterprise respectively establishes a privacy computing node; a plurality of privacy computing nodes form a privacy computing alliance; performing field name correction and privacy intersection among a plurality of alliance nodes to obtain sample data; constructing a feature engineering, obtaining input federal learning features and output features, and establishing a neural network model by adopting a preset neural network model template to obtain a federal learning model; a plurality of alliance nodes jointly train the federal learning model to complete the federal learning, and a trained federal learning model is obtained; the privacy calculation node gives the number of the federal learning model and stores the number; and the privacy calculation node reads the data of the enterprise and inputs the data into the federal learning model to obtain the output of the federal learning as a prediction result. The beneficial technical effects of the invention comprise: the supply chain management efficiency is improved, and the supply chain management cost is reduced.

title: Model training methods, devices and equipment based on differential privacy federated learning
abstract: The embodiment of the invention discloses a model training method, device and equipment based on differential privacy federal learning. The method comprises the following steps: selecting a target client from the client candidate set according to the privacy budget and sample distribution of each client by adopting a biased client sampling strategy, and distributing the latest global model to the target client; carrying out local iteration by using a local data set through a target client to obtain an original model gradient, and adopting a differential privacy mechanism to generate random noise according to the privacy consumption of each iteration to disturb the original model gradient so as to obtain a noisy model gradient; and receiving the noise adding model gradient uploaded by the target client and carrying out aggregation to update the global model. According to the technical scheme provided by the embodiment of the invention, the client sampling strategy in the DPFL is optimized according to the heterogeneous differential privacy among the clients, so that the performance of heterogeneous differential privacy federal learning is improved, and the heterogeneous differential privacy federal learning method can be better applied to intelligent equipment to provide services for users.

title: Abnormal financial account detection method and device based on federal learning privacy protection
abstract: The invention provides an abnormal financial account detection method and device based on federal learning privacy protection, wherein the method comprises the steps of performing feature transformation on data features provided by participating nodes, and extracting data feature input conforming to a detection model for constructing the abnormal financial account; training the CNN model at the participating nodes according to the user characteristic data, and determining model gradient parameters; adding Gaussian noise to the gradient parameters by utilizing differential privacy, uploading the noise-added gradient parameter information to an aggregation node for parameter aggregation, and determining aggregation gradient parameters; distributing the aggregation gradient information to each participating node, fitting the aggregation gradient information to a local model, and performing new training; and identifying the financial account according to the training federal learning CNN abnormal financial account detection model. The invention can improve the accuracy of detecting abnormal financial accounts and the intensity of data privacy protection.

title: A secure and fair federated learning privacy-preserving aggregation system and method
abstract: The invention discloses a safe and fair federal learning privacy protection aggregation system and method, relates to the technical field of federal learning, and solves the problems of low calculation efficiency and unfairness to a few clients in the existing distributed cross-equipment federal learning scheme; the cloud aggregation server is used for identifying and removing malicious models, and updating the global model after aggregating the benign models; the edge computing node is used for realizing anonymization of the model at the communication level; the terminal equipment of the Internet of things is used for carrying out model training on a local data set to obtain local model update and then encrypting and uploading the local model update to a corresponding edge computing node; n training clients develop distributed cross-equipment transverse federation learning with the assistance of M edge computing nodes; the method has higher malicious model detection rate, and maintains aggregation fairness for a few group models, so that the global model can learn knowledge from diversified data, and the quality of the global model is improved.

title: Federal learning method, device, equipment and medium for privacy protection against Bayesian attack
abstract: The invention provides a method, a device, equipment and a medium for protecting federal learning privacy against Bayesian and busy attacks, which adopts a double-server architecture and comprises the following steps: the central server broadcasts an initial global model; the client side locally trains and adopts secret sharing to distribute a local model; the auxiliary server adds differential privacy noise to protect local model privacy; the central server detects the Bayesian client on the noisy local model; the central server and the auxiliary server realize the local model security aggregation of legal clients through security calculation. The invention innovatively provides a method for combining safe multiparty calculation and differential privacy, which effectively reduces the calculation communication overhead of the Federal learning Bayesian client side while protecting the privacy, and improves the safety and algorithm efficiency of the Federal learning.

title: Federal learning privacy protection method and system
abstract: The application provides a federal learning privacy protection method and system, wherein the method comprises the following steps: the server node obtains global model parameters corresponding to the current global training round; the server node randomly selects a preset number of target client nodes from a plurality of target client nodes and transmits global model parameters to the target client nodes; the target client node carries out iterative training on the local model according to the global model parameter, the preset timing period and the preset benign noise to obtain a trained target local model; and the target client node acquires the local model update gradient corresponding to the target local model and sends the local model update gradient to the server node. Therefore, the method and the system can add the prepositive benign noise to the update data uploaded by the target client node, have low input cost and cost, are beneficial to improving the convergence speed of model training, and can not reduce the performance of the final training model.

title: Federated large codeword model deep learning architecture with homomorphic compression and encryption
abstract: A system and method for a federated deep learning platform utilizing homomorphically-compressed and encrypted data. The system comprises multiple client devices, each with a local dataset, and a central server hosting a deep learning core. Client devices convert local data into codewords, which are also homomorphically encrypted. The central server processes these encrypted codewords without decryption, preserving data privacy. The platform supports at least two architectural variants: a conventional Transformer trained on codewords, and a Latent Transformer operating on latent space vectors. Both variants eliminate the need for embedding and positional encoding layers. The system aggregates encrypted model updates from clients, enabling collaborative learning while maintaining data confidentiality. Additional features comprise differential privacy implementation and adaptive federated optimization techniques. This innovative approach allows for efficient, privacy-preserving distributed learning across diverse datasets, addressing key challenges in federated learning such as data heterogeneity, non-IID distributions, and communication efficiency.

title: Medical data sharing and privacy protection method and system based on federal learning
abstract: The invention belongs to the field of data security, and provides a method and a system for sharing medical data and protecting privacy based on federal learning, which can ensure that joint training is carried out under the condition that hospital data does not leave the local; carrying out model training, namely carrying out intermediate gradient encryption and issuing data resources based on a block chain; model intermediate gradient decryption and aggregation are carried out in the SGX-based trusted execution environment through an intelligent contract; the SGX uploads the aggregated new global model to an intelligent contract to judge whether a convergence condition is met or not, so as to determine whether iterative training is continued or not; the intelligent convergence sends the model to a data demand side under the condition that the new global model meets the convergence condition, otherwise, the model continues to be subjected to iterative joint training; the safety protection of the aggregation process is realized while the safety and the privacy safety of medical data of each hospital are ensured, and the privacy is prevented from being revealed in the middle gradient, so that the data sharing is realized efficiently.

title: Longitudinal federal learning method and device for business model
abstract: The embodiment of the specification provides a method and a device for jointly updating a model, and provides a longitudinal federal learning method for a business model, wherein the business model comprises a global model arranged on a service side and local models arranged on training members, the first training member can process first feature data of a plurality of training samples of a current batch through the local first local model to obtain a first intermediate tensor, then perform a clipping operation based on a preset first clipping threshold value on the first intermediate tensor to form a first reduction tensor, and then add a first target noise meeting differential privacy to the first reduction tensor to obtain a first distribution tensor so as to provide the first distribution tensor for the service side, so that the service side processes the first distribution tensor through the global model, and thus trains the global model and the first local model. This way, data privacy can be effectively protected and privacy loss can be controlled.

title: Deep quantization federal learning method for privacy protection
abstract: The invention relates to the technical field of information safety and privacy protection, and in order to replace Gaussian noise which is additionally added in a differential privacy technology with quantization errors and realize privacy protection of a local client, the invention discloses a deep quantization federal learning method facing privacy protection, wherein in the t global iteration process, a client k obtains an update model after training by using local dataTraining the depth quantization network, quantizing the updated model by using the trained depth quantization network, and changing quantization noise distribution to obtain quantized dataIndex value of (2), index valueAfter lossless coding, the data are sent to a server; the server receives and decodes the data to obtainAnd then, carrying out aggregation updating to obtain an updated global model, and issuing the global model to a user for carrying out next iteration of federation learning. The invention is mainly applied to privacy protection communication occasions.

title: Method and apparatus for performing horizontal federated learning
abstract: The present disclosure discloses a method for federated learning, including: requesting, by a target application, a user to provide a federated learning data access right to access privacy data; calling, by the target application, a unified federated learning service (UnifiedFED) application to perform horizontal federated learning, acquiring, by the UnifiedFED application, the privacy data isolated from the target application according to the federated learning data access right, receiving, by the UnifiedFED application, non-privacy data from the target application, and providing, by the UnifiedFED application, the privacy data and the non-privacy data to an artificial intelligence (AI) model for federated learning training.

title: Federated learning classification model training method based on adaptive model perturbation
abstract: The invention provides a federal learning classification model training method based on self-adaptive model disturbance, which comprises the following implementation steps of constructing a federal learning system, acquiring a training sample set by a client, acquiring a global test sample set by a server, initializing a global classification model and a reinforcement learning model, self-adaptively distributing privacy budget for the client by the server, carrying out iterative training on a local classification model by the client, carrying out self-adaptive disturbance on the local classification model by the client, aggregating weight parameters of the local classification model by the server, and acquiring training results of the federal learning classification model by the server. The server adopts a reinforcement learning algorithm, self-adaptively distributes privacy budget for the local classification model according to the stored performance, privacy budget and rewarding information of the local classification model, controls noise added by the local classification model, avoids the influence of overlarge or undersize disturbance degree on the model, and further improves the privacy protection capability and performance of federal learning.

title: Method and device for defending attack of taking and riding in federal study with privacy protection
abstract: The invention discloses a method and a device for defending a pick-up car attack in federal study with privacy protection, wherein a key center generates a public-private key pair, and private keys are divided among a first server, a second server, a first server and clients; the first server encrypts the first initial model by using the public key and carries out partial decryption by using private key segmentation held by the first server to obtain a second initial model, and each client downloads the second initial model and carries out decryption by using the private key segmentation of the second initial model to carry out local model training to obtain respective gradients; the method comprises the steps that a first server and a second server calculate the gradient of a client side and cosine similarity of average gradient according to gradient ciphertext of each client side, corresponding rewards or penalties are carried out on each client side, aggregation is carried out according to the gradient ciphertext, the aggregated gradient ciphertext is obtained, each client side is updated according to the aggregated gradient ciphertext, and in a trap wheel, a trap gradient is constructed to induce a riding attacker to update to an error direction.

title: Block chain-based federal learning privacy protection method
abstract: The invention relates to a block chain-based federal learning privacy protection method, which comprises the following steps: a task publisher generates a public and private key pair, initializes a global model, and publishes a parameter signature related to the federal learning task to a block chain; each participant updates the global model from the block chain, performs local training by using a local data set to obtain a local model, encrypts the local model by using a public key and then sends the encrypted local model to a committee; the committee performs quality detection on the local models, performs global model aggregation on the local models passing the detection and then sends the local models to the task publisher; and the task publisher updates the global model and detects whether the convergence requirement is met, if the convergence requirement is not met, the steps are repeatedly executed until the global model meets the convergence requirement, and the intelligent contract committee and each participant distribute the reward. The invention ensures the confidentiality of the local data set of the user, the enthusiasm of the user for participating in the federal learning task and the fairness of reward distribution.

title: Interactive visualization system for exploring federal learning privacy
abstract: The application relates to an interactive visualization system for exploring federal learning privacy. The system comprises a back-end computing module and a front-end view module; the method comprises the steps that a data owner selects training samples from a front end view module, a rear end computing module trains a local model according to the training samples and a global model, attacks the training process of the local model according to an attack mode, an attack result is displayed in the front end view module, privacy of the local model is protected in a differential privacy mode, a privacy protection strength adjusting interface is displayed in the front end view module, a training sample custom interface is displayed to enable the data owner to select the training samples according to the attack result, information of the training sample custom interface is adjusted according to the data owner, a model forgetting analysis algorithm is called, and the current local training state of the training samples and the accuracy of the model obtained by current training are obtained through analysis and displayed in the front end view module. By adopting the system, the safety interpretability of federal learning can be improved, and the time delay in the interaction process can be optimized.

title: Ciphertext computing device and method for federal learning and privacy computing
abstract: The application relates to a ciphertext computing device and method for federal learning and privacy computing. The device comprises: the Montgomery modular exponentiation operation module comprises a first layer of modular exponentiation calculation module, a second layer of modular exponentiation calculation module and a third layer of modular exponentiation calculation module, wherein the first layer of modular exponentiation calculation module sends one of a plurality of ciphertext plaintext pairs each time and selects one of a plurality of modular exponentiation calculation engines of the first layer of modular exponentiation calculation module according to a polling mode, the selected modular exponentiation calculation engine performs Montgomery operation on a ciphertext in the ciphertext plaintext pair to obtain a Montgomery ciphertext, and performs Montgomery modular exponentiation operation on the plaintext in the Montgomery ciphertext and the ciphertext plaintext in the ciphertext plaintext pair to obtain a Montgomery modular exponentiation operation result, and the Montgomery modular exponentiation operation results generated by the plurality of modular exponentiation calculation engines are integrated to obtain a Montgomery modular exponentiation results of the plurality of ciphertext pairs; the accumulation modular multiplication operation module is used for accumulating modular multiplication operation to obtain accumulation modular multiplication operation results of a plurality of ciphertext plaintext pairs; and a demomontgomery operation module. This improves the computational efficiency.

title: A privacy-preserving ship name recognition model training method using federated learning
abstract: The invention discloses a privacy protection ship name recognition model training method adopting federal learning, which comprises the following steps: s1, initiating a joint training ship name recognition model task; s2, training a local model by the participant and encrypting; s3, aggregating encryption models of participants and executing a federal average algorithm; s4, the aggregation server part decrypts the aggregation model and S5, the participant part decrypts the aggregation model; the method comprises the steps that a participant locally trains a model and encrypts the training model, the locally trained encryption model is uploaded to an aggregation server, and the aggregation server executes a federal average algorithm on the encrypted model; an encryption method is adopted to prevent an attacker from obtaining training data according to model parameters. In addition, the method of dividing the private key into partial private keys is adopted, the server executes partial decryption once, and the participants execute partial decryption once, so that a plurality of participants can effectively train a ship name recognition model together under the condition of not revealing the training data of the participants.

title: A gradient aggregation federated learning method based on zero-knowledge proof and blockchain technology
abstract: The invention relates to a gradient aggregation federation learning method based on combination of zero knowledge proof and a blockchain technology, belonging to the field of distributed machine learning. The limitation of the traditional method in terms of data privacy protection and model verification is broken through by combining zero knowledge proof (zk-SNARK) and an extensible blockchain technology. The method utilizes zero knowledge proof to verify the correctness of the global model, ensures the transparency and data privacy of the aggregation process, simultaneously introduces Chinese remainder theorem to compress the proof, and lightens the storage burden of the blockchain node. The hash value updated by the encryption model is recorded through the block chain, and verification is carried out by relying on the block chain consensus node, so that the data integrity and the system transparency are further improved. In addition, a dynamic client selection mechanism introduced in the method optimizes participants based on training performance scores, so that training efficiency and model quality are improved. Overall, the present invention provides a safe, efficient and transparent distributed learning solution.

title: Bank running water risk assessment method and application system
abstract: The application discloses a bank running water risk assessment method and an application system. The method comprises the steps of obtaining first multi-mode data, wherein the first multi-mode data comprise bank running water, equipment information corresponding to the bank running water, user portraits corresponding to the equipment information, social network relations and geographic positions, inputting the first multi-mode data into a risk scoring model to obtain risk grades corresponding to the first multi-mode data, and carrying out risk monitoring according to the risk grades. By the method, the accuracy and the efficiency of identifying the enterprise fund flow state and the potential risk by the financial institution can be improved.

title: Federal learning privacy protection method based on generation of countermeasure network and knowledge distillation
abstract: The invention discloses a federal learning privacy protection method based on generation of an antagonism network and knowledge distillation, and relates to the technical field of privacy protection. The method comprises the steps of S1, local model training, S2, generation of countermeasure network training, S3, communication in an initialization stage, S4, distillation training, S5, communication in a distillation stage, and S6, updating of a client. According to the invention, the generation countermeasure network is innovatively combined with the knowledge distillation technology, the countermeasure network model is generated by local training at the client, and the synthetic data conforming to private data distribution is generated, so that dependence on a public data set is avoided, knowledge distillation is performed by using the generated synthetic data, knowledge migration without selecting the public data set is realized, direct exposure of private data distribution is effectively avoided, and the risk of privacy leakage is remarkably reduced.

title: Efficient client screening privacy protection federal learning method aiming at data heterogeneous
abstract: The invention relates to techniques such as federal learning, privacy protection, etc., belonging to the technical field of information security, and discloses a federal learning method for screening privacy protection for high-efficiency clients with heterogeneous data, which mainly comprises two parts, namely a data sampling stage and a local training stage, wherein in the data sampling stage, all clients generate gradient similarity matrixes, and clients with high gradient similarity are grouped; and in each group, calculating the contribution value of each client to model training, selecting the client with higher contribution value as a training set, generating personalized privacy budget according to the privacy requirement of the client in a local training stage, and injecting noise into the local model according to the privacy budget so as to realize differential privacy protection of model parameters. The method can screen the client with high data quality, quicken the convergence speed of the model, meet the personalized privacy requirement of the client and provide stronger privacy protection for the data.

title: Federal learning privacy protection method under non-independent same distributed data scene
abstract: The invention belongs to the technical field of privacy protection, and particularly relates to a federal learning privacy protection method in a non-independent and identically distributed data scene. The method combines the federal learning model with the generation of the antagonistic neural network, solves the problem that the federal learning is difficult to train and converge under the non-independent same distribution scene, reduces the communication loss of each terminal in the federal learning framework, and can improve the machine utilization rate and the learning efficiency under the condition that the calculation power of each terminal in the federal is lower. The ViTGAN used by the invention generates false data which is generated by an anti-network and is approximately distributed with real data, can meet the privacy guarantee of local users, accelerates the convergence speed of federal learning, reduces the training communication load, improves the global model and the test precision of the federal learning and training, and simultaneously solves the problem that the federal learning is easy to be attacked by inference.

title: System and methods for privacy preserving cross-site federated learning
abstract: Data samples are transmitted from a central server to at least one local server apparatus. The central server receives a set of predictions from the at least one local server apparatus that are based on the transmitted set of data samples. The central server trains a central model based on the received set of predictions. The central model, or a portion of the central model corresponding to a task of interest, can then be sent to the at least one local server apparatus. Neither local data from local sites nor trained models from the local sites are transmitted to the central server. This ensures protection and security of data at the local sites.

title: Method and system for improving privacy security of federated learning
abstract: The invention provides a method and a system for improving federal learning privacy security, wherein the method comprises the following steps: the consensus node receives gradient ciphertext obtained based on local medical data training sent by each medical institution; verifying and aggregating the received gradient ciphertext of each medical institution to generate an update model; the update model is uploaded to the blockchain network. By utilizing the scheme of the invention, the safety of medical data can be ensured, the safety modeling can be realized without coordination of a trusted central server, and the problem of low training efficiency caused by attack or paralysis of the central server is avoided. Meanwhile, the full life cycle protection of the model can be realized.

title: Privacy protection federal learning method for resisting back door attack
abstract: The invention discloses a privacy protection federal learning method for resisting back door attack, which relates to the field of artificial intelligence and comprises the following steps: s1, training a participant set to acquire public parameters issued by a public key generation server, and synchronously acquiring an initialized global model issued by an aggregation server; s2, uploading the gradient updating content after the local training to an aggregation server by the training participants; s3, the aggregation server carries out security aggregation on the global model; s4, executing symbol discrimination operation and judging the firstWhether each training participant in the round aggregation set is a malicious participant or not, marking the malicious participant, and not using the malicious participant in the subsequent training stage; s5, circulating the steps S2 to S4 until the global model is trained to meet the preset target precision or reach the preset upper limit of the training round, and ending the global model training task; the privacy protection federal learning method inhibits the poisoning of the back door attack on the global model.

title: A privacy-preserving method for federated learning based on Cutmix data enhancement
abstract: The application discloses a federal learning privacy protection method based on Cutmix data enhancement, which is applied to a scene for privacy protection of a hospital image data center. Before the federal training starts, a central server of the hospital data center determines a deep learning model as a model trained by each client; after the federal training starts, the central server will issue the model to each client; in order to prevent the non-information pixels from being present in the image in the training process, the application adopts the Cutmix-based data enhancement method when protecting the original data, and utilizes the advantages of the data enhancement strategy in the aspect of image generation, so that the training model learns more robust features, and the generalization capability of the model is effectively improved. The application aims at defending gradient inversion attack in federal learning, enhances the constraint on the gradient inversion attack process, and provides a defending scene safer for federal learning. The method can defend the most advanced attack under the condition of a small amount of data utility loss.

title: Secret addition computing device and system for federal learning and privacy computing
abstract: The application relates to a secret state addition computing device and system for federal learning and privacy computing. The computing device includes: and the at least one layer of Montgomery domain modular multiplication operation module is configured to perform Montgomery operation and Montgomery domain modular multiplication operation on a plurality of ciphertexts in the same batch and output Montgomery domain modular multiplication operation results of the plurality of ciphertexts. The at least one layer of Montgomery domain modular multiplication operation module comprises a first layer of Montgomery domain modular multiplication operation module which comprises a plurality of parallel modular multiplication calculation engines and a first layer of data distribution module connected with the first layer of Montgomery domain modular multiplication operation module. The first layer data distribution module is configured to transmit one of the ciphertexts at a time and select one of the modular multiplication calculation engines to receive the transmitted ciphertexts in a polling mode, and is further configured to generate a batch completion signal after all the ciphertexts are transmitted and transmit the batch completion signal to each of the modular multiplication calculation engines. Therefore, the resource utilization efficiency and the parallel computing speed are improved.

title: A local differential privacy federated learning method based on homomorphic encryption
abstract: The invention relates to a local differential privacy federal learning method based on homomorphic encryption, and aims to solve the problem of privacy disclosure in traditional federal learning. The invention firstly uses the average parameter clipping strategy to reduce the parameter quantity which needs to be transmitted by the client after each round of training, and effectively reduces the data quantity transmitted by clipping the parameter which is lower than the average value. And then, randomly executing noise adding or encryption operation on the cut parameters by adopting a random selection strategy so as to ensure the parameter safety in the aggregation process, and simultaneously solving the problem that the traditional differential privacy and homomorphic encryption method is insufficient in data utility and calculation overhead. Experimental results show that the method provided by the invention has good robustness under different privacy requirements, and compared with the existing method, the encryption and decryption efficiency is obviously improved, and meanwhile, the method also has strong privacy protection capability of resisting gradient leakage attack.

title: Federal learning bidirectional verifiable privacy protection method and system in vector space
abstract: The invention discloses a federal learning bidirectional verifiable privacy protection method and a system in vector space, wherein a trusted third party D publishes public parameters; the user performs local training to obtain gradient vectors, performs commitment after blinding the gradient vectors, and uploads the gradient vectors to an aggregation server AS; then AS verifies the correctness of the gradient ciphertext vector, an aggregation result vector is obtained after aggregation, the AS uses the gradient ciphertext vector AS a solution to construct an equation set, and each equation is used AS a subkey; then AS sends each subkey and promise to corresponding user; the user verifies the validity of the subkeys and cooperatively solves the aggregation result; and finally, the user verifies whether the finally obtained aggregation result is correct. The invention not only can solve the confidentiality and integrity problems of information in the federal learning and training process, but also can resist member reasoning attack, collusion attack, man-in-the-middle attack and the like, and simultaneously solves the problem of user disconnection in the recovery stage of the aggregation result, reduces calculation cost and improves model precision.

title: A method for data privacy protection based on explainable federated learning
abstract: The invention discloses a method for protecting privacy of federal learning data based on interpretability, the method combines the essential characteristics of the privacy attribute with the interpretability, thereby protecting the privacy attribute pertinently. Firstly, performing attribute dissociation on local data of a federal learning client by using an unerritation technology in interpretability, judging whether the attribute belongs to a specific attribute of the client, namely a privacy attribute by using a designed modified structure based on a condition countermeasure network, an embedded attacker and a Mutual Information (MI) index, performing targeted privacy protection, performing averaging processing and noise processing on the privacy attribute, performing data reconstruction on the processed privacy attribute and a common attribute together input designed coding and decoding structure, and performing a federal learning training process on the processed data. The method and the device can effectively improve the performance of the federation learning model under the privacy protection scene, and can not excessively increase the communication cost and the calculation cost of federation learning.

title: Method and system for variable on-demand privacy- preserving federated learning using multiparty computation
abstract: A privacy-preserving federated learning computational system and a server operating in a federated learning system having a plurality of clients and a plurality of organizations are provided. The federated learning system includes a plurality of clients, a plurality of organizations and a multi-nodal, multi-party computational server (nMPC server) for coupling ones of the plurality of clients to ones of the plurality of organizations. Each of the clients includes an edge device and each of the organizations includes a data silo. The nMPC server includes a plurality of nodes and each organization is coupled to only one of the plurality of nodes. The nMPC server is configured to provide secure multi-party computation in an aggregated modular federated learning model for the plurality of clients and the plurality of organizations by synchronous training of a global distribution of selectors on cloud platforms. The nMPC server is also configured to switch the aggregated modular federated learning model for the plurality of clients and the plurality of organizations between vertical federated learning of datasets with different feature spaces and horizontal federated learning of datasets with a same feature space.

title: User data privacy protection method and system based on federal learning
abstract: According to the user data privacy protection method and system based on federal learning, vehicle-mounted data are collected firstly, the vehicle-mounted data are divided into three types according to data ownership, sensitivity and conflict degree, and for two-type vehicle-mounted data and three-type vehicle-mounted data, a safe encryption mode is adopted to transmit the vehicle-mounted data to a cloud or a third party monitoring end, and the cloud can completely acquire original data information collected by the vehicle-mounted data through an encryption channel; for one type of vehicle-mounted data, the data is only stored locally at the vehicle-mounted by combining a localization safety storage technology of a trusted execution environment; the vehicle terminal utilizes the stored vehicle terminal model through the federal learning computing framework, combines one type of vehicle terminal data to perform model training, and submits the trained vehicle terminal model to the cloud; the cloud terminal aggregates the trained vehicle-mounted model received by the cloud terminal with a cloud terminal model, and the cloud terminal carries out big data operation on the aggregated model. The method does not need to share the whole original data set, and privacy disclosure is avoided.

title: Privacy-preserving verifiable federated learning method based on dual-server architecture
abstract: A privacy protection verifiable federal learning method based on a double-server architecture belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence. Comprising the following steps: the system comprises a key generation center, a client, an aggregation server and an auxiliary server; the invention compresses the gradient by adopting the China remainder theorem CRT, and encrypts the local gradient by using the Paillier homomorphic encryption algorithm; meanwhile, in order to prevent a single server from being attacked and trapped AS a malicious server and further threaten data security, the method distributes the calculation process of the aggregation gradient and the aggregation hash label to two different servers of the aggregation server AS and the auxiliary server SS respectively. The method and the system help the client to verify the correctness of the AS aggregation result of the aggregation server by the hash label aggregated by the auxiliary server SS, and provide effective guarantee for the accuracy of the federal learning training model.

title: Federal learning privacy protection method and system
abstract: The invention provides a federal learning privacy protection method and a federal learning privacy protection system, wherein the method comprises the following steps: the central server receives gradient ciphertext based on homomorphic encryption sent by each participant; aggregating and decrypting the received gradient ciphertext of each participant to obtain aggregated gradient information; carrying out digital signature on the aggregation gradient information to obtain a signature group; transmitting the signature group to the consensus node; and the consensus node performs consensus verification on the signature information in the signature group, and uploads the aggregation gradient information in the signature group to the blockchain network after the verification is passed. By utilizing the scheme of the invention, the security of private data of each participant can be effectively protected, the calculation expense of the participant is reduced, and the full life cycle maintenance of model data is realized.

title: Federal learning privacy protection method, system and medium in meta universe based on excitation mechanism
abstract: The invention discloses a federal learning privacy protection method, a federal learning privacy protection system and a federal learning privacy protection medium in the meta-universe based on an incentive mechanism, which comprise the following steps: according to a training data set containing local data of the sensor of the Internet of things, training a federal learning model under preset conditions; observing local data of the sensor of the Internet of things in a non-invasive mode, and further analyzing the real-time privacy risk level of the sensor of the Internet of things to generate a privacy assessment index; dynamically adjusting the disturbance rate according to privacy assessment indexes and an excitation strategy; according to the disturbance rate, relevant disturbance is carried out on the training data set, and then the disturbed training data set is put into the federal learning model training of the next round; and (5) performing cyclic training until the training of the federal learning model reaches a preset training condition. The federal learning privacy protection method in the meta universe based on the incentive mechanism can perform self-adaptive identification and defense on risks, and encourages the system to participate in nodes by combining with the incentive mechanism so as to self-adaptively adjust the privacy risk protection effect.

title: Privacy protection distributed machine learning training method aiming at medical image classification
abstract: The invention provides a privacy protection distributed machine learning training method aiming at medical image classification, which comprises the following steps: establishing a federal learning network for analyzing a medical image dataset, the network comprising a central service node and a plurality of working nodes; performing distributed machine learning training of a federal learning network by using the medical image data set to obtain gradient data; in the distributed training process, randomly cutting off the connection of neurons in a network; each working node sends gradient data as intermediate information to a central server node for aggregation and global model parameter updating iteration, and the updated global model parameters are returned to each node for updating iteration of a node local model; and obtaining the federal learning network after realizing multiple rounds of updating iteration, and realizing distributed machine learning training. The method aims to improve the privacy protection effect of medical image analysis while maintaining the performance of the model.

title: Privacy protection federal learning method for reliably handling abnormal users
abstract: The invention relates to a privacy protection federal learning method for reliably processing abnormal users, and belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligent neural network training privacy protection. The method is oriented to an artificial intelligence application scene, utilizes homomorphic encryption technology, utilizes homomorphic encryption-based user reliability identification and reliability-based privacy protection gradient aggregation under a single cloud server model, supports the artificial intelligence application scene oriented on the basis of not revealing user data privacy and reliability privacy, and can efficiently and accurately train a federal learning neural network model to protect the user data privacy and the reliability privacy. Compared with the prior art, the method has remarkable advantages in the aspects of privacy protection degree, communication overhead, model accuracy, training efficiency and the like.

title: Efficient hidden trace query method based on hash PSI in federal learning
abstract: The application relates to a high-efficiency hidden trace query method based on hash PSI in federal learning, wherein federal learning participants are A and B, and a semi-honest third party C, A, B respectively possess a privacy data set, and the A party and the B party use the hash PSI based on the semi-honest third party to carry out privacy intersection; the method comprises the steps that A and B carry out secret sharing to obtain a shared secret ss, ss is used as a hash salt value, hash values of respective privacy data sets are obtained, and the hash values are respectively sent to C; c, calculating a hash index set of the privacy intersection I and sending the hash index set to A; b, generating a database DB to be queried; b, adding secret sharing to the database DB to be queried to obtainDb=share+share 2, and send share1 to a, share2 to C; screening share1 by using the Hash index set IntHash of the I to obtain a share; screening share2 by using the hash index set IntHash of the I to obtain share22, and returning to the A; a calculating share+share 22 to obtain data DB corresponding to privacy intersection I to be queried I Is carried out by a method comprising the steps of. The application improves the efficiency and the safety of the trace inquiry in federal learning.

title: A privacy protection method for federated learning based on client grouping
abstract: The invention discloses a federal learning privacy protection method based on client grouping, which relates to the technical field of data security, and provides privacy protection of different levels for different clients under the environment that client data are not independently and uniformly distributed, and a central server groups clients with similar data distribution based on Jensen-Shannon divergence; the method comprises the steps of determining privacy protection levels among different groups by quantifying the balance degree of a local data set of a client through a balance data set, adding interference noise with a specific level into model updating of the client in the group, and then carrying out intra-group aggregation, and carrying out inter-group global aggregation to obtain a global model.

title: Robust federal learning privacy protection system based on block chain
abstract: The invention relates to a robust federal learning privacy protection system based on a blockchain. By adding extra small communication overhead, the gradient on the blockchain realizes privacy protection in a plaintext state, the influence on the model performance is theoretically lower than differential privacy, and the existing robustness aggregation algorithm can be expanded to defend against attacks of malicious clients. Three aggregation algorithms of Krum, sim and TD are modified, a new aggregation algorithm SD is provided, and the four aggregation methods are applied to the system. The scheme provided by the invention has the privacy protection capability capable of being dynamically adjusted, the influence on the model performance is lower than that of differential privacy, the robustness to malicious attacks is provided, and when the privacy protection is considered, the modified three Bayesian aggregation methods have higher performance than the original ones; the SD aggregation algorithm has excellent aggregation capacity on a full connection model, a convolution network model and a VIT model, and realizes more fair and reasonable reward and punishment distribution on a blockchain reward distribution mechanism.

title: Distributed unmanned ship model training data privacy protection method based on split federal learning
abstract: The invention discloses a privacy protection method for distributed unmanned ship model training data, which comprises the following steps: s1, initializing a system, sending a synchronization signal to each unmanned ship and a server, and initializing a global splitting model of an unmanned ship end and a splitting model of a server end; s2, the unmanned ship uses a local splitting model to conduct forward propagation training on self data, sends the obtained characteristic data to a relay layer to be encrypted and forwards the encrypted characteristic data to a server; s3, the server side uses the split model of the server side to conduct forward training on received data characteristics, calculates loss gradients, conducts backward propagation to update the split model of the server side, and then forwards the gradients to the corresponding unmanned ship through the relay layer; s4, continuously finishing the training of the local splitting model by using the loss of the service end of the unmanned ship; s5, the global splitting model of the unmanned ship end is updated on average by using the federation, and the global splitting model is forwarded to each unmanned ship through the relay layer and used for updating the local splitting model; and S6, training the splitting model of the unmanned boat end and the splitting model of the server end to be convergent. The invention realizes the privacy protection of split federal learning on the multi-end training model training data, realizes the invisibility of multi-end data, and can realize lower computation complexity and lower data storage overhead at multiple ends. Is superior to current methods in many respects.

title: A federated learning method and system based on local differential privacy noise control
abstract: The invention provides a federal learning method and a federal learning system based on local differential privacy noise control, wherein the method comprises the steps that a client uses the difference between a local model and a global model as a constraint factor to update the local model; the method comprises the steps of calculating disturbance adding values based on updated local model parameters and global model parameters by adopting mutual information, adding the disturbance adding values to the parameters of the updated local model, sending the disturbance added local model parameters to a central server, aggregating the received disturbance added local model parameters by the central server, reconstructing the model according to aggregated data to obtain a global model trained in the round, and sending the global model to each client. The distance between the local model and the global model is used as a constraint factor to train the local model, and disturbance to be added is calculated by utilizing mutual information, so that the performance of federal learning global model training is ensured while the local privacy of the client is protected.

title: TEE federal learning privacy protection method based on proxy re-encryption
abstract: The invention discloses a TEE federal learning privacy protection method based on proxy re-encryption, and belongs to the field of public key cryptosystems. The method comprises the following steps: (1) establishing a proxy re-encryption communication; (2) the server issues federal policies; (3) The participant performs local learning to obtain gradient parameters, encrypts the gradient parameters and sends the gradient parameters to the proxy; (4) The agent side carries out re-encryption operation on the message and sends the message to the server side; (5) the server side decrypts the message; (6) The server side aggregates the gradient parameters and encrypts and sends the gradient parameters to the proxy side; (7) The agent performs re-encryption operation on the message and sends the message to the participant; (8) The participant decrypts the message to obtain gradient parameters and continues model training; (9) repeating (3) - (8) until federal learning converges. The proxy re-encryption scheme used in the transmission process belongs to an NTRU grid public key cryptosystem, and meets the requirements of quantum security resistance and collusion resistance; the computation at the endpoint is done in the TEE to secure the privacy of the endpoint.

title: Video scene identification method based on federal learning privacy protection of block chain
abstract: The application provides a federation learning privacy protection video scene identification method based on a blockchain, which belongs to the field of blockchains and comprises the following steps: the task publisher builds a trusted blockchain network in which all participating nodes need to register. In the pre-training stage, the node carries out training of local data according to the initial network model; and evaluating the nodes, constructing a self-adaptive hierarchical blockchain network, realizing rapid aggregation of node parameters through the hierarchical blockchain network, and accelerating the training process. In the reasoning stage of the model, the block chain network is multiplexed, a 3PC secure multiparty computing cluster is constructed through a verifiable random function, and video scene recognition is realized on the premise of not exposing private video data and the model through a secret sharing technology. The method and the device solve the problem of privacy disclosure in video scene recognition and improve the usability of data.

title: Privacy protection cold continuous rolling force prediction method based on deep belief network and federal learning
abstract: The invention discloses a privacy protection cold continuous rolling force prediction method based on deep belief network and federal learning. And then, an improved deep belief network rolling force prediction model is constructed, unsupervised pre-training is carried out by utilizing a leakage-ReLU RBM and an adaptive learning rate weighting contrast divergence algorithm, a PLSR layer is arranged at the top of the deep belief network, and reverse fine tuning is carried out to minimize the loss between a feature set and a tag set. Finally, under the federation learning framework, a client selection mechanism and a federation weighting aggregation mechanism are designed, a model training loss value uploaded by a local client and a local client which is u% before the cosine distance from the global model is selected are used for server aggregation, and a dynamic gradient clipping localization differential privacy function of the local client is realized by calculating the p percentile of the historical gradient L2 norm of the local client in each iteration as a clipping threshold of the current iteration.

title: Asynchronous federated learning method and system with adaptive differential privacy adjustment
abstract: The invention relates to the technical field of federal learning privacy protection, in particular to an asynchronous federal learning method and system for self-adaptive differential privacy regulation, which are based on the self-adaptive differential privacy noise variance of asynchronous federal learning convergence and an actual gradient observation value, a central server reduces the noise variance according to stages, and the ratio of the noise variance to the gradient clipping size is set as a constant value so as to ensure that the utility of a final model is improved on the premise of providing the same differential privacy protection degree; meanwhile, the participating users cut the gradients corresponding to each sample on the minimum batch one by one, and average and disturb the cut gradients so as to ensure that the privacy of the training samples cannot be revealed by the single sample. The invention ensures that the utility of privacy protection and models is improved by reducing the total introduced noise amount on the premise of not changing the privacy protection degree, and is convenient for deployment and implementation in practical application.

title: Federal learning global model parameter acquisition method and system and electronic equipment
abstract: The application provides a method, a system and electronic equipment for acquiring federal learning global model parameters, wherein the method comprises the following steps: the first electronic equipment encrypts local model parameters participating in federal learning through an encryption key to obtain encrypted local model parameters; splitting the encryption key to obtain a plurality of sub-keys the same as the first electronic devices in the first electronic device group, taking one of the sub-keys as a first sub-key, and sending other sub-keys as second sub-keys to other first electronic devices; receiving the sent second sub-key, and carrying out aggregation treatment on the first sub-key and the second sub-key to obtain a first aggregation key; transmitting the encrypted local model parameter and the first aggregation key to the second electronic device; the second electronic equipment obtains the global model parameters according to the received encrypted local model parameters and the first aggregation key, and accuracy and safety of the obtained global model parameters are improved.

title: Federal learning privacy protection method based on data enhancement
abstract: The invention relates to a federal learning privacy protection method based on data enhancement, which is based on local natural data sets of all clients, introduces a virtual data set for all target clients, and then builds an additional data set of each target client by applying a design data enhancement technology and a privacy protection technology according to the local natural data sets and corresponding local virtual data sets of all target clients respectively, so as to realize the training acquisition of the local model of each target client, and further iteratively acquire a trained target global model under the federal learning technology; the diversity of the target client data sets is increased in the design, the interference of noise data is restrained, the generalization capability and the robustness of the federal learning model are improved, the data among different target clients are more homogeneous by sharing the virtual data sets which do not contain the private information of the clients, the private data of the local target clients are not needed to be shared, and the privacy of the original real data of the target clients is protected.

title: Medical image classification method based on privacy protection
abstract: The invention discloses a medical image classification method based on privacy protection, which comprises the steps of obtaining medical images to be classified; respectively constructing a local model and a global model for classifying medical images at a client and a server, introducing differential privacy noise into uploaded local model parameters at the client through output disturbance to acquire local model gradient information introduced with the differential privacy noise, and aggregating the local model gradient information of different clients at the server to update the global model parameters so as to realize federal learning training based on the differential privacy; and classifying the medical images to be classified by utilizing the local model trained by the client. According to the invention, the differential privacy noise is added to the uploaded model in the form of output disturbance at the client, so that the data privacy is effectively protected and the inference attack is resisted.

title: Federal learning privacy policy selection method based on game theory
abstract: The invention discloses a federal learning privacy policy selection method based on game theory, which comprises the following steps: the server provides thresholds with different service costs for the participants, the participants select the optimal threshold according to whether the thresholds meet the service quality, the privacy disclosure cost and the like, and the server updates the service cost in the next iterative training; the server obtains optimal model parameters through multiple iterations, so that a long-term stable service state of the model is maintained, and the model is provided for the participants. The method effectively avoids malicious behaviors such as taking a car and the like of the participants, so that the server can obtain service cost to the maximum extent, and the participants can obtain long-term high-quality service.

title: Federal learning privacy protection method based on improved group signature
