abstract: The invention belongs to the field of information security, and particularly relates to a federal learning privacy protection method based on improved group signature, which comprises the steps that a client encrypts data according to a secret key distributed by a server, signs the secret key distributed by the server, and then uploads the secret key to the server; after receiving the data uploaded by each client, the server aggregates the received data into a signature through an aggregation signature algorithm, and verifies the legality of the client through the signature; if the model copy is legal, the server updates the global parameters according to the data, and adds a conditional loss function to the model copy distributed for each client after the global parameters are updated, wherein the conditional loss functions of each client are different; if the signature is illegal, inputting the signature into a model trained by the client according to the key sample, outputting a label set according to the key sample by the model, and determining the number of the suspicious client according to the deviation between the label set and the original label set; the invention further reduces the calculation cost in the federal learning by the aggregated signature technology, and introduces a conditional loss function module, so that the distributed federal learning model has traceability as well.

title: Federal learning privacy protection method for intelligent inspection of pumped storage power station
abstract: The invention provides a federal learning privacy protection method for intelligent inspection of a pumped storage power station, which comprises the following steps: s1: the model parameters obtained by the local training of the equipment participating in federal learning are compressed by using a parameter compression method based on threshold adaptation, and equipment communicating with a server is selected; s2: the local model parameter increment uploaded by the equipment communicating with the server in the step S1 is encrypted by using an encryption method based on a multi-key RNS-CKS, and then uploaded to the server; s3: the server aggregates the ciphertext of the local model parameter increment uploaded by the equipment in the step S2 to obtain a ciphertext of the global model parameter increment, and decrypts the ciphertext by combining the online equipment by using a decryption method based on secret sharing to obtain the global model parameter increment, and transmits the global model parameter increment back to the equipment; s4: and (3) the equipment recovers the global model parameters by utilizing the global model parameter increment in the step (S3) and performs iterative learning of the next round. The invention combines the full homomorphic encryption technology with federal study, solves the problems of insufficient intelligence of various Internet of things terminal devices and privacy leakage of inspection data in the intelligent inspection system of the pumped storage power station in the prior art, and simultaneously solves the problem of high system overhead caused by applying the full homomorphic encryption method to federal study.

title: A Method of Federated Learning in Image Classification
abstract: With the rapid improvement in computer science technology, digital information including text, image, audio and video are transferred via the Internet. Therefore, it is inevitable for some illegal users to purloin people' s privacy. Since increasing attention has been paid to image processing and privacy protection, this research will focus on image classification based on federated learning including three key techniques, namely federated learning, privacy protection, and image classification technology. 1 Videv acquisition [Facrerksics10++) Blldrwgfaceimage database Data Iriitializirg network Adjustirig No Trairiirg withdata Exarnirg alidsetaccuracyI Rech requirernrt. yes Predictiorof testset Figure 3

title: Federated large model adaptive learning system
abstract: The present invention provides a federated large model adaptive learning system. Based on the combination of multiobjective optimization and incremental learning, multiple optimization indexes are constructed, and adaptive mini model incremental learning is designed. A gradient scaling method of mini models is proposed for data privacy protection under federated learning, to make full use of gradient information. A correlation between the generalization ability and sampling data is revealed to propose a generalization ability evaluation function. With respect to the real problems of performance degradation and fault faced by industrial equipment during operation, multiple optimization objectives are designed in combination with the generalization ability evaluation function, and the models are updated and repaired adaptively through multiobjective evolutionary learning, to improve the usability of large models in real industrial scenarios. Finally, the adaptive accurate update of the large models and mini models is realized to improve the generalization ability of the models.

title: Methods and mechanisms for confidential and privacy-preserving multi-stakeholder machine learning
abstract: Described is a computing apparatus (900) for confidential multi-stakeholder machine learning, the computing apparatus (900) being configured to: obtain a trained machine learning model (302), the trained machine learning model (302) obtained through performing machine learning code trained on input training data (301); evaluate the trained machine learning model (302) to establish a privacy leak level of the input training data (301); and in dependence on the privacy leak level of the input training data (301) being below a privacy leak level threshold, output the trained machine learning model (302). In this way, the trained machine learning model is only outputted if the privacy leak level is below the privacy leak level threshold, which may preserve confidentiality and privacy.

title: Distributed multi-task learning privacy protection method and system against reasoning attack
abstract: The distributed multi-task learning privacy protection method and system for resisting inference attack perform model training based on local data through each task node and realize combined model training in a knowledge sharing mode; the invention provides a privacy protection model training mechanism based on homomorphic cryptography, so that a task node realizes multi-task learning model training on the premise of ensuring the privacy of training data, the model training efficiency is independent of the sample data amount, and the machine learning model training efficiency is improved; a model issuing method based on differential privacy is designed, and identity inference attacks initiated by model users when accessing a machine learning model can be resisted. The system comprises a key generation center, a central server, task nodes and model users. The method and the device can ensure the data privacy of the task nodes in the model training process and after the model is released, and promote the large-scale application of multi-task machine learning.

title: Terminal-side privacy risk assessment method and device, medium and electronic equipment
abstract: The disclosure relates to a privacy risk assessment method and device at a terminal side, a storage medium and electronic equipment, and relates to the technical field of federal machine learning, wherein the method comprises the following steps: acquiring initial environment data of the terminal in the federal machine learning, analyzing the initial environment data to generate a privacy risk list, and respectively analyzing the risk of revealing the privacy data of the terminal user and the privacy preference of the terminal user according to the privacy risk list to obtain a first analysis result and a second analysis result; and calculating the privacy risk level of the terminal user according to the first analysis result and the second analysis result. The security of the private data of the terminal user is improved.

title: An efficient federated learning aggregation method and device with robustness, verifiability and privacy
abstract: The invention provides a high-efficiency federal learning aggregation method and device with robustness, verifiability and privacy, and belongs to the field of distributed deep learning safety. The method comprises the specific steps that a trusted authority sends verification preparation information to a client, the client calculates auxiliary information in a local training model and shares the auxiliary information to a double server, the double server converts Boolean sharing into lossless gradient arithmetic sharing under a gradient lossless differential privacy enhancement algorithm, meanwhile client-level differential privacy is added, the double server executes PCA (principal component PCA) descent and DP tolerance clustering, the double server aggregates gradients and sends global update information to the client, the client finishes lightweight enhancement verification information transmission and uses the received information to verify aggregation integrity, strong verifiability is ensured, and if verification is passed, the method returns to the second step, and continues the next round of training until the model converges or a preset training round is reached.

title: Device and method for federated learning ciphertext operation
abstract: The application relates to a ciphertext operation device for federal learning in data processing and privacy protection technologies. The device comprises: the modular exponentiation modular multiplication multiplexing calculation module comprises at least one modular exponentiation modular multiplication multiplexing calculation engine, and is configured to switch between a modular exponentiation mode and a modular multiplication mode; and the management module is used for controlling the modular exponentiation modular multiplication multiplexing calculation module to finish ciphertext multiplication operation in the modular exponentiation operation mode and controlling the modular exponentiation modular multiplication multiplexing calculation module to finish ciphertext addition operation in the modular exponentiation operation mode. The modular multiplication computing unit is called for carrying out modular multiplication computation for multiple times under the modular exponentiation mode and the modular multiplication mode so as to complete the ciphertext multiplication operation and the ciphertext addition operation.

title: A privacy-preserving federated learning secure aggregation method for medical data
abstract: The invention belongs to the technical field of data privacy protection, and discloses a federal learning security aggregation method for privacy protection of medical data. Firstly, a medical institution uses a randomly generated secret to disturb model parameters before uploading medical data of the medical institution, then uses a secret sharing mechanism to share the secret, solves the problem of disconnection caused by heterogeneity of the medical institution in federal study, secondly adopts homomorphic encryption technology to encrypt secret fragments received by the medical institution from other medical institutions, ensures data security, finally generates homomorphic encryption related parameters through a decryption server and decrypts the encrypted secret fragments uploaded by each medical institution, ensures model parameters which cannot be decrypted by an aggregation server, and solves the problem that a malicious server may snoop private data. The method realizes the safe aggregation in the multi-key environment facing the medical data and effectively resists the user privacy disclosure and the malicious server problem in the federal learning aggregation process.

title: A data prediction method and system based on vertical federated learning
abstract: The data prediction method and device based on longitudinal federal learning comprise the steps that a client obtains original features of training samples, the client inputs the original features into a constructed bottom model and carries out randomization processing to obtain randomized feature embedded vectors, a server uses the randomized feature embedded vectors to train the constructed top model to obtain corresponding loss gradients so as to update the top model, the client updates the loss gradients to obtain a target bottom model, when a request to be detected exists, the client inputs the original features to be detected of the data to be detected into the target bottom model and carries out randomization processing to obtain the randomized feature embedded vectors to be detected, and the server inputs the randomized feature embedded vectors to be detected into the top model to obtain a prediction result. Therefore, the data security and the data privacy in the training process and the prediction process of longitudinal federal learning are improved.

title: Privacy-preserving method for vertical federated learning of secure shuffled gradient boosting decision trees
abstract: The invention discloses a longitudinal federal learning privacy protection method for a safe shuffling gradient lifting decision tree, which reduces the privacy budget of longitudinal federal learning based on safe shuffling, improves the privacy while guaranteeing the usability of a model, and realizes better balance of the usability and the privacy of the model. The system comprises: the user trains the gradient lifting decision tree model by using the local data and sends the gradient of the decision tree model parameters to the shuffling device; the shuffler receives the gradients uploaded by each user, shuffles the gradients, and sends the shuffled gradients to the server; and the server receives the shuffled gradients and aggregates the gradients to obtain a global model. The shuffling device receives gradient data disturbed by the differential privacy, gradients received by the server are encrypted by the differential privacy disturbance, one-to-one correspondence between users and gradients of the users is weakened by the shuffling device, the privacy of the users is further guaranteed, in addition, the shuffling device only needs to perform simple operation, the system overhead is low, and the system operation efficiency is high.

title: Adaptive privacy-preserving method and device for heterogeneous federated learning based on momentum optimization
abstract: The invention belongs to the technical field of federal learning privacy protection, and particularly relates to a heterogeneous federal learning self-adaptive privacy protection method and device based on momentum optimization. The method comprises the steps of receiving characteristic extractor parameters broadcasted by a central server, calculating local gradients of current iteration rounds based on a local data set, introducing a momentum mechanism into local gradient updating for a classifier part, applying a gradient descent algorithm, updating local model parameters by using the calculated local gradients, calculating Fisher information matrixes for the characteristic extractor part, carrying out normalization processing on Fisher information of each layer, screening strategies, carrying out differential privacy processing, uploading to the central server for parameter aggregation, and broadcasting updated global model parameters back to each local client for next round of training. The method solves the problems of slow model convergence and poor privacy protection effect caused by negative influence of a differential privacy mechanism on model training.

title: A privacy budget customization method for federated learning towards differential privacy
abstract: The invention discloses a differential privacy oriented federal learning privacy budget customizing method, which belongs to the technical field of federal learning and privacy protection and comprises the following steps of S1, initializing a global model by a server side to obtain an initial local model, running a DQN model by the server side, obtaining privacy budgets customized for each client side and distributing the privacy budgets to each client side, S2, local model training, S3, customizing differential privacy and adding noise, S4, uploading disturbance models, S5, global model aggregation, carrying out global model aggregation after the server side receives the disturbance models uploaded by the client side, S6, global model distribution and updating, and then repeating the steps until a proper model is obtained. The federal learning privacy budget customizing method for the differential privacy is adopted, so that the precision of a federal learning model is improved while the privacy safety is ensured.

title: A privacy-preserving method for federated meta-learning based on dataset compression
abstract: The invention belongs to the technical field of image data processing, and particularly relates to a federal element learning privacy protection method based on data set compression. The method comprises the steps of initializing a small synthetic data set by each client to replace an original data set of the client, randomly initializing each synthetic data set and corresponding learning rate, inputting initial local model parameters to train to obtain new local model parameters, optimizing the synthetic data sets and the corresponding learning rates, performing iterative optimization to obtain a final synthetic data set and a final learning rate, obtaining a real gradient by federal element learning based on the final synthetic data set and the final learning rate, optimizing the virtual data set and the virtual gradient by DLG attack embedded in federal element learning, and adding noise to image data in the final synthetic data set. The invention solves the problem that DLG attack has higher success rate in federal element learning to guess batch size and attack so as to cause privacy disclosure.

title: A method for reconstructing private image data using federated learning based on generative model
abstract: The invention discloses a federal learning privacy image data reconstruction method based on a generation model, and relates to the technical field of federal learning privacy safety. The method comprises the steps of firstly, generating an countermeasure network by pre-training as a basic model, and generating virtual data matched with a target gradient by optimizing a potential space and an intermediate characteristic domain of the countermeasure network. Secondly, in the generation process, gradient matching loss and image fidelity loss are calculated and minimized, so that the generated result is ensured to be in line with gradient information, and visual authenticity is maintained. And finally, selecting an image with the optimal gradient matching degree from the plurality of candidate images as a final reconstruction result. The invention adopts a double optimization mechanism, and the method can adapt to the data outside the distribution, and can effectively improve the reconstruction quality even facing the novel data which does not appear in the training set. The method has wide application value in the scenes of privacy protection, data security analysis and the like.

title: Federal learning privacy protection system and method based on blockchain committee
abstract: The invention relates to a federal learning privacy protection system and method based on a blockchain non-committee, which utilizes a consensus mechanism and an intelligent contract of a blockchain to derive a series of communication keys from a task issuing party, simplifies a task coordinator, issues task demands through the blockchain intelligent contract, and a participant receives an initial model, initial parameters and derived communication keys to train and learn local model parameters to encrypt and upload to the blockchain; the task publisher uses the quality strategy to aggregate to obtain a comprehensive model, generates rewards and new parameters; zero rewards and shutdown parameters are generated for low quality local model parameters and cheating using penalty policies to require participants to provide true local parameters for local data learning training. By asymmetrically encrypting the uplink training parameters of all the participants and the update uplink communication process of the global model by the task publisher, the invisible data among all the participants and the invisible local model parameters are ensured, and the privacy of the local data is effectively protected.

title: A privacy protection method for federated learning based on cross-chain technology
abstract: The application provides a federal learning privacy protection method based on a cross-chain technology, which distributes independent encryption keys and decryption keys for a client and an aggregator through a key authorization center, thereby improving the security of data. The method comprises the steps that a client encrypts a local model and uploads the encrypted model to a server, when an aggregator downloads the encrypted model, the aggregator needs to verify whether the encrypted model is tampered or not and then conduct partial decryption so as to ensure accuracy and safety of data in the encrypted model to be aggregated, the aggregator conducts partial decryption on the encrypted model and conducts aggregation, so that the aggregator cannot access all data in the encrypted model, training data of the encrypted model is prevented from being restored from the aggregator, the client aggregates the partial decryption global model downloaded from the server, and therefore the client cannot touch original data used by other client training models, and the privacy of federal learning is improved.

title: Federal learning privacy protection method, electronic equipment and storage medium
abstract: The invention discloses a privacy protection method, electronic equipment and a storage medium for federal learning, which comprise the steps of obtaining a test data set, initializing global model parameters of a server, carrying out iterative training each time, randomly selecting a plurality of clients to participate in training by the server, issuing global model parameters of a previous iteration round, training a local model by each client by using the local data set and the global model parameters of the previous iteration round to generate local model update, adding noise on the local model update according to a local differential privacy mechanism and a layer sensitivity algorithm, sending the local model update added with the noise to the server, carrying out aggregation on the local model update to update the global model parameters by the server, evaluating the updated global model performance by using the test data set, carrying out continuous iteration until all clients at least participate in the training, and the global model performance of the server meets preset conditions or reaches preset iteration times, stopping training, and issuing the final global model parameters to the client.

title: Longitudinal federal learning differential privacy protection method and system based on tag sharing
abstract: A longitudinal federal learning differential privacy protection method and system based on label sharing, the method comprises the steps of performing differential privacy disturbing on label data of a main party, and sharing the disturbed label data to each guest party; each guest party performs local model parameter training by using the received tag data; after the local model is trained, each guest party carries out differential privacy noise adding disturbance on the local model parameters and sends the differential privacy noise adding disturbance to a master party; and the main party performs aggregation training by combining the local model parameters of each guest party and own model data to obtain a learning model. The invention also discloses a longitudinal federal learning differential privacy protection system based on tag sharing, electronic equipment and a computer readable storage medium. According to the invention, the noise meeting the differential privacy is added on the data tag and the convergence gradient, so that the calculation and memory expenditure is reduced. Noise is added to the gradient information in the model parameter aggregation process so as to prevent information leakage, and meanwhile, the communication times and the communication cost are reduced.

title: Federal learning privacy protection method and device based on random number mechanism
abstract: The invention discloses a federal learning privacy protection method and a federal learning privacy protection device based on a random number mechanism, wherein the method comprises the steps of firstly carrying out parameter configuration on each participant server and a secret state calculation server, respectively generating masks and aggregation coefficients by each participant server, calculating gradients after the masks, respectively calculating respective gradient check values by each participant server according to parameters, aggregation coefficients and gradients to be aggregated of the preconfigured participant servers, calculating an aggregation gradient value and an aggregation check value by the secret state calculation server according to an aggregation weight coefficient, the gradients after the masks and the gradient check values, obtaining the aggregation gradient value after the masks are removed by each participant server according to the aggregation gradient value, recalculating the aggregation check value, and judging whether the aggregation gradient value of the server is correct or not according to whether the recalculated aggregation check value is equal to the received aggregation check value. The method can reduce the calculation complexity of the whole svfl gradient aggregation correctness verification scheme.

title: A charging scheduling system and method for automobile electricity price and carbon emission based on Actor-Critic
abstract: The application provides a charging scheduling system and method for automobile electricity price and carbon emission based on an Actor-Critic, which are applied to the technical field of data processing. The method comprises the steps of processing dynamic electricity price information and carbon emission signal information of a power grid based on federal learning privacy protection parameter information to generate income evaluation parameter information, processing charging demand information of a user based on historical charging and power grid load problem information to generate charging strategy adjustment reference information, processing the charging strategy adjustment reference information based on federal learning privacy protection parameter information and different regional power grid information to generate cross-regional collaborative optimization factors, processing the charging demand information of the user and regional information corresponding to the charging demand information of the user based on the cross-regional collaborative optimization factors to generate charging demand classification information and priority information, and processing based on a scheduling model of a target Actor-Critic algorithm to generate charging scheduling distribution result information.

title: A method for load forecasting based on federated learning of multi-party samples
abstract: The invention relates to a method for achieving load prediction based on federal learning of multiparty samples, which comprises the following steps of S1, training local models of federal learning multiparty samples, S2, aggregating federal learning models, namely, specifically designing an aggregation model aiming at a load prediction scene, wherein the aggregation model is constructed to analyze and detect trend of a prediction result of a global model, S3, protecting federal learning privacy data, namely, adopting a differential privacy protection technology, protecting local data by adding noise to data or training model output, and preventing the original privacy data from being obtained through reverse calculation, wherein the noise adding mode is determined according to the characteristics of the data and the privacy protection requirement, and the load prediction accuracy is high, and can provide more reliable results whether the load fluctuation is short-term or long-term. The model training efficiency is high, and the training efficiency of the whole federal learning load prediction model is improved, so that support can be provided for load prediction of the power distribution network more timely.

title: Decentralized differential privacy-based power data federal learning privacy calculation protection method
abstract: The invention provides a decentralized differential privacy-based power data federal learning privacy calculation protection method, which comprises three steps of model initialization, model training, model noise adding and personalized model generation. In a model initialization step, defining a local initialization model for each participant; training the models of all participants by using a local data set in the model training and model noise adding steps, adding Gaussian mechanism-based noise meeting differential privacy conditions to the trained models, and sending the models to the rest participants through blockchain transactions; in the personalized model generation step, each participant aggregates the local model and the models of the rest participants through parameter relativity, and finally generates the local personalized model. The method shows that the differential privacy can effectively prevent an attacker from reversely deducing the information of the participants, and can realize effective privacy protection on a decentralised power data federal learning model.

title: Federal learning privacy protection method based on agent data set
abstract: The invention discloses a federal learning privacy protection method based on agent data sets, which comprises the steps of achieving consensus before federal learning by a plurality of equipment participants through a protocol, defining key elements of each link, ensuring process standardization consistency, providing bases for privacy protection and efficient training, protecting original data privacy by constructing agent data sets and models, simulating data characteristic protection training to be effective, improving flexibility and adaptability by optimizing each participant based on the agent models, reducing computational complexity by logic optimization, accelerating training, reducing bandwidth consumption, improving efficiency, ensuring communication safety by establishing public key infrastructure, realizing data confidentiality, integrity and safety audit, ensuring data compliance consistency by formulating audit strategies, verifying data authenticity and effectiveness by a third party, enhancing federal learning transparency and reliability, and promoting safe and efficient data cooperation and learning.

title: A method and system for protecting data privacy in federated learning based on correlation pruning
abstract: The invention discloses a federal learning data privacy protection method and system based on correlation pruning, and belongs to the technical field of information security. According to the invention, through evaluating the correlation among neurons, the model is pruned in a targeted way, so that the complexity of the model is reduced, the communication overhead is reduced, the noise amount required to be added later is reduced, and the overall model performance is improved. Meanwhile, the invention utilizes differential privacy to realize the privacy protection of data, and by calculating the correlation LRP of each nerve layer and output, the privacy budget is reasonably distributed, more budgets are distributed by important layers, less budget is distributed by sub-important layers, on the premise of ensuring the whole privacy budget, the accuracy performance of the model is improved, unnecessary privacy budget waste is avoided, and limited budget is better utilized. The invention can effectively solve the problems of model complexity and differential privacy protection in federal learning, and achieves good balance between model efficiency and privacy protection.

title: A Federated Learning Method for Internet of Vehicles Based on Privacy Encrypted Data Deduplication under Zero Trust
abstract: The invention discloses a vehicle networking federal learning method based on privacy encryption data deduplication under zero trust, which comprises the following steps: each vehicle acquires global model parameters issued by the cloud and updates parameters of a local model; each vehicle performs data deduplication on data collected by roadside equipment based on an asymmetric homomorphic encryption algorithm of CSP and DLP; each vehicle receives the data uploaded by the roadside equipment and adds the data to a local data set; each vehicle trains the local model through local data; uploading the trained local model parameters to the cloud end by each vehicle, and updating global model parameters by the cloud end through aggregating the local model parameters of each vehicle; and repeating iterative training until the global model converges or reaches the preset iteration times. Under the zero trust framework and the federal learning framework, the invention performs data deduplication through the asymmetric homomorphic encryption algorithm of CSP and DLP, ensures the effectiveness of model training in the federal learning process, and reduces the burden of data transmission, storage and processing.

title: Cross-brand household appliance maintenance knowledge sharing system and method based on federal learning
abstract: The invention relates to the technical field of household appliance maintenance, in particular to a brand-crossing household appliance maintenance knowledge sharing system and a method thereof based on federal learning, wherein a multi-mode fault data collection and intelligent maintenance system integrates images, texts, fault phenomena and multi-mode instruction data collection, a feature decoupling model is established through a maintenance knowledge analysis module after preprocessing, universal and special fault information is stored in the brand-crossing maintenance knowledge storage, and power-assisted knowledge migration is performed, the federal learning training module adopts differential privacy homomorphic encryption to protect data privacy, realizes gradient aggregation cooperative training, the augmented reality maintenance guidance terminal intuitively guides maintenance, improves efficiency, and the preventive maintenance module calculates equipment maintenance period to generate a preventive scheme, so that the failure rate and cost are reduced.

title: Method, system, medium and electronic equipment for protecting federal learning private data
abstract: The embodiment of the application provides a method, a system, a medium and electronic equipment for protecting federal learning private data, wherein the method for protecting federal learning private data comprises the following steps: receiving random numbers from an aggregation server side and a kth-1 global model parameter; receiving an ith noise parameter vector generated from a third party trusted center; updating the local model according to the k-1 global model parameters to obtain a k updating gradient of the local model parameters; encrypting the kth update gradient according to the random number and the ith noise parameter vector to obtain an ith noisy update gradient; and providing the i-th updated gradient after noise addition to the aggregation server side so that the aggregation server side aggregates the updated gradient after noise addition of all the clients corresponding to the Union learning and then decrypts the updated gradient after noise addition. The embodiment of the application ensures that the noise adding process does not influence the final model performance and does not obviously increase the communication link load.

title: Privacy protection method and system for federated learning based on homomorphic encryption and incremental update
abstract: The invention provides a federal learning privacy protection method based on homomorphic encryption and incremental updating, and relates to the technical field of privacy calculation. The federal learning privacy protection method based on homomorphic encryption and incremental update is realized by a federal learning privacy protection system based on homomorphic encryption and incremental update, and comprises the steps of training a local initial model by each participant by adopting local training data based on a federal learning framework to generate local initial model parameters, calculating a difference value of the local model and a global model by adopting an incremental update mechanism to obtain a model updated difference value, carrying out fixed-point quantization on the difference value of the model parameters to obtain a quantized value, carrying out encryption on the quantized value by adopting an improved Paillier homomorphic encryption algorithm, and carrying out aggregation treatment on the encrypted model parameters by an aggregation server to obtain an updated encrypted global model. The invention can solve the problems of privacy disclosure risk and calculation bottleneck in the traditional method.

title: A privacy-preserving trajectory prediction method based on federated learning
abstract:
The invention discloses a privacy protection track prediction method based on federal learning, belonging to the federal learning field; firstly, dividing a track prediction model, and sending a result of calculating local track data by a user through an embedding module to a server; the feature extraction module extracts corresponding features and sends the features to the user; then, the user calculates the output of each personalized output module; judging whether the current track prediction model is in a prediction mode, if so, outputting a final prediction result by the personalized output module of each user; otherwise, the user updates the parameters of the personalized output module
Meanwhile, calculating the gradient of the bias backward propagation calculation feature extraction module and updating the parameter theta and the gradient of the embedding module and updating the corresponding parameters
And repeating until the track prediction model reaches a preset convergence condition. The invention greatly reduces the calculated amount and the communication data amount of the user equipment, enhances the privacy protection effect and realizes personalized prediction.

title: Universal model heterogeneous federal learning privacy protection method
abstract: The invention provides a universal model heterogeneous federal learning privacy protection method which comprises the steps of enabling a cloud server to randomly select an online client, obtaining a model generation parameter union set of the client through a privacy protection union set protocol, generating heterogeneous models with different sizes and architectures according to the union set, distributing the models to edge nodes for storage, enabling the client to download a local model from the corresponding edge nodes, disturbing and encrypting trained model parameters, enabling the edge nodes to receive encryption model parameters uploaded by the client, conducting safe aggregation through a threshold vector aggregation protocol, obtaining an aggregation model meeting the differential privacy requirements, enabling the cloud server to receive the aggregation models from all the edge nodes, and conducting global updating through the heterogeneous model aggregation method, so that a new global model is obtained. According to the invention, through an innovative privacy protection protocol and system architecture, the privacy protection problem in a model heterogeneous federal learning scene is effectively solved, and the practicability and safety of federal learning are improved.

title: TMI system for meeting localized differential privacy based on federal learning
abstract: The invention relates to a TMI system meeting localized differential privacy based on federal learning, which comprises a server and a client; the client trains a federal learning model with enhanced privacy locally, exchanges updated parameters with the server through a protocol, gathers the parameters for calculation, and sends calculation results to the participating clients; the federal learning model with enhanced privacy is used for extracting the motion characteristics of a user track at a client side as a data sample to replace original data for training; before training, the federal learning model with enhanced privacy performs fuzzy clustering on data sample information; an LDP technology is adopted to carry out joint training on the sample data to form a federal learning model with privacy enhancement. The invention effectively reduces the federal learning communication cost and can enhance the privacy of model gradients.

title: Privacy protection distributed federal learning collaborative strategy for internet-connected automobiles
abstract: The invention relates to the technical field of privacy protection of internet-connected automobiles, and discloses a privacy protection distributed federal learning collaborative strategy for the internet-connected automobiles, which comprises a privacy protection system of the internet-connected automobiles, wherein the privacy protection system of the internet-connected automobiles comprises an application scene layer, a core technical layer, an edge calculation layer and a data and equipment layer. The privacy protection distributed federal learning collaborative strategy for the internet-connected vehicles realizes real-time and multidimensional perception of traffic environment by integrating technologies such as V2X communication, road condition space-time encoders, stream data processing engines and the like, provides accurate data support for intelligent driving decisions, can dynamically adjust resource allocation and task scheduling according to real-time road conditions and network conditions by a dynamic domain policy module and a time-space domain self-adaptive dividing technology, improves response speed and efficiency of the system, and realizes strict privacy protection during data sharing and federal learning by technologies such as a privacy calculation pool module, dynamic privacy budget allocation, a PKI certificate service center and the like.

title: A privacy-preserving federated self-distillation software defect prediction method
abstract: The invention relates to a federal self-distillation software defect prediction method for privacy protection, which is used for carrying out local software defect prediction based on a deep learning MLP model, solving the problem of privacy leakage in model training, carrying out privacy protection on model parameters through a noise adding technology before uploading local model parameters by applying a local differential privacy algorithm, enabling clients to be independent of a server, simultaneously utilizing a federal learning privacy protection framework for a plurality of clients to cooperatively train the model under the condition that the clients do not share private data, solving the problem that single data is insufficient to train out a software defect prediction model with excellent performance, introducing a knowledge self-distillation technology, and improving individuation of the local model through a history model of the client when cooperatively training to learn knowledge of other clients. And continuously updating global model parameters through federal learning to train a software defect prediction model with strong learning ability and good prediction performance.

title: Federal learning privacy protection method and system
abstract: The invention discloses a federal learning privacy protection method and a federal learning privacy protection system, which belong to the technical field of data security, wherein the method adopts a multi-secret reusable secret sharing method to divide a secret into a plurality of secret shares, and the plurality of secret shares are respectively sent to corresponding users; the method comprises the steps of carrying out mask encryption on respective local model parameters by a user, sending the local model parameter ciphertext to a server, carrying out aggregation on the local model parameter ciphertext by the server to obtain a model parameter aggregation ciphertext, establishing secret share combinations according to the secret shares of the current online user by the user, sending the secret share combinations to the server, carrying out reconstruction on all the received secret share combinations by the server to obtain a secret combination, decrypting the model parameter aggregation ciphertext by the secret share combinations to obtain a global model parameter, and sending the global model parameter to the user, carrying out local training on the global model parameter by the user to obtain an updated local model parameter, carrying out mask encryption on the local model parameter again, and iteratively updating the global model. The method solves the problem of low calculation efficiency caused by repeated secret sharing operation in multiple rounds of federation aggregation, adopts random single mask encryption to protect user data privacy, and can efficiently complete federation aggregation when partial users are disconnected.

title: Block chain-based verifiable Bayesian robust privacy protection federal learning method
abstract: The invention relates to a Bycarpa robust privacy protection federation learning method based on a blockchain, which comprises the following steps of S1, a task publisher publishing federation learning tasks to a blockchain platform, S2, selecting a server and a client side to generate a function key, S3, uploading encrypted ciphertext and auxiliary data to the blockchain platform, S4, calculating the confidence of all encryption models through the function key by the server, S5, uploading an aggregation model to the blockchain, sending a reference model to the task publisher, judging whether task completion conditions are met at the moment, if yes, executing S6, otherwise, returning S2, and distributing task rewards to the client side and the server based on the accumulated confidence and the accumulated times of correctly executing the aggregation strategy. Compared with the prior art, the method has the advantages of reducing misjudgment of abnormal values of federal learning, improving calculation efficiency and the like.

title: A personalized recommendation method based on federated learning privacy protection
abstract: The invention relates to the technical field of information safety, in particular to a personalized recommendation method based on federal learning privacy protection, which is divided into a federal learning privacy protection stage and a personalized recommendation stage; the federal learning privacy protection stage is used for protecting user privacy, and the personalized recommendation stage is used for reasonably and individually recommending according to user preference; introducing an area server containing a user information conversion table to transition between the two stages, wherein the area server plays a role in starting up and down, the Internet platform sends recommendation information to the area server, the area server executes user information conversion and then carries out recommendation, and a user does not need to directly face the Internet platform; the regional server is mainly used for parameter conversion between the Internet platform and the user. The method can achieve a certain balance between personalized recommendation and data privacy protection, and can provide effective reference for personalized recommendation.

title: Personal credit assessment method and system based on federated learning decision forest
abstract: The invention provides a federal learning decision forest-based personal credit assessment method and system, which relate to the field of differential privacy federal learning privacy protection, wherein a data owner acquires personal information to be assessed; classifying personal information to be evaluated through the constructed decision forest, and outputting personal credit rating; the decision forest is formed by continuously iterating and constructing new nodes on the current branches of the current decision tree by selecting a mode of creating new nodes by global optimal attributes from local optimal attributes of all data owners according to local data volume grades of the data owners in a federal learning scene until the new nodes of all branches of the current decision tree are leaf nodes, and then constructing the next decision tree; when the iteration ending condition is met, the constructed decision tree forms a decision forest; the invention provides an effective privacy protection decision forest construction scheme in a federal learning scene, and provides privacy guarantee for data providers.

title: Federal learning method, system, equipment and medium for lightweight privacy protection and integrity verification
abstract: A federal learning method, system, equipment and medium for protecting light-weight privacy and verifying integrity, which is characterized in that the method encrypts the local model parameters of a participant based on homomorphic encryption technology to protect the privacy of the participant, and a global model integrity verification scheme of homomorphic hash technology is utilized to detect whether an aggregation server executes an aggregation algorithm honestly and gives a correct aggregation result, so that the privacy of the participant is protected, and meanwhile, the finally obtained global model is ensured to be real and correct; the system, the equipment and the medium can protect the privacy of the participants by using the homomorphic encryption technology based on the method, and realize the integrity verification of the local model aggregation result by using the homomorphic hash technology; compared with a global model integrity verification scheme needing to carry out a large amount of computation, the computing overhead and the communication overhead of the method are kept at lower levels, and the method meets the requirements of real scenes; in addition, the invention does not need to add other information such as noise to the model information, and the training precision of federal learning is not affected.

title: Lightweight longitudinal federated learning privacy protection data alignment method
abstract: The invention discloses a method for aligning privacy protection data of lightweight longitudinal federated learning, which is characterized in that the method adopts an inadvertent key value storage and zero sharing method, can support high-efficiency privacy protection data in longitudinal federated learning in the scene of collusion of any number of putrefactive parties, and specifically comprises the following steps: the method comprises the steps of system initialization, key and fragment distribution, key value storage generation, intersection calculation and the like. Compared with the prior art, the method has the advantages that the lightweight symmetric encryption operation is used, the problem of data alignment of privacy protection in longitudinal federated learning can be efficiently solved under the condition that any number of corrupt parties collude, sample IDs outside intersection of data sets are not revealed, the safety of honest data sets is ensured according to a mechanism that the number of the corrupt parties divide participants, the safety under a semi-honest model and a malicious model which resist the collusion of any number of adversaries can be achieved, and the requirements of high efficiency and privacy in longitudinal federated learning are met.

title: Safe wireless federation learning method and system in malicious and low-quality user scene
abstract: The invention belongs to the technical field of wireless communication, and discloses a safe wireless federal learning method and system under a malicious and low-quality user scene, which can resist the negative influence of malicious users and low-quality users on the performance of a global model, and comprises four stages: in the authentication stage, the credit of the user is evaluated by comparing the cosine similarity of the model of the user and the global model; and (3) a re-labeling stage: carrying out data cleaning on the low-quality user local data set by using the prediction result of the global model; and (3) a secondary identification stage: performing a second round of credit evaluation on the malicious user set screened in the first authentication stage, and screening low-quality users in the malicious user set; and in a conventional training stage, benign users are scheduled to conduct global model aggregation. In order to prevent the leakage of user model information and the presumption of user information by a semi-honest server, the model parameters are encrypted by using homomorphic encryption technology, and a double-server architecture is adopted. The invention overcomes the influence of low-quality users and malicious users on the performance of the model.

title: Gradient boosting decision tree vertical federated learning method, electronic device and storage medium
abstract: The invention provides a vertical federal learning method of a gradient lifting decision tree, electronic equipment and a storage medium, wherein the method comprises the steps of providing two participants, and carrying out encryption aggregation on gradient secret sharing shares by adopting Paillier homomorphic encryption; the method comprises the steps of calculating the weight of each leaf node, accumulating the weight of the leaf node, updating the model output, processing the Sigmoid calculation in training by adopting a function approximation method, processing the division calculation in the training process by adopting a Goldschmidt sequence expansion, and returning to a model list of a complete gradient lifting decision tree model. The method of the invention obviously improves the model training efficiency on the basis of completely protecting the original data and feature distribution privacy of the participants, and can ensure the accuracy and generalization of the training model.

title: Federated learning method and system based on dual-end security protection
abstract: The invention provides a federation learning method and a federation learning system based on double-end safety protection, which belong to the technical field of federation learning, local data of all clients are subjected to screening by a data screening device and then are input into a main task to be subjected to local training, screening results are stored to generate local data description, all clients upload local models and local data description to a server together, when the server stores enough client historical model information, the model screening device is operated, local model quality is inspected by utilizing a local model set and the local data description processed by all clients, and a follow-up server guides federation training and aggregation process according to the client local model quality inspection results. The invention carries out offline automatic examination on the local data set at the client, examines the collected local model at the server, comprehensively protects the data and model safety on the premise of not violating the federal study privacy protection principle, and improves the robustness and credibility of federal study.

title: A vertical federated learning privacy protection method, device, equipment and storage medium
abstract: The embodiment of the invention relates to the field of federal learning and discloses a longitudinal federal learning privacy protection method, device, equipment and storage medium, wherein the method comprises the steps of obtaining a feature embedded vector corresponding to original data; based on the original data and the feature embedding vector, calculating the sensitivity of the feature embedding vector relative to the original data, calculating the gradient of the sensitivity relative to the model parameters of the bottom model, uploading the feature embedding vector to a server, receiving the gradient of the loss of the classification task returned by the server relative to the feature embedding vector, and updating the model parameters of the bottom model by adopting a back propagation method to obtain the updated bottom model by combining the gradient of the sensitivity relative to the model parameters of the bottom model and the gradient of the loss of the classification task relative to the feature embedding vector. The method solves the problem that the performance of the model can not be guaranteed while the effect of defending the data reconstruction attack is guaranteed in the prior art.

title: Federated learning privacy protection method and system for secure sharing of sensitive big data
abstract: The invention discloses a federal learning privacy protection method for safe sharing of sensitive big data, which comprises the following steps: s1, a central party and a participant construct a global model; s2, initializing a global model by a central party and sending the global model to a participant; s3, training the global model by the participants according to the local data set to obtain local model parameters; s4, the participants use a differential privacy method to disturb the local model parameters; s5, the participants send the disturbed local model parameters to the central party; s6, the central party aggregates the local model parameters sent by all the participants, obtains a global model of the next round after aggregation, and sends the secondary model to the participants; s7, repeating the steps S3-S6 until the global iteration is finished, and reducing model errors caused by fewer participants by the method, so that trade-off between sensitive data privacy and government model performance is effectively realized.

title: Data processing method, storage medium and electronic device
abstract: The application discloses a data processing method, a storage medium and an electronic device. Wherein, the method comprises the following steps: acquiring virtual data, wherein the role of a first client is an attacker in the process of federal learning training, the role of a second client is an attacker in the process of federal learning training, and the first client and the second client share a neighbor generator; carrying out the federate attack of the graph by using the virtual data, and reconstructing the private node attribute of the second client and the connection relation between the first client and the second client; and determining that the second client is leaked with the private data based on the private node attribute and the connection relation. The method and the device solve the technical problem that a detection means for privacy disclosure caused by sharing of graph related information and neighbor generators in federal learning is lacked in related technologies.

title: Federated learning privacy protection method and device based on sparsification under edge computing
abstract: The invention discloses a federal learning privacy protection method and device based on sparsification under edge calculation, wherein the method comprises the following steps: training the local model at the client to obtain a model layer and model parameters of the local model; compressing the model layer and the model parameters by using a model compression method based on sparsification to obtain a compression model; encrypting the compression model layer according to the homomorphic encryption algorithm with the additivity, and transmitting the encryption model layer to an aggregation server for aggregation to obtain an encryption global model; sending the encrypted global model back to each client through the aggregation server, and decrypting the encrypted global model by each client according to a decryption part in the homomorphic encryption algorithm to obtain a compression model; and reconstructing the compression model through an OMP algorithm to obtain a reconstructed global model, and updating the local model by using the reconstructed global model to enter the next training round. The method reduces the calculation cost and the communication cost of homomorphic encryption under the condition of ensuring that the accuracy of the global model is not affected.

title: Asynchronous federated learning privacy protection method, system, medium, device and terminal
abstract: The invention belongs to the technical field of machine learning safety, and discloses an asynchronous federal learning privacy protection method, system, medium, equipment and terminal, which initializes the system and selects random parameters, and discloses series parameters and signature public keys; a user generates a signature and a public and private key pair and sends the signature and the public and private key pair to a server, and the server packs and broadcasts user identity information and a public key to other users; a user generates a sub-secret corresponding to a random parameter and a one-time session key after receiving data; generating a shared key among users and encrypting user information; the information to be encrypted of the user is weighted local information of the user; the user sends the data after the mask is added to the server, and the server aggregates the data to obtain an aggregation result; and the server divides the aggregation result by the total number of the samples held by the users who finally participate in training to obtain the global model. The asynchronous federated learning privacy protection method protects the privacy of the user in federated learning; the time of learning and training is reduced, and resources are saved.

title: A differential privacy longitudinal federated learning method and system for personalized recommendation system
abstract: The invention discloses a differential privacy longitudinal federal learning method and a differential privacy longitudinal federal learning system of a personalized recommendation system, wherein the method comprises the steps of carrying out local differential privacy protection on behavior data of users to obtain the attention degree of the users of each organization to different commodity labels; each organization takes the attention as a data tag to train an initial personalized recommendation model locally to obtain initial model parameters; each organization adds noise to the initial model parameters to obtain a noise added initial personalized recommendation model, and the noise added initial personalized recommendation model is sent to other organizations except the organization; and each organization performs aggregation training by using the noisy initial personalized recommendation model to obtain the personalized recommendation model. The invention protects the privacy of the user behavior from the user client, prevents the utilization of the user behavior data by malicious organizations, and reduces the risk of data leakage. By adopting longitudinal federal learning, each organization can fully utilize the data, the recommendation accuracy is improved on the premise of providing sufficient privacy protection, and the data utilization rate is improved.

title: Dynamic semi-decentralized federated learning privacy protection security aggregation method and system
abstract: The invention belongs to the technical field of privacy protection safety, and discloses a dynamic semi-decentralization federal learning privacy protection safety aggregation method, which adopts aggregation nodes to select by random generation sequences during initialization; the overall architecture consists only of clients participating in the aggregation and third party trusted authorities TA assisting in the generation of key pairs. The invention improves the scheme architecture and privacy protection mode in the existing security aggregation method, reduces the communication number in each round of aggregation, introduces a plurality of clients to participate in the whole aggregation process to replace a widely used secret splitting method, and avoids a single node (such as a server) from obtaining excessive information; the invention reduces communication overhead as much as possible in the aggregation process; the influence of aggregation failure caused by the disconnection of the client is solved; security aggregation for privacy protection.

title: Federated learning privacy protection method, device and medium based on differential compression
abstract: The invention discloses a federal learning privacy protection method, equipment and medium based on differential compression, which belong to the technical field of federal learning privacy protection, and the technical problem to be solved by the invention is how to realize wider and more reasonable privacy protection on the basis of privacy precision balance, and ensure the learning effect of a federal learning model, and the adopted technical scheme is as follows: the differential privacy is combined with model compression, and the whole federal learning training process is encrypted; channel sensitivity pruning: the method is used for encrypting the local model uploading parameters and effectively protecting the uploaded local model parameters from being attacked by malicious clients and malicious analyzers; determining whether the corresponding channel should be reserved or not by solving the neuron sensitivity in each training process of different channel feature graphs in each convolution layer; adaptive differential privacy.

title: Artificial intelligence data privacy protection system based on blockchain and federated learning
abstract: The invention discloses an artificial intelligent data privacy protection system based on blockchain and federal learning, which relates to the technical field of blockchain and federal learning and comprises a blockchain module, a federal learning module, a privacy protection module and a malicious node detection module, wherein the blockchain module adopts a main chain-side chain double-chain architecture, a main chain stores global model hash values and node reputation evaluation data, a side chain stores encrypted local model parameters through a segmentation technology, the federal learning module comprises a dynamic differential privacy algorithm and a gradient ternary processing unit and is used for adding noise to gradients in a local training stage and converting the gradients into a ternary numerical format, the privacy protection module integrates homomorphic encryption and zero knowledge proof technology to realize ciphertext aggregation and verification of model parameters, and the malicious node detection module identifies abnormal gradient update based on cosine similarity and Multi-Krum algorithm and links with node reputation data in the blockchain module. The invention improves the efficiency and performance of federal learning and has wide application prospect while ensuring the data privacy through the system architecture and the privacy protection mechanism.

title: Privacy state switching method and system for federated learning
abstract: The application provides a federal learning-oriented privacy state switching method and a federal learning-oriented privacy state switching system, which relate to the technical field of privacy computation, wherein the method comprises the steps of extracting an initial privacy protection mechanism for federal learning objects and federal servers based on a privacy protection policy engine; and dynamically adjusting an initial privacy protection mechanism by privacy-effectiveness balance optimization to obtain a privacy protection mechanism, and protecting data interaction between the Union learning object and the federal server by the privacy protection mechanism. The application can solve the technical problems that the privacy protection intensity and the calculation performance are difficult to balance, the training efficiency, the convergence effect and the data safety of federal learning are further influenced in the prior art, and realize the dynamic adjustment of the privacy protection mechanism and parameters so as to adapt to the technical targets of different training stages and different learning objects, thereby achieving the technical effects of optimizing the training performance and improving the model convergence speed while ensuring the data privacy safety.

title: Privacy protection method, device and storage medium for federated learning with heterogeneous devices
abstract: The application is applicable to the technical field of information safety, and provides a federal learning privacy protection method, equipment and a storage medium for equipment isomerism, wherein the method comprises the steps of setting training time delay constraint and data similarity constraint; based on the pareto algorithm, clustering the servers to obtain at least one cluster by using training time delay constraint, data similarity constraint and calculation time delay of the servers, determining cluster head servers in the clusters based on the training time delay of the servers to aggregate the local models of the servers in the clusters through the cluster head servers and communicate with a central server, wherein the training time delay comprises calculation time delay and communication time delay. The technical scheme provided by the application reduces the communication consumption of federal learning and improves the model training efficiency of federal learning.

title: A method and system for protecting model privacy in a federated learning system
abstract: The invention belongs to the technical field of computer application, and discloses a method and a system for protecting model privacy in a federal learning system, wherein the system comprises the following steps: the participants are responsible for locally using privacy data to train the model, encrypting the trained model and uploading the encrypted model to the aggregation server; the aggregation server is in charge of receiving the encryption models uploaded by all the participants and aggregating the models; the key server is responsible for generating and distributing keys to the participants so that the participants can decrypt the downloaded aggregated model, wherein the model encryption adopts a modified distributed ElGamal cryptosystem Improved Distributed ElGamal Cryptosystem (IDEC) algorithm to ensure the security and privacy of the model information in the whole learning system.

title: Privacy protection method for federated learning based on random participation differential privacy shuffling model
abstract: The invention relates to the technical field of data security, in particular to a federal learning privacy protection method based on a random participation differential privacy shuffling model, which comprises the steps that a client generates local weight data of local combined training by using a local randomizer and uploads the local weight data to a shuffler; the shuffler performs random shuffling operation on the received local weight data and transmits the local weight data after random shuffling to the analyzer within a fixed constraint time; the analyzer aggregates the received local weight data, updates the global model parameters of the next round of joint training by using the aggregated weight, and broadcasts the updated global model parameters to all clients. The method and the device can solve the problems that the joint training time process is long due to network blockage and the like of the existing federal learning model, the feasibility of federal learning in an actual application scene is affected, and the like, can effectively sample a client in federation training, and can ensure higher accuracy of the model.

title: Self-adaptive DPWGAN training method and system based on federal learning
abstract: The invention discloses a self-adaptive DPWGAN training method and system based on federal learning, wherein the method comprises the steps that a server broadcasts a discriminator, generator parameters and noise scale in an initialized WGAN to a client; the client performs DPWGAN training by using a local data set, and perturbs the trained generator parameters by using a differential privacy scheme of self-adaptive noise; uploading the disturbed generator parameters to a server; the server performs weighted average operation on the disturbed generator parameters to obtain an aggregated global model, and generates an acceptance Score and an FID value of the image according to the aggregated global model; and updating until the values of the acceptance Score and the FID reach the expected targets. The invention can solve the problem of data island and privacy protection in the traditional GAN training.

title: Data-heterogeneity-resistant electric power federal learning privacy enhancement method and device
abstract: The invention relates to the technical field of information safety, in particular to a method and a device for enhancing the privacy of electric federal learning for resisting data heterogeneity, which allow participants to select different privacy protection technologies based on own resource conditions and are suitable for scenes with unbalanced resources of all the parties; and the data after privacy treatment of different types are effectively fused, so that model training in a federal learning scene is realized, the model training efficiency is improved under the condition of ensuring the data privacy safety, and an available global training model is obtained.

title: Gradient masking algorithm for federated learning privacy
abstract: Techniques for facilitating masking of gradients produced by a federated learning network are disclosed. A set of masking coefficients is selected. These coefficients are to be tested by a set of nodes in the federated learning network. Each node is assigned a subset of the masking coefficients. The nodes are instructed to use their respectively assigned subsets of masking coefficients to locally perform model inversion testing using locally available datasets. Quantitative output is then received from the nodes. This output is generated as a result of the model inversion testing. The quantitative output is aggregated to produce discrete data groups organized according to the masking coefficients. A particular masking coefficient is then selected for subsequent application against gradients that are generated by the set of nodes.

title: A verifiable federated learning intelligent medical privacy protection system and method
abstract: The invention relates to the technical field of privacy protection, in particular to a verifiable federal learning intelligent medical privacy protection system and a method, the system comprises a certificate authentication center, a user, an edge computing node and a cloud server, and supports the user to independently verify the correctness of the aggregation result returned by the server without the assistance of a third party. The TLS protocol is specifically used for establishing a safe communication transmission channel, the integrity of the data transmission process is ensured while the information is encrypted, and the secret key used for encrypting the information can not be obtained by any party except the two parties of communication. The gradient privacy is protected by using a double-masking form, verifiability is provided for the scheme by using a linear homomorphic hash function, and a user can independently verify the correctness of the aggregation result returned by the server. The method and the system can effectively reduce the calculation overhead of the user side by using a double aggregation verification mode, support the user to exit in the training process, and can not cause extra calculation burden on the cloud server.

title: Privacy protection system based on federated learning
abstract: The invention discloses a privacy protection system based on federal learning, and relates to the technical field of privacy protection. The system comprises a distributed participation node cluster, a coordination server, a global model distribution channel and a privacy protection module, wherein each participation node is provided with a local model training unit and a privacy protection module, the coordination server is connected with each participation node through a secure communication layer and comprises a model aggregation module and a dynamic trust evaluation module, the global model distribution channel is used for broadcasting encrypted global model parameters to the participation nodes, and the privacy protection module is integrated on the local of the participation nodes and comprises a homomorphic encryption engine and a local differential privacy injector. According to the invention, under the federal learning framework, privacy protection intensity improvement, model utility optimization, system efficiency breakthrough and safety boundary expansion are synchronously achieved, and an industrial-level solution is provided for cross-domain data collaborative learning.

title: Privacy protection incentive mechanism training method based on reverse auction in federal learning
abstract: Aiming at the limitation of the prior art, the invention provides a privacy protection incentive mechanism training method based on reverse auction in federated learning, which does not send an extractor to a central server, and only uses a generator to fit the output of the extractor, so that a model uploaded to the central server by a federated learning participant is not directly trained by original data, and the central server cannot reversely push the original data, thereby protecting the data privacy; in addition, the invention incentivizes federal learning participants in a reverse auction manner, which can satisfy personal rationality, authenticity and budget feasibility in the training process.

title: Privacy protection vertical federal learning method and system based on additive integration
