abstract: The invention provides a privacy protection vertical federation learning method and system based on additive integration, which relate to the technical field of information and data security and comprise the steps of initializing a server side and each participant and constructing an additive integration vertical federation learning frame; in the federal learning framework, a top model at a server side is distributed to each participant, each participant carries out sequential training of a bottom model through a gradient lifting mechanism, wherein after the participants train the bottom model by utilizing local privacy data, the output of the bottom model is uploaded to the corresponding top model, the server calculates the loss of each top model and propagates the gradient to the bottom model of the next participant, the next participant serializes the training of the bottom model and the top model of the next participant by considering the residual error of the former participant, and the complementary effect among the participant models is formed through integrated learning and gradient lifting, so that the additive integrated vertical federal learning is realized.

title: Longitudinal federal learning privacy protection method and system considering data leakage among allies
abstract: The invention discloses a longitudinal federal learning privacy protection method and system considering data leakage among allies, and belongs to the field of vertical federal learning privacy protection. The method comprises the steps of recording initial accuracy of a server-side top-layer model of a longitudinal federal learning system, maintaining a data subset of local data sampled from each client side by a server, regarding each client side as a second client side in sequence, regarding the other client sides as first client sides, calculating risks of stealing the data of the second client sides by each first client side, regarding a maximum risk as an overall privacy leakage risk of the second client sides, if the overall privacy leakage risk exceeds a risk threshold, denoising an update gradient issued to the second client side by the server, and recalculating the overall privacy leakage risk until a privacy protection condition is met based on a noise adding result.

title: Financial abnormal behavior detection method and system based on federated learning privacy protection
abstract: The application provides a financial abnormal behavior detection method and a system based on federal learning privacy protection, which relate to the technical field of artificial intelligence and data security, wherein the method comprises the steps of combining candidate samples with original data, performing local training, and outputting update parameters of a local model; decrypting the updated weight of the encryption model, re-encrypting the global model and returning the global model to the local node, decrypting the global model by the local node, comparing the global model with the local model precision, and carrying out loop iteration after parameter updating until the performance index of the global model tends to be stable. The application solves the problems of insufficient detection samples of abnormal behaviors of a cross-mechanism and weak model generalization capability caused by scattered financial data and high privacy requirements, and influences on recognition accuracy and efficiency. The federal learning is combined with the pseudo sample generation, so that the multi-mechanism collaborative modeling is realized on the premise of protecting the data privacy, and the model training quality and the detection performance are improved.

title: Federal learning method and federated service network
abstract: The application relates to a federated learning method and a federated service network, wherein the federated learning method is implemented in the federated service network, the federated service network comprises a plurality of participants, at least one of which is used as a task initiator, at least one of which is used as a data provider, the data provider is provided with a local server cluster constructed by at least two servers, each server is provided with a computing node and a data cache node, each computing node is used for providing computing power, each data cache node is used for providing target data, and the federated learning method comprises the following steps: a data provider receives a sharing request of a task initiator to target data; appointing a computing node of one of the servers as a task node; the data cache node with the target data preloads the target data to a memory pool of a corresponding server; transmitting the target data from the memory pool to the task node to execute the training task; and sending the training result of the training task to the task initiator.

title: A decentralized verifiable federated learning method and device based on blockchain
abstract: The invention provides a block chain-based decentralised verifiable federation learning method and device. The method comprises the steps that an activity initiator issues tasks, a client calculates local gradients and transmits the local gradients to a server node in a segmentation mode, and meanwhile gradient verification values are calculated and uploaded to a verification master node. The server node aggregates the gradient shares to obtain a partial global gradient and computes a partial verification value for the blockchain. The aggregation master node further aggregates the global gradient sum value for verification of the next-round participants. And comparing verification values on the blockchain, confirming whether the gradient is tampered by the participant, if not, updating the model, and if not, reporting. The verifying master node traces back and deletes the untrusted node using the blockchain. The method effectively avoids single-point faults and bandwidth bottleneck problems possibly caused by a centralized architecture of traditional federal learning, ensures the safety of user data in the training process, and realizes verification of an aggregation result and tracking of a malicious server through a linear homomorphic hash technology.

title: Federated large codeword model deep learning architecture
abstract: A system and method for a federated deep learning platform utilizing homomorphically-compressed and encrypted data. The system comprises multiple client devices, each with a local dataset, and a central server hosting a deep learning core. Client devices convert local data into codewords, which are also homomorphically encrypted. The central server processes these encrypted codewords without decryption, preserving data privacy. The platform supports at least two architectural variants: a conventional Transformer trained on codewords, and a Latent Transformer operating on latent space vectors. Both variants eliminate the need for embedding and positional encoding layers. The system aggregates encrypted model updates from clients, enabling collaborative learning while maintaining data confidentiality. Additional features comprise differential privacy implementation and adaptive federated optimization techniques. This innovative approach allows for efficient, privacy-preserving distributed learning across diverse datasets, addressing key challenges in federated learning such as data heterogeneity, non-IID distributions, and communication efficiency.

title: A trusted federated learning method based on blockchain
abstract: The invention relates to a reliable federation learning method based on a blockchain, which adopts committee consensus, and participating nodes execute federation learning through the blockchain to maintain a global model and local update. The invention solves the problems of stability, fairness and safety brought by the central server, and simultaneously improves the consensus efficiency.

title: Bayesian tolerance decentralization privacy protection federal learning system based on blockchain
abstract: The invention relates to the field of information security, and provides an innovative Bayesian tolerance decentralization privacy protection federal learning system based on a block chain. The method aims to solve the safety and privacy leakage problems in the traditional federal learning. To address single point of failure and privacy revealing threats, an improved multi-client function encryption mechanism is introduced. The client model quality detection method based on the constructed function encryption technology and the cosine similarity calculation method is used for distinguishing honest clients from malicious clients. Not only can effectively resist Bayesian attack, but also can ensure that the model quality of each client in the federal learning process meets the requirements. Finally, on the premise of ensuring the data privacy, reputation evaluation, contribution evaluation and rewarding evaluation are carried out through a fair incentive evaluation mechanism. These measures aim to encourage more honest, high quality data clients to actively participate in federal learning, thereby improving overall learning effect and model universality.

title: Decentralized Group Privacy in Cross-Silo Federated Learning
abstract: Federated training of a machine learning model with enforcement of subject level privacy is implemented. Respective samples of data items from a training data set are generated at multiple nodes of a federated machine learning system. Noise values are determined for individual ones of the sampled data items according to respective counts of data items of particular subjects and the cumulative counts of the items of the subjects. Respective gradients for the data items are the determined The gradients are then clipped and noise values are applied. Each subject's noisy clipped gradients in the sample are then aggregated. The aggregasted gradients for the entire sample are then used for determining machine learning model updates.

title: Excluding compromised local units from receiving global parameters in federated learning systems
abstract: A method for excluding one or more of a plurality of local units from a federated learning system is provided. The method includes (1) receiving a plurality of local parameters transmitted by each of the plurality of local units; (2) determining, based on the plurality of local parameters, one or more indicators for each of the plurality of local units; (3) designating one or more of the plurality of local units as compromised local units if the one or more of the plurality of local units are determined to be compromised based on the one or more indicators; (4) generating a plurality of global parameters by aggregating the plurality of local parameters; and (5) transmitting the global parameters to a trusted subset of the plurality of local units. The trusted subset excludes the compromised local units.

title: Federal learning edge equipment training time delay optimizing system based on privacy protection
abstract: The invention discloses a federal learning edge equipment training time delay optimization system based on privacy protection, which belongs to the field of federal learning and privacy protection and comprises an edge equipment layer, a central server layer and a coordination layer, wherein the edge equipment layer, the central server layer and the coordination layer are connected through electric signals, the edge equipment layer collects, pre-processes data and encrypts and transmits the data to develop local training and privacy protection, the coordination layer is provided with task complexity, time delay and privacy overhead weight, the strategy is adjusted and the time delay is optimized according to a comprehensive objective function, the two layers are connected, and the central server layer decrypts, trains and aggregates the data to update a global model and feeds back the global model. The system initializes parameters first, then uses comprehensive balance dynamic sampling federal training algorithm, and carries out iterative training through equipment selection, local updating, strategy judgment, global parameter calculation and the like until reaching a preset round to obtain an optimal model. The invention solves the problems of privacy protection and time delay and improves the training efficiency and the data security.

title: Vertical federated learning client intelligent selection training method and device
abstract: The invention discloses an intelligent selection training method and device for vertical federal learning clients, which comprises the steps of initiating federal learning tasks, determining task targets and task demands of the federal learning tasks, generating corresponding task data packets, obtaining state information of FL clients, screening FL clients meeting the task demands according to the state information, scoring all types of state information in the FL clients meeting the task demands, carrying out weighted calculation on all types of state information to obtain evaluation total scores of all FL clients, sorting the FL clients according to the evaluation total scores, selecting the corresponding FL clients to participate in intelligent training, receiving training results returned by the FL clients after model training of the FL clients, updating a global model by using the training results, and carrying out corresponding iterative training until preset end conditions are reached. Compared with the prior art, the method and the device can efficiently and accurately screen the best client to participate in federal learning.

title: Asynchronous federal learning privacy protection method, system, medium, equipment and terminal
abstract: The invention belongs to the technical field of machine learning security, and discloses an asynchronous federal learning privacy protection method, a system, a medium, equipment and a terminal, wherein the system is initialized, random parameters are selected, and series of parameters and a signature public key are disclosed; the method comprises the steps of generating a signature and a public-private key pair by a user and sending the signature and the public-private key pair to a server, packing and broadcasting user identity information and the public key to other users by the server, generating a sub-secret corresponding to random parameters and a disposable session key by the user after receiving data, generating a shared key among the users and encrypting the user information, enabling the user to-be-encrypted information to be weighted user local information, sending the data after masking to the server by the user, aggregating the data by the server to obtain an aggregation result, and dividing the aggregation result by the total number of samples held by the final participating training user by the server to obtain a global model. The asynchronous federal learning privacy protection method protects the privacy of users in federal learning, reduces learning training time and saves resources.

title: Educational data privacy security protection method based on blockchain and federal learning
abstract: The invention relates to the technical field of data privacy and security protection, in particular to a method for protecting educational data privacy based on blockchain and federal learning, which comprises the steps of dividing participating nodes into workers, a verification committee and an aggregation committee based on a dynamic role allocation mechanism of stock weight, and realizing decentralization election through Hash ring mapping; the method comprises the steps of combining a double-layer privacy protection strategy shared by Diffie-Hellman key negotiation and a Shamir threshold secret, adding a counteractable differential disturbance in a local model to ensure verifiability and noise elimination of gradient exchange, using a Bayesian detection algorithm to effectively identify a poisoning attack under non-IID data through symbol clustering and similarity threshold filtering based on gradients, and dynamically adjusting committee weights through rights and benefits evidences (PoS) based on a contribution degree excitation model of a blockchain intelligent contract to prevent the Sybil attack and centralization monopoly. By adopting the method, the effectiveness and privacy security of the educational data in the distributed training process can be ensured.

title: Model joint privacy training and sharing method and device in power dispatching scenario
abstract: The embodiment of the disclosure discloses a model joint privacy training and sharing method and device under a power scheduling scene, wherein the method comprises the steps of adding a current power scheduling department into a alliance chain to serve as one scheduling participant; the method comprises the steps of obtaining power consumption data which flow through other related departments and are processed by a current power dispatching department during power dispatching, marking flow direction labels for the collected power consumption data, wherein the flow direction labels are used for indicating power flow direction information corresponding to the power consumption data, constructing model training data based on data features which are negotiated in advance with other power dispatching departments participating in a alliance chain, training a decision tree model, comparing the decision tree model obtained by training the current power dispatching department with the decision tree model obtained by training the other power dispatching departments, and sharing a target model to the alliance chain through intelligent contracts when the target model is a model obtained by training the current power dispatching department locally.

title: ECG arrhythmia classification method and device based on federated learning privacy protection
abstract: The invention discloses an electrocardiogram arrhythmia classification method and device based on federal learning privacy protection, wherein the method comprises the following steps: (1) Filtering the electrocardiogram signal data set with the label to obtain a training data set, and sending the training data set into a convolutional neural network for training, wherein the label is an arrhythmia type corresponding to an electrocardiogram signal; (2) Carrying out parameter quantization on the trained model to obtain a model parameter code; (3) Aggregating the model parameter codes of other participants with the local model parameter codes by using a decentralization safe aggregation algorithm, dequantizing the aggregated parameters to obtain an aggregation model, and inputting a training data set into the aggregation model for training; (4) Returning to the step (2) until the training times reach the preset times to obtain a trained classification model; (5) And acquiring an electrocardiogram signal to be classified, filtering the electrocardiogram signal to be classified, and inputting the filtered electrocardiogram signal to be classified into a classification model to obtain a category corresponding to the electrocardiogram signal to be classified.

title: A federated learning method and system based on physical layer key extraction and compressed sensing
abstract: The invention relates to a federal learning method and a federal learning system based on physical layer key extraction and compressed sensing, and belongs to the technical field of machine learning data privacy protection. The method comprises the following steps of utilizing a learning mechanism that a federal learning training model does not share data and only exchanges training parameters in an intermediate stage to carry out multiparty coordination training, utilizing randomness of a channel key extraction technology when a fractional Fourier transform is sparse to conceal the needed fractional level parameters for transformation and recovery, preventing a third party from eavesdropping to acquire private data, combining compressed sensing random sampling, further improving safety under the condition of saving sampling and transmission cost, and carrying out safe multiparty pneumonia data coordination training. The scheme of the invention can promote the theoretical development of machine learning data privacy protection and has wide application prospect in the fields of intelligent medical treatment and the like.

title: Data resource optimization transmission strategy and device
abstract: The invention discloses a data resource optimization transmission strategy and a device thereof. According to the characteristics of data, the requirements of application, the condition of a network and the requirements of safety, the data resource optimization transmission process is divided into six sub-strategies: the data compression sub-strategy, the data coding sub-strategy, the data encryption sub-strategy, the data segmentation sub-strategy, the data caching sub-strategy and the data scheduling sub-strategy are defined, corresponding objective functions and optimization algorithms are defined for each sub-strategy, and comprehensive consideration and dynamic adjustment of various factors and objectives involved in the data resource optimization transmission process are achieved, so that the optimization effect is achieved. The invention has unified framework and strategy, can effectively coordinate and balance various factors and targets, improves the transmission efficiency and quality of the data resource, reduces the transmission cost and risk of the data resource, protects the safety and privacy of the data resource, realizes the credible sharing and cooperative processing of the data resource, and improves the value and benefit of the data resource.

title: Privacy protection model aggregation system and method based on federal learning in Internet of vehicles
abstract: The invention discloses a privacy protection model aggregation system and a method based on federal learning in the internet of vehicles, wherein the system comprises a credible authority center TA (trusted authority), a cloud server CS (cloud Server), a fog node FN (fog node) and a vehicle V (vehicle); the method comprises four steps: the method comprises the steps of system initialization, vehicle data collection, training to generate a local model and aggregation to generate a global model. According to the method and the system, under the condition that the privacy information of the vehicle is not leaked, the cloud server can effectively generate the global model of the Internet of vehicles, and meanwhile, the privacy of the local model and the global model in the aggregation process is guaranteed. The method can promote the stable operation of the intelligent traffic system and has better practicability.

title: Intelligent ammeter anomaly detection method and system based on federal differential privacy and attention mechanism
abstract: The invention discloses a method and a system for detecting the abnormality of an intelligent ammeter based on federal differential privacy and attention mechanism, which firstly collect and regionally group intelligent ammeter data; the method comprises the steps of extracting regional specific initial characteristics by adopting a multi-level attention mechanism, fusing a graph attention network with a multi-head attention network to strengthen spatial association characteristics, carrying out distributed anomaly preliminary identification, safely acquiring and protecting user behavior log characteristics by adopting a federal learning framework and an LDP mechanism aiming at potential anomalies, then carrying out safe aggregation and optimization on local model parameters which are trained by all parties and are subjected to parameter level differential privacy protection under the federal learning framework, carrying out local model fine tuning and secondary cross validation to confirm real anomalies, carrying out qualitative tracing on anomaly events by utilizing multi-dimensional dynamic attention, and finally dynamically adjusting characteristic extraction strategies by adopting federal feedback and combining resource perception to optimize a data processing scheme. The method solves the balance problems of precision, privacy protection and model adaptability in the abnormal detection of the data of the intelligent ammeter.

title: Method of secure classification of input data by means of a convolutional neural network
abstract: The present invention relates to a parameter training method for a convolutional neural network, CNN, for classifying data, the method comprising the implementation by data processing means (11c) of servers (1a, 1b, 1c) of steps of:(a1) Obtaining parameters of a set of at least one first CNN;(a2) For a first CNN of said set:Training, based on a database of already-classified public training data, parameters of a final representation block (B) of a second CNN corresponding to the first selected CNN to which said representation block (B) has been added;Retraining, based on a database of already-classified confidential training data of a secondary server (1a, 1b), parameters of the second CNN;Transmitting to the main server (1c) parameters of a third CNN corresponding to the second CNN without a final representation block (B);(a3) Replacing a first CNN of said set of first CNNs with the third CNN;(a4) Aggregating said set of at least one first CNN into a fourth CNN.The present invention also relates to a method for classifying an item of input data.

title: Security model using integrated technology
abstract: Systems, methods and computer-readable storage media utilized for institution security based on a security model in a computer network environment. One method includes receiving, by one or more processing circuits, data from one or more IoT devices associated with an institution. The method further includes determining, by the one or more processing circuits, a total count of people within an area. The method further includes determining, by the one or more processing circuits, a location for each people within the area. The method further includes identifying, by the one or more processing circuits, each people within the area and generating, by the one or more processing circuits, a security report.

title: Systems and methods for secure storage of user information in a user profile
abstract: A system for storing and managing credentials and encryption keys, includes: a first data store and a second data store; a client device configured to transmit a request to retrieve user data stored in the first data store; a secure key platform configured to: store user credentials and data store credentials in the second data store separate from the user data stored in the first data store; receive, from the client device, the request to retrieve user data stored in the first data store; retrieve, from the second data store, user credentials associated with a user of the client device and data store credentials associated with the first data store in response to the request to retrieve user data; use the user credentials of the user of the client device and data store credentials of the first data store to retrieve user data from the first data store; and provide the user data to the client device.

title: Verifiable safe aggregation federal learning scheme in cloud-edge cooperative environment
abstract: The invention discloses a verifiable safe aggregation federation learning scheme in cloud-edge cooperative environment, which can be divided into the following four stages: an initialization stage, an encryption stage, an aggregation stage and a verification stage. The invention is mainly used for researching the problems of privacy leakage, incorrect aggregation result and user disconnection existing in federal learning under cloud-edge cooperative environment. The invention designs a privacy protection algorithm with high calculation efficiency and no precision loss by combining two-party safe calculation and a mask technology, and realizes privacy protection of user gradient. Meanwhile, the invention designs a verification algorithm with low communication overhead by combining two-party security calculation and homomorphic hash function, thereby realizing the correctness verification of the aggregation result. In addition, the invention supports the user to drop the line at any time, and the drop line of the user hardly has negative influence on the accuracy of the trained model.

title: Technologies for collecting, managing, and providing contact tracing information for infectious disease response and mitigation
abstract: Disclosed embodiments are related to technologies for the provision of contact tracing services (CTS) in an affordable and non-intrusive means for individuals to check in and check out of gathering places so that their contact information can be stored and made available to contact tracers. A gathering place operator scans a machine-readable element (MRE) of a contact tracing participant that enters or exits the gathering place. The MRE encodes a unique identifier (UID) generated by the CTS for the participant, and the scan captures the UID along with a location and a timestamp at entry or exit of the gathering place. The UID, location, and timestamp are provided to the CTS for storage in a contact tracing database, which is used for providing contact tracing information to contact tracers. Other embodiments may be described and/or claimed.

title: Identification and personalized protection of text data using shapley values
abstract: Privacy, protection, and de-anonymization are issues of societal importance that are implicitly at the core of several key information systems, from electronic health records to online reviews. The system and method herein allows for an identification of an author of anonymous writing based on the text and structured data, subject to practical constraints on the intruder's amount of training data and effort using Shapley values.

title: Method and apparatus for training longitudinal federated learning model
abstract: A method for training a longitudinal federated learning model is provided, and is applied to a first participant device. The first participant device includes label data. The longitudinal federated learning model includes a first bottom layer sub-model, an interaction layer sub-model, a top layer sub-model based on a Lipschitz neural network and a second bottom layer sub-model in a second participant device. First bottom layer output data of the first participant device and second bottom layer output data sent by the second participant device are obtained. The first bottom layer output data and the second bottom layer output data are input into an interaction layer sub-model to obtain interaction layer output data. Top layer output data is obtained based on the interaction layer output data and the top layer sub-model. The longitudinal federated learning model is trained according to the top layer output data and the label data.

title: Systems and methods for secure storage of user information in a user profile
abstract: A method for storing a first data object, includes: on a client device, decomposing the first data object into a first fragment associated with a first original record locator and a second fragment associated with a second original record locator; on the client device, obfuscating the first original record locator to generate a first obfuscated record locator and the second original record locator to generate a second obfuscated record locator; on the client device, encrypting the first fragment using a first encryption key and the second fragment using a second encryption key; and storing, to at least a first of a plurality of storage locations, the first encrypted fragment with the corresponding first obfuscated record locator and the second encrypted fragment with the second obfuscated record locator.

title: Machine learning for interconnected surgical theater architecture
abstract: Each of a plurality of edge computing devices are configured to receive data streams generated by at least one sensor forming part of a respective medical device (e.g., a sensor-equipped surgical tool, etc.) which, in turn, characterizes use of the respective medical device in relation to a particular patient. Each of the edge computing devices can execute at least one machine learning model which generates or from which model attributes are derived. The generated model attributes are anonymized using an anonymization technique such as k-anonymity. The anonymized generated model attributes are homomorphically encrypted and transmitted to a central server. Encrypted model attribute updates to at least one of the machine learning models are later received from the central server which results in the machine learning models executing on one or more of the edge computing devices to be updated based on the received encrypted model attribute updates.

title: System and method for managing a federated browser security in an enterprise environment
abstract: A system and method for federated browser security in an enterprise environment is disclosed. The system monitors user browsing activities and enterprise contexts on local web browser hosted on user device, and device attributes corresponding to user device. Further, the system detects pre-defined enterprise identifier. Furthermore, the system initiates execution of secure web browser hosted on user device or virtual private cloud associated with enterprise environment. Additionally, the system routes login/web page URL, user login credentials, and information corresponding to login web page URL, from local web browser to secure web browser. Further, the system manages, in response to routing login web page URL, user login credentials, and information associated with login webpage, list of enterprise URL, federated identity of user in secure web browser, for managing federated browser security in enterprise environment. The federated browser security is managed for visibility and control of enterprise security in enterprise environment.

title: A multiple differential privacy protection method and system for cloud-side aggregation system
abstract: The invention discloses a cloud edge aggregation system-oriented multiple differential privacy protection method and a cloud edge aggregation system-oriented multiple differential privacy protection system.A global model is trained on each edge server by utilizing own original data to obtain a local model parameter of each edge server, and the local model parameter of each edge server is disturbed by adopting a GRR mechanism to obtain the disturbed local model parameter of each edge server; sending the local model parameters after the disturbance of each edge server to a cloud center server, performing parameter aggregation on the cloud center server to obtain aggregated global model parameters, and adding Laplacian noise to the aggregated global model parameters to obtain noise-added global model parameters. The advantages are that: double noise adding is carried out in the cloud center server and the edge client, so that stealing of private data of the user by an attacker outside the whole training model can be prevented, and direct acquisition of original data of the user by the semi-honest cloud center server can be ensured.

title: Dummy class framework for continual supervised learning applications
abstract: The disclosed embodiments provide a system that identifies a user of an electronic device. During a training mode, the system uses an initial training data set, comprising sensor data from electronic devices associated with a set of initial users, to train a multilayer neural network model to authenticate the initial users. Next, the system uses an additional training data set, which includes sensor data from electronic devices associated with one or more new users, to update a portion of the weights in the trained model so that the updated model can be used to authenticate both the initial users and the one or more new users. During a subsequent mode, the system uses the updated model to authenticate a user of the electronic device based on sensor data contemporaneously received from the electronic device.

title: Method and system for enterprise network access control and management for government and corporate entities
abstract: A method, system, computer program product, and devices for enterprise network access control and management for Government and Corporate entities, including interagency identity management; connectors and controls; an interagency directory services transformation service; a user/duty position resolving service; role-based encryption key management; role-based business process modeling; and proximity-based access control enabled by user-role-track association.

title: Systems, methods and apparatuses for identity access management and web services access
abstract: Systems, methods, and apparatus for identity access management for web services are disclosed. The method includes: creating on a user device, a session's access token and an identity token to be sent along with a request for accessing web services, wherein: the accessing of web services includes at least one of: retrieving and pushing information from an instance storage which is client specific and protected from unauthorized access by another instance storage; the session's access token indicates a location where the session's access token was created, an expiration time, and a hash identity for verifying a validity of the session's access token; the identity token identifies a user who sends the request; and authenticating the user on the user device according to the session's access token and the identity token to authorize the accessing of web services in a session.

title: Remediation of regulatory non-compliance
abstract: Hardware and software on a computing device is analyzed based on a regulatory profile for the computing device and regulatory compliance for an entity associated with the computing device. A determination is made whether at least one of the hardware and software on the computing device includes at least one regulatory non-compliance issue. In response to determining that at least one of the hardware and software on the computing device includes at least one regulatory non-compliance issue, one or more scripts are executed on the hardware and software on the computing device to cause the hardware and software to resolve the at least one regulatory non-compliance issue based on the regulatory profile for the computing device.

title: Hierarchical federated learning using access permissions
abstract: A method, apparatus, system, and computer program product for training a global machine learning model. A hierarchical structure for nodes in which the global machine learning model is located at a primary node in the hierarchical structure is identified. Authorized nodes in which local data is authorized for use in training in the authorized nodes for a local training of local machine learning models are determined. The machine learning models in the authorized nodes are trained using the local data in the authorized nodes to generate local model updates to weights in the local machine learning models. The local model updates to the weights are propagated upward in the hierarchical structure to the global machine learning model, wherein a node receiving local model updates to the weights from nodes from a lower level aggregates the weights in the local model updates received from the nodes in the lower level.

title: Information processing device, information processing method, and program
abstract: A new and improved technology capable of further improving inference accuracy while securing security of a machine learning model by federated learning is proposed.

title: Systems and methods for secure storage of user information in a user profile
abstract: A method for authenticated communications between devices, includes: establishing communications for data streaming between a first device and a second device; establishing a shared key; exchanging the shared key between the first device and the second device; encrypting a dataset by the first device using the shared key; decrypting the dataset by the second device using the shared key; evaluating key regeneration criteria to determine whether the shared key should be regenerated; in response to determining that the shared key should be regenerated, generating a new shared key, and encrypting a next dataset by the first device using the new shared key.

title: Unmanned aerial vehicle track generation method based on brain-computer interface data privacy protection
abstract: The invention provides an unmanned aerial vehicle track generation method based on brain-computer interface data privacy protection, which comprises the steps of anonymizing, de-identifying and encrypting brain-electrical signal data by adopting a data privacy protection mechanism, introducing a federal learning idea to realize the isolation of data sharing and model training, integrating new brain-electrical signal data by utilizing an incremental learning method, updating a model, and adopting safety measures to ensure the safety and the integrity of data transmission and processing processes. The method and the strategy jointly protect individual privacy, realize accurate unmanned aerial vehicle track generation, and provide a feasible solution for brain-computer interfaces and the unmanned aerial vehicle field.

title: Educational robot-based intelligent system and method for integrating mental health assessment in interest scene
abstract: The invention discloses an intelligent system and method for integrating mental health assessment in an interest scene based on an educational robot. The system realizes non-invasive psychological health assessment by constructing a technical architecture of multi-mode biological feature anonymization-quantum hybrid encryption-federal learning privacy protection-dynamic risk assessment. The method comprises the following steps of (1) generating irreversible biological feature codes by adopting a chaotic random number generator and combining a double hash chain technology to realize anonymization association, (2) designing a quantum enhanced hybrid encryption system, fusing an SM4 algorithm and NTRU (synchronous digital hierarchy) and then carrying out quantum cryptography and quantum key distribution, (3) developing a dynamic scene generator, naturally integrating psychological test questions into interest topics by utilizing a generated countermeasure network (GAN) and a Haoqi engine, (4) constructing a multi-mode emotion analysis system and combining an LSTM+CNN hybrid model to realize physiological-behavior-voice data fusion analysis, and (5) deploying a federal learning framework and protecting model training data by differential privacy noise injection (epsilon=0.5).

title: Systems, circuits and computer program products providing a framework for secured collaborative training using hyper-dimensional vector based data encoding/decoding and related methods
abstract: A computing system can include a plurality of clients located outside a cloud-based computing environment, where each of the clients may be configured to encode respective original data with a respective unique secret key to generate data hypervectors that encode the original data. A collaborative machine learning system can operate in the cloud-based computing environment and can be operatively coupled to the plurality of clients, where the collaborative machine learning system can be configured to operate on the data hypervectors that encode the original data to train a machine learning model operated by the collaborative machine learning system or to generate an inference from the machine learning model.

title: Anonymizing data for preserving privacy during use for federated machine learning
abstract: A computer-implemented method for training a global federated learning model using an aggregator server includes training multiple local models at respective local nodes. Each local node selects a set of attributes from its training dataset for training its local model. Each local node generates an anonymized training dataset by using a syntactic anonymization method, and by selecting quasi-identifying attributes from training attributes, and generalizing the quasi-identifying attributes using a syntactic algorithm. Further, each local node computes a syntactic mapping based on equivalence classes produced in the anonymized training dataset. The aggregator server computes a union of mappings received from all the local nodes. Further, federated learning includes training the global federated learning model by iteratively sending, by the local nodes to the aggregator server, parameter updates computed over the local models. The aggregator server aggregates the received parameter updates, and sends the aggregated parameters to the local nodes.

title: Social media and social networks for event credentialing
abstract: Event management includes enrolling prospective participants by associating each participant with a profile. The profile includes the participant's attributes which are vetted automatically or by social networking means. A token is assigned to each profile which enables access to the profiles. An event is created and associated with event access control rules which correspond to various attributes. Access to the event involves scanning the token, accessing a participant's profile and testing attributes in the profile relative to the access control rules. The token can be re-used at different events having different access control rules.

title: Organizational risk management subscription service
abstract: An organizational risk management service includes a risk assessment and mitigation platform for evaluating organizational risk. The service includes interfaces for managing connections with organizational and external systems for intake of messaging that provides information which is analyzed to define risks faced by an organization. This risk is defined by analyzing this messaging and its metadata with a system manager, a rules engine, and a message manager. The service and platform models responses to address the risks faced by the organization, and generates event relays that comprise communications, alerts, notifications, instructions, and other information for registered users, and external systems that enable actions for addressing and mitigating the risk and compliance with organizational policies and procedures.

title: Federal learning training platform and method applied to wireless perception scene
abstract: The disclosure relates to the technical field of wireless perception, in particular to a federal learning training platform and a training method applied to a wireless perception scene, wherein the federal learning training platform comprises: the wireless perception system comprises WiFi equipment and a local server; the WiFi equipment is used for acquiring a wireless signal containing object state information and transmitting the wireless signal to the local server; the local server is used for locally updating the pre-training model to obtain an edge model; the regional server is used for performing model training in cooperation with at least one local server establishing communication, and performing regional aggregation on updated model parameters after local updating is completed to obtain a regional model; and the cloud server is used for performing model training in cooperation with at least one regional server establishing communication, and further updating the regional model by utilizing an individualized federated learning algorithm after the regional model is updated. According to the technical scheme, more users are allowed to participate through a multi-level federal learning framework, and the generalization performance of the machine learning model is improved.

title: Relevance based digital building
abstract: The Relevance Based Digital Building [RBDB] invention describes a method and apparatus consisting of a hardware and software environment that creates a relevance based digital building intelligence system. RBDB defines a Network Lighting System [NLS] that delivers the network fabric for an array of intelligent luminaries configured with Internet of Things [IoT] devices. Layered on the NLS network fabric is a Digital Building Intelligence information architecture that enables the building to become Self-Aware with Digital Personas. The building can manage many of its own needs through operational optimization, Machine to Machine [M2M] and machine to stakeholder interactions. RBDB allows the stakeholders associated with the building to take on a multiplicity of digital personas enabling high relevance interactions with the building and each other through these digital intelligence representations. The digital building adapts to the occupants (stakeholders) preferences and requirements and empowers he interaction between individuals (stakeholders) and their environment (Digital Building Intelligence).

title: System and method to aid in the identification of individuals and groups with a probability of being distressed or disturbed
abstract: A computer implemented method, apparatus, and computer usable program code for inferring a probability of a first inference absent from a database at which a query regarding the inference is received. The first inference relates to identifying a potentially violent person or group. Each datum of the database is conformed to the dimensions of the database. Each datum of the plurality of data has associated metadata and an associated key. The associated metadata includes data regarding cohorts associated with the corresponding datum, data regarding hierarchies associated with the corresponding datum, data regarding a corresponding source of the datum, and data regarding probabilities associated with integrity, reliability, and importance of each associated datum. The query is used as a frame of reference for the search. The database returns a probability of the correctness of the first inference based on the query and on the data.

title: Model training method and device and computer readable storage medium
abstract: The embodiment of the application provides a model training method, a device and a computer readable storage medium; the method comprises the following steps: acquiring a first target sample and a second target sample; mixing the common samples of the first target sample and the second target sample based on the second target sample to obtain a mixed common sample; respectively decrypting the public sample and the mixed public sample to obtain a target sample and a target mixed sample; sending the target mixed sample to the second device, so that the second device performs model training based on the target mixed sample and the first device in cooperation to determine second model parameters; and performing model training based on the cooperation of the target sample and the second equipment, and determining a first model parameter so as to complete the training of the prediction model, wherein the first model parameter is used for completing a prediction task of the prediction model by combining with the second model parameter. Through the embodiment of the application, the data security in the model training process can be improved.

title: Secure Distributed Patient Consent and Information Management
abstract: Mechanisms are provided to implement secure distributed patient consent and patient information management that addresses the competing needs for efficient access to electronic medical records by authorized parties while maintaining protection of privacy of patient health related information and complying with governing regulations. The mechanisms of the illustrative embodiments implement a tamper-proof and immutable ledger storage system to manage patient consent information and distribution of patient information based on the patient consent information. The ledger storage system operates in conjunction with a master patient record index (MPRI) component to enable the exchange of patient information among health providers once consent has been granted by the patient. Once provided with a record locator from the MPRI, a health provider can directly request patient information from another health provider, where the patient information resides as indicated by the record locator, or an intermediary data hub implementation may be utilized.

title: Data processing method, device, electronic equipment and storage medium
abstract: The embodiment of the application discloses a data processing method, a data processing device, electronic equipment and a storage medium. The method comprises the following steps: responding to a data forgetting request, and acquiring a model to be trained and data to be forgotten; generating a random label corresponding to the data to be forgotten; and training the model to be trained through the random label until the training ending condition is met, so as to obtain a target model. By the method, original knowledge can be protected from catastrophic forgetting in the forgetting process, and the stability of the whole federal training target is ensured.

title: Federated learning using heterogeneous labels
abstract: A method for distributed learning at a local computing device is provided. The method includes: training a local model of a first model type on local data, wherein the local data comprises a first set of labels; testing the local model on a portion of global data pertaining to the first set of labels, wherein the global data comprises a second set of labels and the first set of labels is a strict subset of the second set of labels; as a result of testing the local model on the portion of the global data pertaining to the first set of labels, producing a first set of probabilities corresponding to the first set of labels; and sending the first set of probabilities corresponding to the first set of labels to a central computing device.

title: Training a network to inhibit performance of a secondary task
abstract: The present disclosure describes techniques for training a neural network such that the trained network can be implemented to perform a utility task (e.g., a classification task) while inhibiting performance of a secondary task (e.g., a privacy-violating task). In some embodiments, the techniques include training a neural network using a first loss associated with a first task and a second loss associated with a second task different from the first task. In some embodiments, this includes performing a first training operation associated with the first loss, and performing a second training operation associated with the second loss, wherein the second training operation includes providing, to the neural network, a plurality of input items associated with the second task.

title: Sensitive Site Exploitation (SSE) & Forensic Collection (FC) Training Facility, System and Method
abstract: A system, method and facility for providing training, which may include basic, initial, developmental, intermediate, advanced, sustainment, training, mission rehearsals, exercises, annual events, missions, and practice scenarios, etc. Training may include props and reconfigurable scenarios simulating, e.g., a sensitive site exploitation (SSE) or forensic collection (FC) training scenario, etc. The method may include providing a reconfigurable training area which may be enclosed, in a building, or may be outdoors, or partially in and outdoors. The training area may provide a plurality of reconfigurable wall panels; and providing at least one moveable element in the reconfigurable training area. The training area may include providing an observation area for observing the training scenarios being conducted in the reconfigurable training area. The method may include providing an open, transparent, or one directionally transparent ceiling or wall to allow observation of the reconfigurable training area. An observation deck may be provided as part of the observation area for viewing the reconfigurable training area. Alternatively, the method may include one or more of: providing a display coupled to at least one of a stored video stream, or a live video stream from at least one camera in the reconfigurable training area.

title: Federal learning method, device, equipment and storage medium based on blockchain
abstract: The invention discloses a federal learning method, a federal learning device, federal learning equipment and a federal learning storage medium based on a blockchain. The method comprises the following steps: when a federal learning training example starting instruction sent by a business layer is received, creating a sub-ledger, wherein the federal learning training example starting instruction carries training data of at least two participant nodes and training algorithm intelligent contracts corresponding to each participant node; storing the training data to private data storage areas of the respective participant nodes; invoking a training algorithm intelligent contract installed on each participant node, and performing model training on a target model on the sub-ledger based on the training data to obtain an encryption intermediate training model; after the third party secure multiparty computing service node detects the encrypted intermediate training model submitted by each participant node, the encrypted intermediate training model submitted by each participant node is subjected to aggregation operation by using the intelligent contract, and an encrypted aggregation federation model is obtained.

title: Privacy protection model training method and system
abstract: The present disclosure relates to the field of machine learning, and in particular, to a privacy-preserving model training method and system. The method comprises the steps of obtaining an initial output matrix based on a training sample and a first part of a model; adding disturbance noise to the initial output matrix, and performing sparsification to obtain a disturbance output matrix; transmitting the disturbance output matrix to the server so that the server processes the disturbance output matrix by using a second part of the model to obtain a model prediction result; determining a loss function value based on label data and the prediction result; transmitting the loss function value to a server, and receiving an output gradient matrix returned by the server; calculating gradient information corresponding to each model parameter in the first part of the model based on the output gradient matrix; updating model parameters of a first portion of a model based on the gradient information; a next iteration update is performed or the first part of the final model is determined based thereon.

title: System and method for deriving a hierarchical event based database optimized for pharmaceutical analysis
abstract: A computer implemented method, apparatus, and computer usable program code for inferring a probability of a first inference absent from a database at which a query regarding the inference is received. Each datum of the database is conformed to the dimensions of the database. Each datum of the plurality of data has associated metadata and an associated key. The associated metadata includes data regarding cohorts associated with the corresponding datum, data regarding hierarchies associated with the corresponding datum, data regarding a corresponding source of the datum, and data regarding probabilities associated with integrity, reliability, and importance of each associated datum. The query is used as a frame of reference for the search. The database returns a probability of the correctness of the first inference based on the query and on the data.

title: Systems and methods for enhancing data protection by anonosizing structured and unstructured data and incorporating machine learning and artificial intelligence in classical and quantum computing environments
abstract: Systems, computer-readable media, and methods for improving both data privacy/anonymity and data value, wherein real-world, synthetic, or other data related to a data subject can be used while minimizing re-identification risk by unauthorized parties and enabling data, including quasi-identifiers, related to the data subject to be disclosed to any authorized party by granting access only to the data relevant to that authorized party's purpose, time period, purpose, place and/or other criterion via the required obfuscation of specific data values, e.g., pursuant to the GDPR or HIPAA, by incorporating a given range of those values into a cohort, wherein only the defined cohort values are disclosed to the given authorized party. Privacy policies may include any privacy enhancement techniques (PET), including: data protection, dynamic de-identification, anonymity, pseudonymity, granularization, and/or obscurity policies. Such systems, media and methods may be implemented on both classical and quantum computing devices.

title: Classification decision tree model-based classification method and device and electronic equipment
abstract: The application provides a classification method, a classification device, an electronic device, a computer readable storage medium and a computer program product based on a classification decision tree model; applied to a first participant device, the method comprises: acquiring the identification of a target leaf node in the classification decision tree model sent by the second participant equipment; obtaining the score of the classification category corresponding to the target leaf node based on the mark of the target leaf node, the mark of the leaf node in the classification decision tree model and the mapping relation of the score of the corresponding classification category; privacy protection processing is carried out on the scores to obtain corresponding expanded scores; the expansion scores are sent to third participant equipment, so that the third participant equipment carries out fusion processing on the expansion scores sent by the at least two first participant equipment, and classification results corresponding to the data to be classified are obtained and returned to the first participant equipment; and receiving and outputting a classification result corresponding to the data to be classified. According to the method and the device, the accuracy of classification prediction can be improved.

title: Policy based artificial intelligence engine
abstract: Systems and methods to provide a recommendation for an action based on an application policy are disclosed. The application policy may be associated with an organization. An application policy engine can use an artificial intelligence (AI) engine to execute a machine learning (ML) model. The application policy engine may receive real time video data or audio data, and obtain metadata comprising reference data or environment data. The application policy engine can process the real time video data or audio data using the ML model to infer biometric characteristics associated with a subject. The application policy engine can determine if the application policy was met, conformed to, or missed based on a correlation between the metadata and the inferred biometric characteristics, and provide a corresponding recommendation for an action.

title: Evaluation of two-party privacy-preserving decision trees using additive homomorphic encryption
abstract: Disclosed herein are system, method, and computer program product embodiments for evaluating decision trees in a privacy preserving manner. In an embodiment, a first server receives a first portion of a decision tree and encrypted input data from a client, wherein the input data includes a set of attributes. The second server receives a second portion of the decision tree. Each of the first server and the second server communicates with the other server to calculate a classification result for the encrypted input data using the respective portion of the decision tree received thereby and a secure multiparty calculation method that includes additive homomorphic encryption and careless transmission such that the classification result is calculated without decrypting the encrypted input data and such that the classification result is ultimately received by the first server. The first server then sends the classification result to the client.

title: A Federated Learning-Based Approach to Enhance the Defense Capability of Neural Networks
abstract: The invention provides a method for enhancing the defense capacity of a neural network based on federal learning, which comprises the following steps: s1, using federal learning to make data stay in local and prevent data privacy from leaking, cooperating with each party to carry out distributed model training, encrypting the intermediate result to protect data safety, and fusing multi-party models after summarizing to obtain a federal model. And S2, establishing a confrontation sample, and quickly searching the confrontation sample by adopting an algorithm. The method combines the federal learning and the training process of the neural network model, solves the difficulty that the data set cannot circulate due to the consideration of privacy protection and the limitation of laws and regulations, saves the trouble of data collection, simultaneously enriches and is more independent of the training set of the neural network model, and overcomes the capability that the neural network model is easily attacked by countermeasures due to the imperfection of the training set.

title: Method, device, equipment and medium for generating training data for federal learning
abstract: The embodiment of the disclosure discloses a method, a device, equipment and a medium for generating training data for federal learning, wherein the method comprises the following steps: the first computing device and the second computing device respectively process the first sample data set and the second sample data set by utilizing a privacy intersection mode and a multiparty security computing mode to obtain a characteristic data matrix and a tag data column vector of a secret sharing state corresponding to the identification intersection of the first sample data set and the second sample data set, and then a training data set of the secret sharing state of each party is constructed through the characteristic data matrix and the tag data column vector of the secret sharing state. The method and the device not only ensure the privacy of the data of the non-identification intersection part in the first sample data set and the second sample data set, but also solve the problem of data island, and further improve the performance of the model obtained through training.

title: System and method for unauthorized activity detection
abstract: An authorization access system and method of minimizing unauthorized access to a resource are provided. The authorization access system comprises at least one processor, and a memory storing instructions which when executed by the at least one processor configure the at least one processor to perform the method. The method comprises assigning a first risk score to application programming interface (API) traffic associated with a user device and/or user behaviour pattern observed prior to an API gateway, assigning a second risk score to the API traffic associated with the user device observed at the API gateway, assigning a third risk score to the API traffic associated with the user device and/or back end service responses observed after the API gateway, and performing an authorization action based on any of the first, second or third risk scores.

title: System and method of accident investigation for complex situations involving numerous known and unknown factors along with their probabilistic weightings
abstract: A computer implemented method, apparatus, and computer usable program code for inferring a probability of a first inference related to a chaotic event. Each datum of the database is conformed to the dimensions of the database. Each datum of the plurality of data has associated metadata and an associated key. The query is used as a frame of reference for the search. The database returns a probability of the correctness of the first inference based on the query and on the data. The probability of the first inference relates to a cause of the chaotic event, an affect of the chaotic event, an effect of the chaotic event, whether an event is related to the chaotic event, a whether an object is related to the chaotic event, and combinations thereof.

title: Image-aided data collection and retrieval
abstract: The disclosed invention includes a method and a system for performing image-aided data collection and retrieval, where the data collection and retrieval is related to one or more persons, or subjects or objects associated with one or more persons. The data collection and retrieval is performed with the help of one or more images that contain one or more objects of interest and at least some annotation data related to at least one object of interest. The data collection and retrieval involves: image and annotation collection, image analysis and searching for similar images, data searching and processing, results aggregation and presentation, and optionally collection of feedback.

title: Data security protection method based on trusted encryption mechanism and anomaly detection
abstract: The invention discloses a data safety protection method based on a trusted encryption mechanism and anomaly detection, which comprises the steps of firstly using data anomaly detection based on data distribution characteristics to primarily screen anomaly data, then using an original data trusted encryption mechanism based on homomorphic encryption and differential privacy to ensure data safety and privacy, sharing data through a federal learning model of parameter encryption and trusted aggregation, and finally rejecting malicious parameter update through a federal learning post gate detection algorithm based on malicious scores. Through the steps, the data can be safely and privacy protected, and meanwhile, the efficient sharing of the user data is effectively guaranteed.

title: Key methods of multi-modal information fusion based on data privacy protection
abstract: The invention discloses a multi-mode information fusion key method based on data privacy protection, which is characterized in that a multi-mode learning method is deployed in a federal learning environment so that information intercommunication does not exist among modes, and a global server cannot realize multi-mode information fusion under the condition that local client data cannot be obtained. The method is used for fusing the multi-mode data in the source data isolation state and extracting the semantic and characteristic information of the multi-mode data. An effective scheme is provided for the sensitive data to safely participate in multi-view cooperation and intelligent decision making, and the specificity and commonality of semantic and characteristic information are considered. The technology supports multi-mechanism cooperation to perform more accurate multi-mode data fusion, and can be applied to various scene modes. Greatly promotes the development of third party service providing companies, and brings benefits to users and enterprises.

title: Calculation method and device based on distributed training system
abstract: The disclosure provides a calculation method and a calculation device based on a distributed training system. A distributed training system comprising a plurality of training members, the plurality of training members comprising a plurality of roles, the training members of different ones of the plurality of roles performing different operations during training of a machine learning model, the method being applied to a first training member of the plurality of training members, the method comprising: acquiring a plurality of models, wherein the plurality of models are respectively used for defining a plurality of computing operations related to training of a machine learning model; inputting a plurality of models into a distributed model to initialize the distributed model, wherein the distributed model is provided with a first function, and the first function is used for defining calculation operation and communication operation which are required to be executed by each of a plurality of roles in the training process; in the training process, according to the distributed model, computing operation and communication operation corresponding to the roles of the first training member are executed.

title: Systems, media, and methods for identifying, determining, measuring, scoring, and/or predicting one or more data privacy issues and/or remediating the one or more data privacy issues
abstract: In an embodiment, sources may be scanned to obtain and classify client data. The classified client data may be required to or encouraged to satisfy a privacy rule/regulation. In an embodiment, a geographic privacy posture may be determined for the client data, where the geographic privacy posture may represent an indication as to whether the client data is or may potentially be susceptible/vulnerable to risk, e.g., privacy risk, based on one or more of the factors. If the client data is or may potentially be susceptible/vulnerable to privacy risk, the geographic privacy posture may also indicate or quantify, based on the one or more factors, a level of the privacy risk. Based on the determined geographic privacy posture, the one or more embodiments described herein may determine one or more protective custodial measures that can be implemented such that privacy protection of the client data improves.

title: System and method for deriving a hierarchical event based database optimized for analysis of biological systems
abstract: A computer implemented method, apparatus, and computer usable program code for inferring a probability of a first inference absent from a database at which a query regarding the inference is received. Each datum of the database is conformed to the dimensions of the database. Each datum of the plurality of data has associated metadata and an associated key. The associated metadata includes data regarding cohorts associated with the corresponding datum, data regarding hierarchies associated with the corresponding datum, data regarding a corresponding source of the datum, and data regarding probabilities associated with integrity, reliability, and importance of each associated datum. The query is used as a frame of reference for the search. The database returns a probability of the correctness of the first inference based on the query and on the data.

title: Providing differentially private data with causality preservation
abstract: A method is disclosed for providing sanitized log data to a threat detection system. The sanitized log data is derived from a log table with continuous columns, themselves having continuous entries with continuous values. First, a retention probability parameter and an accuracy radius parameter are selected. Next, a probability distribution function is initialized with the retention probability parameter and the accuracy radius parameter. For each continuous value, the probability distribution function is applied, resulting in perturbed continuous values of a perturbed continuous columns Finally, the perturbed continuous columns are provided as the sanitized log.

title: Data processing system and method between bank and government affairs based on federal learning
abstract: The invention discloses a system and a method for processing data between banks and government affairs based on federal learning. The bank data and the government affair data are stored in a federal learning system; preprocessing the bank data and the government affair data; encrypting the respective real feature names of the bank data and the government affair data; carrying out data alignment on the encrypted bank data and government affair data; performing characteristic engineering on the aligned data according to the required specifications; carrying out homomorphic encryption on the processed respective data to obtain respective training data; the initiator constructs a preliminary federal learning model based on a bank end and a government end; respectively inputting respective training data into a federal learning system at two ends for joint training modeling to generate a final federal learning model; and performing joint prediction on actual service data by using the generated federated learning model and returning a result to the initiator. The invention solves the data islanding effect at present and can carry out combined modeling by adopting data without going out locally.

title: Elevating trust in user identity during RESTful authentication and authorization
abstract: Credentials sent over a back channel during the authentication of a user to a RESTful service can elevate the trust the recipient system can place in the user's identity. The addition of an identity credential of higher strength can increase confidence in user identities electronically presented with a lower strength credential. Attributes from either credential can be used to determine authorization to a protected resource.

title: System and method for deriving a hierarchical event based database optimized for privacy and security filtering
abstract: Inferring a probability of a first inference absent from a database. Each datum of the database is conformed to the dimensions of the database. Each datum of the plurality of data has associated metadata and an associated key. The associated metadata includes data regarding cohorts associated with the corresponding datum, data regarding hierarchies associated with the corresponding datum, data regarding a corresponding source of the datum, and data regarding probabilities associated with integrity, reliability, and importance of each associated datum. The query is used as a frame of reference for the search. The database returns a probability of the correctness of the first inference based on the query and on the data. Security filtering is performed based on at least one of a significance level of the probability of the first inference, the probability itself exceeding a pre-selected value, and a security level possessed by a user.

title: System and method for deriving a hierarchical event based database optimized for analysis of criminal and security information
abstract: A computer implemented method, apparatus, and computer usable program code for inferring a probability of a first inference absent from a database at which a query regarding the inference is received. Each datum of the database is conformed to the dimensions of the database. Each datum of the plurality of data has associated metadata and an associated key.
