abstract: The invention relates to a pedestrian re-identification method for privacy protection, which comprises the following steps of S1, data preparation, S2, S3, frequency domain conversion, S4, characteristic enhancement, S5, namely, calculating cross entropy total loss and total loss of a generator in a model pedestrian re-identification task, S6, namely, supplementing the model to anonymized low-frequency information sent by a client, carrying out the task of pedestrian re-identification again by the model after supplementing the information, calculating the cross entropy loss and the total loss of the generator, and S7, namely, repeating S4-S6 until a generated model test result accords with expectations or reaches training times.

title: Re-identifying pseudonymized or de-identified data utilizing distributed ledger technology
abstract: A system, method, and computer-readable medium are disclosed for providing auditability of a distributed ledger technology (DLT) of de-identified data of entities, stored in the DLT. In certain embodiments, data related to an entity is de-identified. The de-identified data is stored in the DLT. Access to the de-identified data is determined. Instances of access to the de-identified data is recorded to the DLT. In certain embodiments, information used to re-identify the de-identified data is store on the DLT. Access to the information can also be determined and recorded to the DLT.

title: Privacy compliance method for lake and warehouse integrated data analysis
abstract: The invention relates to the field of data processing, and discloses a privacy compliance method for integrated data analysis of a lake and a warehouse, which comprises the following steps: the compliance auditor builds a alliance blockchain; compliance auditors deploy intelligent contracts in the federated blockchain; the lake and storehouse integrated platform stores data generated by different devices of a data owner, the data analysis mechanism sends a data access request to the lake and storehouse integrated platform, and the lake and storehouse integrated platform uses a trusted execution environment to respectively judge whether data in sub-requests corresponding to the data access request belong to a set in a target strategy or not, and determines a verification result of the sub-requests; the lake and warehouse integrated platform updates the reputation value of the data analysis mechanism in the supervision contract based on the verification result; if the verification result is passed, the lake and warehouse integrated platform performs data analysis on the data access request and returns the data analysis result to the data analysis mechanism.

title: Systems and methods for enforcing privacy-respectful, trusted communications
abstract: Systems, computer-readable media, and methods for improving data privacy/ anonymity and data value, wherein data related to a data subj ect can be used and stored, while minimizing re-identification risk by unauthorized parties and enabling data related to the data subject to be disclosed to an authorized party by granting access only to the data relevant to that authorized party's purpose, time period, place and/or other criterion via the obfuscation of specific data values. The techniques described herein maintain this level of privacy/anonymity, while still empowering Data Subjects, e.g., consumers or customers of such authorized parties, e.g., business entities, by enabling them to request or specify their desired level of engagement with such business entities. Data Subjects may then receive privacy-respectful, trusted communication, e.g., advertising materials, based on their inclusion in dynamically changing cohorts or microsegments ("MSegs") of individuals sharing similar characteristics and having a sufficient size to satisfy, e.g., "k-anonymity" requirements.

title: A finger vein recognition method based on block federated learning
abstract: The invention belongs to the field of finger vein recognition, and discloses a finger vein recognition method based on block federal learning, which comprises the following steps: the method comprises the steps that a global feature extraction module after pre-training and a personalized module after pre-training are obtained through a central server, and are issued to a plurality of clients; training each pre-trained module through a client to obtain an updated global feature extraction module and an updated personalized module; the client side performs independent training on the updated personalized module, and sends the updated global feature extraction module to the central server side for weighted average calculation; judging whether the current training round reaches a specified value or not through the central server, if so, finishing training, sending the global feature extraction module after weighted average calculation to the client and informing the client to stop training. The technical scheme of the invention can improve the performance of the identification system under the terminal equipment and can also effectively protect the privacy of the vein template of the user.

title: Event evaluation using functions
abstract: According to one aspect, a first node for evaluating an event using a function is provided. A corresponding computer-implemented method of operating a first node to evaluate an event using a function is also provided. The function is evaluated by two parties using garbled circuits, where each party performs garbled processing on the circuit representing the function and evaluates the circuit garbled by the other party.

title: Electronic academic certificate management system based on alliance chain
abstract: The invention relates to an electronic academic stand license management system based on a alliance chain, and belongs to the technical field of block chains. The specific implementation scheme is as follows: a brand-new electronic academic degree license management system is provided, and colleges and universities and education departments are divided according to region and administrative levels based on an electronic academic degree license and a block chain technology, and college chains and department chains are respectively established. Based on a relay cross-link technology, data sharing and uplink among different block chains are realized, and a multi-channel multi-organization multi-level trust alliance chain architecture is formed. On the premise of ensuring the privacy and the safety of the academic degree information, the architecture improves the academic degree management and cross-department sharing efficiency, and provides a reliable solution for acquisition and sharing of the academic degree information.

title: Abnormality detection method and apparatus for accounts in federal learning system, and electronic device
abstract: Provided are an abnormality detection method and apparatus for accounts in a federal learning system, an electronic device, a storage medium, and a computer program product. The federal learning system at least comprises a first participant device and a second participant device. The method is applied to the first participant device, and comprises: by using a transaction account to be tested as a central node and by using a first transaction account in a first participant device and a second transaction account in a second participant device as outer nodes of the central node, constructing a transaction network graph corresponding to the transaction account to be tested (101), both the first transaction account and the second transaction account having a transaction relationship with the transaction account to be tested; performing feature aggregation processing on node features of the nodes in the transaction network graph, to obtain an aggregated feature corresponding to the transaction account to be tested (102); and on the basis of the aggregated feature, performing abnormality identification on the transaction account to be tested, so as to determine whether the transaction account to be tested is an abnormal transaction account (103).

title: Knowledge graph representation learning enhancement method and device based on encrypted federated learning
abstract: The invention belongs to the technical field of knowledge graph representation learning, and provides a knowledge graph representation learning enhancement method based on encryption federation learning. The invention also provides an asynchronous training device, a generative confrontation learning device and a federal learning device so as to implement the method. The technical scheme provided by the invention realizes the federal learning under multiple knowledge maps among distrusted data providers under homomorphic encryption, and enhances the representation learning capability of the respective knowledge maps of the data providers.

title: A personalized federated learning method and device for dealing with imbalanced data
abstract: The invention discloses an individualized federal learning method and an individualized federal learning device for processing unbalanced data, and belongs to the technical field of machine learning. The method specifically comprises the following steps: the central server establishes a global network model and distributes the global network model to the client; the client-side trains through a comparison learning algorithm according to the private data of the client-side, and returns the updated basic coding layer parameters to the central server; the central server recalculates the basic coding layer parameters of the global network model and the local network model of each client according to all the client parameters and respectively sends the basic coding layer parameters to each client; and the client updates the local network and conducts iterative training until the global network model converges or reaches the specified training times. The invention adopts a model training method of personalized federal learning and contrast learning, ensures the privacy and the safety of each party of data, and aims at the target network high-efficiency training of unbalanced data, thereby improving the convergence rate and the generalization capability of the model.

title: Risk data monitoring method, apparatus, system, electronic device and storage medium
abstract: The disclosure provides a risk data monitoring method, a device, a system, an electronic device and a storage medium, wherein the risk data monitoring method comprises the following steps: acquiring characteristic information of a monitored object; according to the characteristic information of the monitored object and the comprehensive risk assessment parameters determined in advance through the central node, determining the comprehensive risk assessment result of the monitored object, wherein the comprehensive risk assessment parameters are obtained by the central node for aggregating the risk assessment parameters of all the edge nodes, and the risk assessment parameters of each edge node comprise: each edge node utilizes local data to train model parameters obtained by the risk assessment model and utilizes the entropy method to determine weight parameters of one or more risk factors. According to the risk data monitoring method and device, the risk assessment parameters are calculated at each edge node by utilizing privacy calculation, the risk assessment parameters are aggregated at the center node, the comprehensive risk assessment result is determined, the privacy of data information is guaranteed, and the efficiency of risk data monitoring is improved.

title: Litigation support in cloud-hosted file sharing and collaboration
abstract: In embodiments, the disclosure provides a method for managing content, including providing an electronic discovery facility of a secure data exchange environment, wherein at least one of a plurality of users of a first entity utilizes a network-based content storage service of a second entity to store content, and wherein the storage and access of the content with the network-based content storage service is tracked by the electronic discovery facility. The method includes receiving, at the electronic discovery facility, a discovery request, the discovery request comprising a request for a legal counsel of a third entity to access content stored on the network-based content storage service, the discovery request being, for example, in association with a litigation discovery action in relation to the first entity. Further, the method includes identifying and securing, by the electronic discovery facility and as a result of the discovery request, at least one item of content on the network-based content storage service; and providing, by the electronic discovery facility of the secure data exchange environment, access to the identified and secured item of content stored on network-based content storage service to the legal counsel of the third entity.

title: Heterogeneous graph data node embedded feature extraction model training method, embedded feature extraction method, node classification method and device
abstract: The invention provides a heterogeneous graph data node embedded feature extraction model training method, an embedded feature extraction method, a node classification method and a device, wherein a generator and a discriminator are locally constructed at each client based on a federal learning mode to train a local model by using antagonism learning, and model parameters are aggregated at a central server, so that data privacy is effectively ensured. Meanwhile, in the process of local training, each client acquires the original characteristics of the target node-associated cross-client neighbor nodes through cross-client communication, and various neighbors based on top-k random walk-flat sampling participate in embedded learning, so that the influence of client data difference on training is reduced, the learning quality of the federal heterogeneous graph neural network is improved, and the execution efficiency of downstream subtasks is improved.

title: System and method for monitoring and grading a cybersecurity framework
abstract: A cybersecurity system is provided that sums and scores one or more cybersecurity controls for different client computing systems that each have different attributes, needs, and interests. In addition, the cybersecurity system provides to each different client computing system auto-suggestions that suggest one or more ways in which the client computing system may improve the confidentiality, integrity, and availability of the information stored on the client computing system and/or improve the confidentiality, integrity, and availability of the underlying characteristics of the client computing system. In addition, the cybersecurity system verifies that the functioning of the client computing system has improved.

title: Safe feature selection method applied to longitudinal federal learning
abstract: The invention provides a safe feature selection method applied to longitudinal federal learning. One of the protocols builds on lightweight additive secret sharing techniques to protect privacy features, but also introduces a small amount of additional computational overhead. The other uses both secret sharing and linear homomorphic encryption techniques. The scheme of the invention is compatible with most of the existing machine learning models in the longitudinal federal learning, and can be integrated into the existing longitudinal federal learning system with privacy protection as a plug-and-play module so as to further improve the training efficiency and the model accuracy.

title: System for secure federated learning
abstract: A method for performing federated learning includes initializing, by a server, a global model G0. The server shares G0 with a plurality of participants (N) using a secure communications channel. The server selects n out of N participants, according to filtering criteria, to contribute training for a round r. The server partitions the selected participants n into s groups and informs each participant about the other participants belonging to the same group. The server obtains aggregated group updates AU1, . . . , AUg from each group and compares the aggregated group updates and identifies suspicious aggregated group updates. The server combines the aggregated group updates by excluding the updates identified as suspicious, to obtain an aggregated update Ufinal. The server derives a new global model Gr from the previous model Gr-1 and the aggregated update Ufinal and shares Gr with the plurality of participants.

title: Method and system for generating and submitting a petition
abstract: The present invention is in the field of petition submissions to various agencies. Specifically a computer-implemented method of petition submission, comprising: identifying, by one or more processors, a topic for a petition, establishing, by one or more processors, the petition receiving agency, determining, by one or more processors, the petition receiving agency parameters, generating, by one or more processors, a petition, wherein the petition requirements are based on the determined petition receiving agency parameters, receiving, by one or more processors, a signature, wherein the signature is associated with the petition, analyzing, by one or more processors, the signature, to determine if the signature meets the petition requirements set forth, and submitting, by one or more processors, the signature associated with the petition to the petition receiving agency.

title: System, method, and apparatus for data cognition incorporating autonomous security protection
abstract: A method, apparatus and computer readable medium for data cognition incorporating autonomous security protection including, a data file stored on a storage medium, and having stored instructions for an embedded autonomous executable program which is executed each time there is an attempt to access, control, or manipulate the file, a processor for executing the program, an output device for communicating to a user, where communication is based on the result of executing the program in relation to parameters required for the data file by a data file original creator, and an input device for receiving a response to the communication. The method, apparatus, and computer readable medium autonomously monitors for a state change and analyzes the current user to determine if an instantiation should exist. If affirmed, a cognition engine automatically configures a computational environment in which it resides. If denied, environmental behavior is further analyzed for security problems.

title: Computer-implemented method and data processing system for testing device security
abstract: A computer-implemented method (50) and a data processing system (10) for testing device security are provided. The method (50) includes executing on one or more processors the steps of: receiving a configuration file (52); executing a plurality of security tests on a device (54) based on the configuration file received; identifying a suspected 0 application on the device (56) from the security tests; simulating a test condition (58) to trigger an attack on the device by the suspected application; monitoring a behaviour of the device (60) under the simulated test condition; and performing a forensic data analysis on the behaviour of the device (62) under the simulated test condition.

title: Training method and device for multi-classification model, electronic equipment and storage medium
abstract: The invention provides a training method, a training device, electronic equipment, a storage medium and a computer program product of a multi-classification model, wherein the method comprises the following steps: acquiring a training sample carrying a two-class label, wherein the two-class label is used for indicating a two-class result corresponding to the training sample; performing label conversion on the training sample to enable the training sample to carry multi-classification labels, wherein the multi-classification labels are used for indicating multi-classification results corresponding to the training sample; acquiring a multi-classification prediction result sent by the second participant equipment, wherein the multi-classification prediction result is obtained by predicting a training sample carrying multi-classification labels through a multi-classification model; performing result conversion on the multi-classification prediction result to obtain a prediction result of the multi-classification model corresponding to the two classifications; based on the difference between the classification prediction result and the classification result indicated by the classification label, updating the parameters of the multi-classification model. Thus, the two-class problem is converted into the multi-class problem, and the label information is difficult to judge from the gradient information, so that the label information is protected from being leaked.

title: Document encryption and decryption
abstract: A document encryption and decryption system for selectively encrypting and decrypting files and any other items and method for same to protect or secure its contents by helping to prevent unauthorized individuals from viewing data in human-perceivable or readable form. The encryption system includes remote authentication to verify a user's credentials stored on a remote database hosted by a web server. The encryption system further includes remote delete to automatically delete encrypted items stored on the user's computer, handheld or portable device, smartphone, and any other computing device of any kind when it logs onto a network if the user's computer or computing device is reported lost, stolen, or otherwise compromised. Decryption keys allow selective decryption of encrypted items that are on the computer or computing device of any kind. A Windows Communication Foundation service helps with authenticating the users with the encryption key and login process stored and processed by the web server.

title: Federated clustering method and system, and computer storage medium
abstract: Disclosed in the present invention are a federated clustering method and system, and a computer storage medium. The method comprises: S101, acquiring a first data matrix and a first clustering center matrix of an initiator, and acquiring a plurality of second data matrices and a plurality of second clustering center matrices, which correspond to a plurality of participants; S102, performing splitting and splicing on the first data matrix, the first clustering center matrix, each second data matrix and each second clustering center matrix, so as to obtain a plurality of data fragment pairs and a plurality of clustering center fragment pairs; S103, updating the plurality of clustering center fragment pairs according to the plurality of data fragment pairs and the plurality of clustering center fragment pairs, so as to obtain a plurality of currently updated clustering center fragment pairs; and S104, repeating S103 until the difference between the sum of all currently updated clustering center fragments and the sum of all previously updated clustering center fragments is less than a preset threshold value, so as to obtain a target clustering center fragment. In the method, each computing power provider can only know fragment information of a clustering center, thereby ensuring the privacy of data.

title: Methods and systems for operating secure digital management aware applications
abstract: A system and method for servicing secure data object management aware applications using a cloud-based host environment and a local secure container. The cloud-based host environment creates a controlled digital object from a master digital object, and activates a tether associated with the controlled digital object. The tether includes an access permission, and optionally an operation permission (e.g., view, delete, store, edit, and copy) and a command (e.g., timeout, destroy). The controlled digital object is stored to an isolated storage of the secure container. The tether contents control access and manipulation of the controlled digital object. Certain conditions (e.g., timeout period reached, anomalous data access pattern detected), cause the controlled digital object to be destroyed and/or the tether to be inactivated. In accordance with applicable law, the cloud-based host environment utilizes the tether to detect, identify, and/or thwart unauthorized host environments in possession of the controlled digital object.

title: System and method for providing augmented reality effects and three-dimensional map construction associated with an interior space
abstract: Systems, methods, and non-transitory computer-readable media may obtain image data from a camera view associated with a computing device, where the image data is associated with an interior space. A portion of image data for displaying one or more Augmented Reality (AR) content items may be determined. An AR content item to be displayed in the camera view may be determined. The AR content item may be provided for presentation in the camera view based on the determined portion of the image data.

title: Method and system for secure digital object management
abstract: A system and method for secure data object management system comprising a cloud-based host environment and a local secure container. The cloud-based host environment creates a controlled digital object from a master digital object, and activates a tether associated with the controlled digital object. The tether includes an access permission, and optionally an operation permission (e.g., view, delete, store, edit, and copy) and a command (e.g., timeout, destroy). The controlled digital object is stored to an isolated storage of the secure container. The tether contents control access and manipulation of the controlled digital object. Certain conditions (e.g., timeout period reached, anomalous data access pattern detected), cause the controlled digital object to be destroyed and/or the tether to be inactivated. In accordance with applicable law, the cloud-based host environment utilizes the tether to detect, identify, and/or thwart unauthorized host environments in possession of the controlled digital object.

title: Federated model training method, device, terminal device and storage medium
abstract: The invention discloses a method and a device for training a federated model, terminal equipment and a storage medium, wherein a first participant performs homomorphic property calculation based on a first plaintext model weight random number and a second plaintext model random number ciphertext to generate a first model weight ciphertext, and generates and sends a first participant prediction output ciphertext to a second participant based on the first model weight ciphertext and first training data; the second participant obtains joint prediction output and a predicted value according to the prediction output of the first participant and the prediction output of the second participant; the second participant generates a combined prediction output gradient based on the prediction value, encrypts the combined prediction output gradient to obtain a combined prediction output gradient ciphertext, sends the combined prediction output gradient ciphertext to the first participant, and updates the weight of a second plaintext model according to the combined prediction output gradient; and the first participant outputs the gradient ciphertext according to the joint prediction to obtain a first model gradient ciphertext, and updates the first model weight ciphertext according to the first model gradient ciphertext. The invention improves the safety of the federal model training.

title: Federal learning method and system based on trusted execution environment
abstract: Embodiments of the present disclosure provide federal learning methods and systems based on trusted execution environments, wherein the methods are applied to a client comprising a local private computing node deployed within a trusted execution environment and a local public computing node deployed outside the trusted execution environment, comprising training a local pre-training model with local sample data by the local public computing node to obtain local training data; encrypting the local training data through the local privacy computing node to obtain local encrypted data; the local encryption data are sent to a server, and target encryption data returned by the server for the local encryption data are received; and updating the local pre-training model by the local privacy computing node through the target encryption data to obtain a target model. The communication data between the client and the server are processed in the trusted execution environment, so that the privacy and the safety of the data are improved.

title: Anti-email fraud management early warning method and system
abstract: The embodiment of the invention relates to the technical field of telecommunications, and discloses a reverse electricity fraud management early warning method, which comprises the following steps: receiving first cable data transmitted by a security management anti-electricity fraud internal system, wherein the first cable data is obtained through privacy calculation; and/or receiving second clue data transmitted by the financial terminal system, wherein the second clue data is obtained through privacy calculation; transmitting the first wire rope data and the second wire rope data to a pre-built anti-electricity fraud model to perform early warning identification so as to obtain a corresponding early warning identification result; and feeding back the early warning recognition result to the intelligent terminal of the corresponding user to carry out early warning reminding. According to the anti-electricity fraud management early warning method, on the premise of ensuring data safety, real-time mutual transmission and intercommunication of safety management data and financial institution data can be achieved, a fraud-involved account, a potential fraud-involved account and a potential victim account are analyzed and mined through a data technology, timely early warning is conducted, and the risk of telecommunication fraud is reduced.

title: Data processing method and apparatus, and device, storage medium and program product
abstract: Provided are a data processing method and apparatus, and a device, a storage medium and a program product. The data processing method comprises: constructing a virtual feature correlation matrix on the basis of first sample feature data and a pre-trained security calculation model (S301); determining, on the basis of the feature correlation matrix, collinear quantization factors of features corresponding to the first sample feature data (S302); determining, on the basis of the collinear quantization factors, a target feature from among the features corresponding to the first sample feature data (S303); deleting feature data of the target feature from the first sample feature data, so as to obtain first training data for performing joint training (S304), wherein there is a linear relationship between the feature data of the target feature and the feature data of at least one of other features.

title: Computer vulnerability assessment and remediation
abstract: Technology for detecting and remediating security vulnerabilities in view of one or more computing policies. An example method may involve receiving environment data of a computing environment, the environment data comprising a configuration value of a computing device in the computing environment; accessing an index data structure derived from a computing policy, wherein the index data structure associates an entry of the computing policy with one or more computing features of the computing environment; determining, by a processing device, whether a security vulnerability exists based on the environment data and the index data structure; and providing feedback regarding the security vulnerability and the computing policy.

title: Determining data categorizations based on an ontology and a machine-learning model
abstract: Aspects described herein may relate to methods, systems, and apparatuses that determine one or more categories associated with a dataset, or a portion thereof. The determination may be performed based on one or more tags associated with the dataset and/or a description associated with the dataset. Further, the determination may be performed by searching an ontology based on the one or more tags and/or the description. The determination may be performed by using a machine-learning model based on the one or more tags and/or the description. Once the one or more categories associated with the dataset are determined, the one or more categories may be used as a basis for modifying the dataset and/or validating the dataset.

title: Practitioner career management method and tool
abstract: The practitioner career assessment is a method and device for providing career development and advancement management within hiring organizations. The method includes the steps of consolidating all of a user's career experiences, knowledge, skills and abilities, and automating career guidance and a career pathway roadmap of the user's career development and advancement. As a result, the assessment is operated by a hiring organization, under the complete control of the user, and conducted in a confidential manner, free of any judgment prejudice, and devoid of known and unknown biases associated with human factor or supervisory factors to provide guidance and create a career pathway roadmap to goals and advancement. The device includes a number of modules including a system access, user homepage, user profile or census, core and optional goal assessments, assessment generation, guidance, outreach, reporting, and requirements traceability matrix (RTM) modules.

title: A method to build a trusted federated graph neural network framework that supports privacy-preserving personalization
abstract: The invention provides a trusted federal graph neural network framework construction method supporting privacy protection personalization. Because the existing Bayesian robust FL (Federal Learning) method is still very vulnerable to local model poisoning attacks by malicious clients, the most important reason is that in the whole federal learning process, no reliable reference is available to measure which client's model gradient is trusted. The invention provides a new trusted federal graph neural network framework supporting privacy protection individuation, which comprises a new Bayesian robust FL aggregation rule, namely a learning server prepares a trusted training data set for a learning task just like a client maintains a local model, which is called a root data set, and the learning server maintains a model for the root data set, which is called a server model. And when the gradients received from the clients are summarized by using a new aggregation rule, comparing and screening the gradients with a server model, and finally realizing the Bayesian robustness aiming at the malicious clients.

title: Modeling and application method, device, equipment and storage medium based on federal learning
abstract: The invention relates to the field of information safety, and discloses a modeling and application method, a device, equipment and a storage medium based on federal learning, which are used for solving the centralization problem existing in the modeling process based on the federal learning and improving the safety of data. The modeling and application method based on the federal learning comprises the following steps: generating a first application public key and a first application private key based on the first initialization application model; performing vector encryption based on the first application public key to generate a first application encryption vector; generating a first homomorphic encryption vector based on a first application private key, and generating a first ciphertext vector based on the first homomorphic encryption vector; generating a first model parameter based on a first application private key; and generating a first updated application model based on the first model parameters, and continuing to encrypt, decrypt and update based on the first updated application model to generate a first data encryption model. In addition, the invention also relates to a block chain technology, and the first application public key and the first application private key can be stored in the block chain.

title: An image classification method and system based on anchor point alignment personalized federated learning
abstract: The invention discloses an image classification method and system based on anchor point alignment personalized federal learning, wherein the method comprises the following steps: acquiring an image classification dataset, a local model and a global model; generating an anchor point and distributing class labels for the anchor point according to a global class center; initializing a local model according to classifier parameters of the global model; the anchor point is used for guiding the training of the local model, calculating the local class center and updating the local model; updating classifier parameters and a global class center of the global model; the final classification model is obtained through the cyclic training step; and outputting a classification result based on the final classification model. The system comprises: the server is used for executing the training of the global model; and the client is used for executing training of the local model. The invention can be widely applied to the field of federal learning.

title: Federated Machine Learning Computer System Architecture
abstract: Techniques are disclosed in which a computer system receives a transaction request and uses a federated machine learning model to analyze the transaction request. A server computer system may generate a federated machine learning model and distribute portions of the federated machine learning models to other components of the computer system including a user device and/or edge servers. In various embodiments, various components of the computer system apply transaction request evaluation factors to the portions of the federated machine learning model to generate scores. The server computer system uses the scores to determine a response to the transaction request.

title: Customized customer relationship management platform method and devices
abstract: The embodiments disclose a method including providing a website interface within the customizable application builder with no code visualization tools for an application creation user, including a form builder for creating at least one form with at least one form element for receiving form input from an end user, each associated with a conditional rule builder, an auto pdf mapping tool, a manual pdf mapping tool and at least two dynamic pdf mapping tools, wherein upon submission of the form, the auto pdf mapping tool automatically generates a pdf of the entire form, including the at least one form element and the form input from the end user and wherein the end user can interactively integrate the entire auto pdf mapping tool automatically generated pdf form into at least one 3rd party application platform and access data from all of their 3rd party application platform using the pdf mapped elements.

title: Peer-to-peer training of a machine learning model
abstract: A method may include training, based on a first training data available at a first node in a network, a first local machine learning model. A first local belief of a parameter set of a global machine learning model may be updated based on the training of the first local machine learning model. A second local belief of the parameter set of the global machine learning model may be received from a second node in the network. The second local belief may have been updated based on the second node training a second local machine learning model. The second local machine learning model may be trained based on a second training data available at the second node. The first local belief may be updated based on the second local belief of the second node. Related systems and articles of manufacture, including computer program products, are also provided.

title: Method for federal learning and federal learning system
abstract: The present disclosure provides a method and federal learning system for federal learning. The participant comprises a first party having first data of a user and tag information and a second party having second data of the user, the method comprising: calculating, by the first party, a first encryption gradient based on the first encryption inner volume and the tag information, and transmitting the first encryption gradient to the server; calculating, by the second party, a second encryption gradient based on the second encryption inner product and sending the second encryption gradient to the server; obtaining a first decryption gradient and a second decryption gradient through a server, and respectively transmitting the first decryption gradient and the second decryption gradient to a first party and a second party; training the first model by the first party based on the first decryption gradient until feature parameters of the first model converge; and training, by the second party, the second model based on the second decryption gradient until feature parameters of the second model converge.

title: Machine learning computer system architecture
abstract: Techniques for a computer system to receive transaction requests and analyze the transaction requests using a joint machine learning model are disclosed. The server computer system may generate a joint machine learning model and distribute portions of the joint machine learning model to other components of the computer system including the user device and/or the edge server. In various embodiments, various components of the computer system apply transaction request evaluation factors to portions of the joint machine learning model to generate scores. The server computer system uses these scores to determine a response to the transaction request.

title: Cross-platform malicious user detection method for social network based on vertical federated learning
abstract: A social network cross-platform malicious user detection method based on longitudinal federal learning comprises the following steps: step 1, constructing a cross-platform malicious user detection hierarchical architecture of a social network based on longitudinal federal learning; step 2, dividing the participating party into an active party and a passive party, and carrying out preprocessing operation on sample data of the active party and the passive party on a data preprocessing layer to obtain structured data; step 3, mapping the structured data processed by the data preprocessing layer to sample data shared by the active side and the passive side; step 4, cooperatively training a global model under the definition of machine learning, and encrypting and decrypting data of an active side and a passive side by using homomorphic encryption to complete the Federal learning layer training; and step 6, transmitting the prediction result obtained by the federal learning layer back to each participant in a data application layer, thereby realizing the high-quality malicious user detection effect.

title: System and method for virtual world biometric analytics through the use of a multimodal biometric analytic wallet
abstract: The invention provides a system and method for virtual world biometric analytics through the use of a multimodal biometric analytic wallet. The system includes a virtual biometric wallet comprising a pervasive repository for storing biometric data, the pervasive repository including at least one of a biometric layer, a genomic layer, a health layer, a privacy layer, and a processing layer. The virtual biometric wallet further comprises an analytic environment configured to combine the biometric data from at least one of the biometric layer, the genomic layer, the health layer, the privacy layer, and the processing layer. The virtual biometric wallet also comprises a biometric analytic interface configured to communicate the biometric data to one or more devices within a virtual universe.

title: Data authentication techniques using exploration and/or production data
abstract: Exploration and production data can be provided from one or more devices and categorized at a data lake system. The data lake system can include a temporary data repository where data is initially analyzed for determining whether the data includes data markers. Data markers can be correlated to existing data provided by the data lake system in order that tags can be generated for the incoming data. When data markers or other metadata is unavailable from the incoming data, the incoming data can be flagged for further processing to identify any available context that can be used as a basis for tagging.

title: Affectedness scoring engine for cyber threat intelligence services
abstract: A network-accessible cyber-threat security analytics service is configured to characterize and respond to a description that includes threat indicators (e.g., IOCs), and an initial severity. Enterprises register with the service by providing identifying information, such as industry, geographies, and the like. For each threat indicator, a query is sent to each of a set of one or more security knowledge bases, and at least some of the queries are scoped by the enterprise industry/geo information specified. The knowledge bases may vary but typically include: a managed security service, a cyber threat intelligence service, and a federated search engine that searches across one or more enterprise-connected data sources. Responses to the queries are collected. A response provides an indication whether the threat indicator identified in the query has been sighted in the knowledge base and the frequency. The system then adjusts the initial severity to reflect the indications returned from querying the security knowledge bases.

title: Systems and methods for storing, authenticating and transmitting digital health information and records
abstract: An electronic health records system that allows a user to register with the electronic health records system by entering identification information and medical information. The system authorizes a user to access the electronic health records system subsequent to registering, and allows a user to obtain, responsive to a request from the user, electronic immunization records for the user from an immunization registry of a first state. The system provides the user the ability to send the certified immunization record or COVID-19 health status record to a third-party requester that requires the record by law. The system also provides third party requesters with the necessary back-end enterprise software needed to receive the certified digital immunization records from large numbers of subscribers.

title: Systems and methods for establishing trust between entities in support of transactions
abstract: Systems and methods for determining the identity of entities who meet trust requirements of a privilege grantor include an identity and trust management system including at least one computing device in communication with at least one entity, at least one privilege grantor, and at least one authoritative source. At least one rule is received from the at least one privilege grantor that must be satisfied for the at least one privilege grantor to trust an entity. A database is established of at least one entity with information about the at least one entity. The at least one authoritative source is queried to determine whether at least a portion of the information about the at least one entity is correct. A response is received from the at least one authoritative source as to whether or not the portion of information is correct. The database stores a result of the query without storing data underlying the result. The information stored in the database is compared with the at least one rule to determine if the at least one entity meets the at least one rule. The at least one privilege grantor is notified whether the at least one entity meets the at least one rule based on the comparison, without providing the at least one privilege grantor with either data stored in the database for the at least one entity or the data underlying the result.

title: Systems and methods for computing with private healthcare data
abstract: Techniques are provided for computing with private healthcare data. The techniques include a de-identification method including receiving a text sequence; providing the text sequence to a plurality of entity tagging models, each of the plurality of entity tagging models being trained to tag one or more portions of the text sequence having a corresponding entity type; tagging one or more entities in the text sequence using the plurality of entity tagging models; and obfuscating each entity among the one or more tagged entities by replacing the entity with a surrogate, the surrogate being selected based on one or more attributes of the entity and maintaining characteristics similar to the entity being replaced.

title: Multi-mode federal learning method and system for intelligent fire monitoring and early warning
abstract: The multi-mode federal learning method and system for intelligent fire monitoring and early warning comprises the steps of collecting a fire image data set, an environment sensor numerical data set, a historical fire record, weather and weather data, collecting the data into a multi-mode data set, preprocessing the multi-mode data set and enhancing the data; constructing BlazeSenseNet a multi-mode fire monitoring unit, and deeply analyzing the processed multi-mode data set by the BlazeSenseNet multi-mode fire monitoring unit to accurately identify and classify various fires; model training is performed using federal learning architecture FedKS to improve the accuracy of BlazeSenseNet model in monitoring fires and predicting trends in fire development. The invention can realize comprehensive and accurate fire detection and provide targeted fire response suggestions.

title: Risk adaptive protection
abstract: A method, system and computer-usable medium for generating a user behavior profile, comprising: monitoring user interactions between a user and an information handling system; converting the user interactions and the information about the user into electronic information representing the user interactions; generating a unique user behavior profile based upon the electronic information representing the user interactions and the information about the user; storing information relating to the unique user behavior profile within a user behavior profile repository; and, storing information referencing the unique user behavior profile in a user behavior blockchain.

title: Data processing method and apparatus for federated learning system, computer, and readable storage medium
abstract: A data processing method and apparatus for a federated learning system, a computer, and a readable storage medium. The method comprises: acquiring a server training sample of a client training sample corresponding to a first participating device; calling a distance measurement model, predicting sample distances between candidate samples and the server training sample, and acquiring similar training samples from the candidate samples according to the sample distances; and training an auxiliary model by using the server training sample and the similar training samples to obtain a trained auxiliary model, and sending intermediate data generated in the training process of the auxiliary model to the first participating device, wherein the trained auxiliary model is configured to: predict a second prediction result of association data of data to be processed, so that, according to the second prediction result and a first prediction result obtained by predicting, according to a first model, the data to be processed, the first participating device determines a target detection result of the data to be processed.

title: Neural network model training method, device and system based on privacy protection
abstract: The embodiment of the specification provides a neural network model training method, device and system based on privacy protection. The first member device and the second member device are respectively provided with first characteristic data and second characteristic data, the first characteristic data and the second characteristic data form characteristic data of a training data sample of the neural network model according to a vertical segmentation mode, and the first member device or the second member device is provided with label data. The first member device receives data possessed by the second member device and initializes the neural network model together with the second member device. When performing model training, the first member device randomly extracts training data samples from the first training data sample set; and carrying out share decomposition processing on the second feature data of the training data sample to obtain third and fourth feature data shares, and sending the fourth feature data shares and corresponding label data to second member equipment. The first and second member devices perform joint model training using the first feature data, the third feature data share, the fourth feature data share, and the corresponding label data.

title: A privacy-preserving and robust personalized image recognition method based on federated learning
abstract: The invention provides a personalized image recognition method for protecting privacy and robustness based on federal learning, which comprises the steps of firstly adopting a differential privacy mechanism to protect user privacy, and compared with cryptographic means such as homomorphic encryption, safe multiparty calculation and the like, the personalized image recognition method does not need to distribute keys or consider a user's quasi-input quasi-output mechanism, improves the operation efficiency of a system and reduces the maintenance cost of the system; secondly, compared with the existing framework which only pays attention to privacy or poisoning attack, the training framework which takes the privacy or poisoning attack into consideration at the same time is not realized, and the invention can simultaneously protect the privacy of the user and defend potential attack in personalized federal learning; in summary, the personalized image recognition method based on average regularization multitask learning can protect the privacy of training data and defend various attacks such as data poisoning, model poisoning and the like, and the central server can effectively filter potential attackers with the proportion lower than 50% by applying the rule.

title: Systems and methods for utilizing compressed convolutional neural networks to perform media content processing
abstract: Systems, methods, and non-transitory computer-readable media can receive a compressed convolutional neural network (CNN). A media content item to be processed can be acquired. The compressed CNN to can be utilized to apply a media processing technique to the media content item to produce information about the media content item. It can be determined, based on at least some of the information about the media content item, whether to transmit at least a portion of the media content item to one or more remote servers for additional media processing.

title: Processing method for smart decision-based target detection model, and related device
abstract: A processing method for a smart decision-based target detection model, an apparatus, a computer device, and a storage medium, the method comprising: on the basis of an acquired local dataset, training an initial multi-target detection model to obtain an intermediate multi-target detection model (S202); on the basis of generated additional random numbers and model parameters of the intermediate multi-target detection model, calculating composite model parameters (S203); sending the composite model parameters to a central server to indicate to the central server to generate global model parameters on the basis of the composite model parameters (S204); receiving the global model parameters to update the intermediate multi-target detection model (S205); and causing the updated intermediate multi-target detection model to serve as an initial multi-target detection model for a next round of training and performing iterative training until model convergence to obtain a multi-target detection model (S206). In addition, the present invention further relates to blockchain technology, and the local data set can be stored in a blockchain. The accuracy of target detection is thus improved.

title: Clustered federal learning framework for resisting Bayesian attack and security aggregation method and system
abstract: The invention relates to a clustered federal learning framework for resisting Bayesian attack and a safety aggregation method and a system thereof, wherein the system comprises three participants: 1) a client, 2) a server, and 3) a trusted authority; the method comprises the following six components: (1) Clustered federal learning system with Bayesian robustness; (2) verifiable orthogonal matrix confusion aggregation; (3) secure ReLU function computation; (4) a polymerization scheme; (5) secure key conversion; (6) compression scheme. The invention creatively provides a clustered federal learning security aggregation framework, and can effectively resist Bayesian attack on malicious clients. By considering privacy security and system performance, the method can be widely applied to various distributed computing application scenes.

title: A verifiable federated learning method and device with dual decomposition and aggregation
abstract: The invention provides a double-decomposition and aggregation verifiable federal learning method and device, which belong to the field of federal learning privacy security protection, and specifically comprise the steps that a Trusted Third Party (TTP) negotiates keys with each client to generate corresponding keysTTP generates random number by key through random number generatorAnd summing them to obtainTTP willSending the parameters to each client by a symmetrical encryption method, decomposing the trained model parameters into n parts by each client, sending the n parts to other clients and receiving the parameters sent by the other clients, and decomposing the parameters into public parts by each client in a second round(Sent to the server) and privacy part(Kept local), let the privacy part beEach client constructs and transmits verification function v i to the server based on the uploaded local model parameters, the server aggregates model parameters omega i and verification function v i transmitted by the client and transmits the aggregation result to the client, and the client passes the verification formulaTo verify whether the data are equal, if so, then to execute the subsequent updating operation, to aggregate the received global model parameters with bias with the privacy part kept in the local to restore the real parameter model.

title: Video surveillance, storage, and alerting system having network management, hierarchical data storage, video tip processing, and vehicle plate analysis
abstract: The present invention is a video surveillance, storage, and alerting system having surveillance cameras, video analytics devices, audio sensory devices, other sensory devices, and a plurality of data storage devices. A network management module monitors network status of all subsystems including cameras, servers, storage devices, etc. and shows actively monitored areas on a physical map. A vehicle information module retrieves information from a law enforcement database about vehicles detected in the video data based on the vehicle's license plate, including information about stolen vehicles, as well as warrant, wanted person, and mug shot information for registered drivers of the vehicles. Video tips are received and processed from anonymous and non-anonymous sources. A correlation engine correlates primitive events and compound events from each of the subsystems, weighted by attributes of the events, across both space and time, and an alerting engine generates alerts and performs actions based on the correlation. A hierarchical storage manager manages storage of the vast amounts of data, including video data, based on importance of the data calculated from attributes of the data. A privacy filter ensures no private data is detected, correlated, or stored.

title: System and method for secure query processing for private data networks
abstract: Systems and methods enable two or more data providers that do not trust each other with their data to pool their data for analysis. The systems and methods can translate conventional database SQL queries into secure multiparty computation so that the data providers can analyze their collective data without requiring any of them to disclose private information.

title: A multimodal parameter-efficient fine-tuning framework for privacy preservation
abstract: The invention discloses a multi-mode parameter efficient fine adjustment framework for privacy protection, which aims to solve the problems of data privacy and model safety of a multi-mode pre-training model in the fine adjustment process. The invention obtains the optimized model by fine tuning the model on the downstream data set without accessing the complete model weight. Given a parameterized multimodal pre-training model and a downstream dataset, the invention first performs model fine tuning to find the optimal parameter update. In order to ensure data security, the invention locally utilizes the downstream task data set to finely tune the substitution model to obtain the finely tuned substitution model. And then, inserting the trained weight update into the original model to obtain the finely tuned multi-mode pre-training model. In addition, in order to avoid the problem of privacy disclosure during reasoning, differential privacy protection is added in the fine tuning training process, and a multi-mode fine tuning model with privacy protection is generated. The framework effectively protects the data privacy and the model safety while guaranteeing the performance of the model.

title: Medical model training method, device and computer readable storage medium
abstract: The application provides a medical model training method, a device and a computer readable storage medium, wherein the method comprises the steps of carrying out low-rank decomposition on gradients of a local model to obtain a local first low-rank matrix and a local second low-rank matrix, training the local first low-rank matrix and the local second low-rank matrix through the received updated global first low-rank matrix, the updated global second low-rank matrix and the local data until training of the local first low-rank matrix and the local second low-rank matrix reaches a set iteration condition, and generating the local medical model according to the finally obtained global first low-rank matrix, the finally obtained global second low-rank matrix, the finally obtained local first low-rank matrix, the finally obtained local second low-rank matrix and the local model. According to the application, the training efficiency is improved by reducing the weight quantity of training and the size of the transmitted model, and the communication consumption caused by model transmission is reduced.

title: System and method for single sign-on to resources across a network
abstract: Systems, methods and apparatus for providing single sign on across a plurality of resources is disclosed. An exemplary method includes receiving a request from a user to access a particular one of the plurality of resources; establishing an SSO session for the user if an SSO session has not been established; determining if the user has been authenticated to the particular resource, and if not, retrieving credentials for the user that are specific to the resource; presenting the credentials to the resource so as to create a session with the resource; and presenting a user interface for a customer to configure which of the plurality of resources can be accessed by users.

title: Method and system for policy management, testing, simulation, decentralization and analysis
abstract: A method of managing supply chain risks having a supply chain risk analysis implementation, includes loading from a data storage or a memory, supply chain data for a supply chain which indicates information about the supply chain; mapping the supply chain data to a consistent input model; automatically analyzing, by an analytics module implemented on a processor, the input model to detect supply chain anomalies indicating the supply chain risks; producing an analysis results output of the analyzed input model; and outputting the analysis results output of the detected supply chain anomalies to the memory, the data storage, a display, or a message. A supply chain risk analysis system includes the processor, the data storage or the memory that stores the supply chain data for the supply chain which indicates information about the supply chain. The processor is configured to perform the processes.

title: Systems and methods for authenticating entities
abstract: Systems, methods, and non-transitory computer-readable media can obtain respective instances of verification information can be obtained from computing systems associated with a plurality of third-party vendors, wherein a computing system associated with a third-party vendor determines verification information based at least in part on an analysis of an identification document provided by a user to be authenticated. The respective instances of verification information can be interpreted, wherein interpreting an instance of verification information comprises assigning respective states to attribute fields included in the verification information. A set of interpreted instances of verification information can be evaluated in combination to determine whether to authenticate the user, wherein the set includes an interpreted instance of verification information from each of the plurality of third-party vendors.

title: Systems and methods for user account recovery
abstract: Systems, methods, and non-transitory computer-readable media can determine a request to recover access to an account of a first user, the request being received from a computing device of a second user. A determination is made that the first user and the second user are recognized as social connections by a social networking system. The first user is authenticated through the computing device of the second user based at least in part on the first user and the second user being recognized as social connections. A login session is established between the computing system and the computing device of the second user upon authenticating the first user.

title: Method, computing device, and computer-readable medium for secure video frame management
abstract: Embodiments of the present disclosure may provide apparatus, methods, and computer-readable media for secure frame management. The technology disclosed herein provides an intelligent method for detecting trigger items in one or more frames of streaming video from an internet protocol camera. Upon detection, the camera transmits one or more frames of video to the computing device over the network. Upon detecting a trigger item in a frame of a video stream, the computing device may begin a streaming session with the server and stream one or more frames of the video and accompanying metadata to the server. The frames, metadata, and associated keys may all be encrypted prior to streaming to the server. For each subsequent segment of a video frame that includes a trigger item, the server may append the frame of that segment to the video clip in the encryption container. Once the trigger item is no longer detected, the streaming session may be closed.

title: Episodic memory stores, data ingestion and query systems for same, including examples of autonomous smart agents
abstract: An example computing system may operate on episodes stored in an episodic memory using a semantic query language. The semantic query language may associate contextual labels with the data ingested from the data sources. Systems described herein may determine probabilities of an event based on the episodes including previous observations, counts, similarities, anomalies, and causality among many other techniques and methodologies. In some examples, the systems described herein may provide result explanations by providing references to source data pertinent to a given result. The user may provide feedback to the query results and update the semantic query.

title: Model training method, model using method, system, trusted node and device
abstract: Aspects relating to machine learning includes receiving, by a first trusted node, a first target data set sent by a first participant, wherein the first target data set is obtained via encrypting, by the first participant, a data set provided by the first participant based on a first preset encryption mode; decrypting the first target data set, determining first training data, and performing model training for a preset machine learning model based on the first training data to obtain a first intermediate training result; acquiring an encrypted second intermediate training result sent by at least one second trusted node; and performing federated learning for the preset machine learning model based on at least the first intermediate training result and the decrypted second intermediate training result, to update model parameters of the preset machine learning model and obtain a learning completed target model.

title: Data processing and scanning systems for assessing vendor risk
abstract: Data processing systems and methods, according to various embodiments, are adapted for efficiently processing data to allow for the streamlined assessment of risk ratings for one or more vendors. In various embodiments, the systems/methods may use one or more particular vendor attributes (e.g., as determined from scanning one or more webpages associated with the particular vendor) and the contents of one or more completed privacy templates for the vendor to determine a vendor risk rating for the particular vendor. As a particular example, the system may scan a website associated with the vendor to automatically determine one or more security certifications associated with the vendor and use that information, along with information from a completed privacy template for the vendor, to calculate a vendor risk rating that indicates the risk of doing business with the vendor.

title: File integrity monitoring
abstract: A file integrity monitoring system supports monitoring of system-critical, enterprise-critical and user-critical data by reporting events to a threat management facility in response to changes in certain files, folders, registry keys and registry values of the computing environment in which the system is operating and/or monitoring. The file integrity monitoring system may dynamically create, adapt and apply context-based rules to improve the sensitivity and relevance of reported events to undesirable changes in the data footprint of a monitored device.

title: Highlighting reading based on adaptive prediction
abstract: A method is provided that includes predicting, using a language model, one or more words from a first set of words expected to be difficult for a reader, and providing the first set of words for display to the reader. The predicted one or more words in the first set of words are displayed differently from non-predicted words in the first set of words.

title: Federal system face image feature learning method
abstract: The invention discloses a federal face image feature learning method, which comprises the following steps: extracting the characteristics of the face data in each corresponding face data set through each face characteristic extraction and identification network; obtaining a ternary loss matrix L and a Watherstein weight matrix W based on the characteristics of the face data; and calculating by combining the Waterstein weight matrix W and the ternary loss matrix L to obtain a Waterstein characteristic federal ternary loss, transmitting the Waterstein characteristic federal ternary loss serving as a final combined training loss to each face characteristic extraction and recognition network, and performing gradient retransmission and parameter updating to finish face characteristic combined training and learning in one round. The method can exert the potential and the value of each data, and simultaneously learn the feature expression capability of each model, so that the performance of each model can be jointly improved, and the generalization performance of each model is greatly enhanced.

title: Longitudinal federal decision tree training method and device
abstract: The disclosure provides a longitudinal federated decision tree training method and a device. The method comprises the following steps: carrying out equal-width box separation on a first feature of a training initiator and a second feature of a training participant to obtain a first discrete feature and a second discrete feature; for the current node of the decision tree, a training initiator obtains a first kini coefficient and encrypts and transmits a label to a training participant; the training participant obtains a first classification result of the training sample and encrypts and sends the first classification result to the training initiator; obtaining a second kiney coefficient and a third kiney coefficient according to the label and the first classification result; determining a splitting point according to the first, second and third damping coefficients; and obtaining the trained decision tree according to the segmentation points. Through the method and the device, the decision tree can be trained with higher training precision, so that the decision tree can be used by a training initiator and a training participant at the same time, data are not shared mutually, and the safety of the data is ensured while the training precision is improved.

title: Privacy calculation method, device, equipment and storage medium
abstract: The application discloses a privacy computing method, a device, equipment and a storage medium, which relate to the technical field of privacy computing and are applied to a first data node, wherein the first data node and a second data node are nodes under privacy intersection service, and the privacy computing method comprises the following steps: acquiring second space information sent by a second node, and determining minimum space information according to the first space information of the second node; if the first space information is minimum, a first private key and a first public key are generated, the first characteristic attribute matrix is homomorphic encrypted by the first public key, the obtained first ciphertext matrix and the first public key are sent to a second node, so that the Pelson coefficient matrix and the first ciphertext matrix of the second characteristic attribute matrix are operated on the basis of the first public key, and an operation result and a second coefficient matrix are returned; decrypting the operation result by using the first private key, and splicing the decrypted matrix, the first coefficient matrix and the second coefficient matrix to obtain a global pearson correlation coefficient matrix. Thus, the two nodes complete privacy calculation, and safety is improved.

title: Neural network wiring discovery
abstract: Neural wirings may be discovered concurrently with training a neural network. Respective weights may be assigned to each edge connecting nodes of a neural graph, wherein the neural graph represents a neural network. A subset of edges may be designated based on the respective weights and data is passed through the neural graph in a forward training pass using the designated subset of edges. A loss function may be determined based on the results of the forward training pass and parameters of the neural network and the respective weights assigned to each edge may be updated in a backwards training pass based on the loss function. The steps of designating the subset of edges, passing data through the neural graph, determining the loss function, and updating parameters of the neural network and the respective weights may be repeated to train the neural network.

title: Social media analytics for emergency management
abstract: Described herein are systems, servers, devices, methods, and media for providing relevant social media data for emergency response. In some embodiments, the method comprises accessing and analyzing a social media feed to identify the relevant social media data including relevant posts and transmitting the said social media data to an emergency service provider (ESP). In some embodiments, analyzing involves geo-bounding, keyword searches and natural language processing (NLP).

title: Digital information infrastructure and method for security designated data and with granular data stores
abstract: Distributed computer system processes data having select content (SC) represented by one or more predetermined words, characters, etc. The system has a plurality of SC data stores in a server cloud for respective security designated (Sec-D) data and granular data, each with respective access controls thereat. The data stores are operatively coupled on a network. An identification module identifies SC and granular data stores for the respective data in the server cloud. A processor activates data stores in the server cloud thereby permitting access to the SC data and granular stores based upon an application of one or more access controls thereat. The processor has a reconstruction module operating as a data process employing the respective access controls to combine one or more of the Sec-D data and granular data.

title: Machine account number detection method and device for federal comparison countermeasure knowledge distillation
