The whole process does not involve public keys and private keys, so that the condition of storing the private keys does not exist, a user can manage digital identities on any device capable of accessing the blockchain platform, the limitation of the security of the private keys on terminal devices used by the user is avoided, and the user can manage the digital identities more flexibly.

title: Sample joint prediction method, system and medium based on construction of gradient tree model
abstract: The invention discloses a sample joint prediction method, a system and a medium based on a gradient tree model construction, wherein the method comprises the following steps: the data terminal performs federal training on the multiparty training samples based on a gradient descent tree GBDT algorithm to construct a gradient tree model, wherein the plurality of data terminals are provided, the gradient tree model comprises a plurality of regression trees, the regression trees comprise a plurality of segmentation points, the training samples comprise a plurality of features, and the features are in one-to-one correspondence with the segmentation points; and the data terminal performs joint prediction on the sample to be predicted based on the gradient tree model so as to determine the predicted value of the sample to be predicted. According to the invention, the multi-party training sample is subjected to federal training through the GBDT algorithm, so that the establishment of a gradient tree model is realized, and the gradient tree model is suitable for scenes with large data size and can well meet the requirements of the actual production environment; and carrying out joint prediction on the sample to be predicted to realize the prediction of the sample to be predicted.

title: Method and data service for converting and outputting animal related data
abstract: A system and computerized method for monitoring and analyzing animal related data. In one embodiment, the system includes a processor and memory operable to identify a parameter related to animal management for species in a biological environment, aggregate animal related data from different sources about the parameter of the species, identify a baseline for the parameter, correlate the animal related data against the baseline to obtain correlated data, and analyze said correlated data to assess said animal management.

title: Government affair data secure sharing method and system based on alliance chain
abstract: The invention provides a government affair data safety sharing method based on a alliance chain, which comprises the following steps: s1: performing a step of selecting an appropriate federated chain platform; s2: a step of establishing a alliance chain network is carried out; s3: performing identity authentication and authority management; s4: a step of encryption and privacy protection; s5: a step of performing intelligent contracts; s6: performing data audit and tracing; s7: a step of performing periodic security inspection; s8: a step of compliance and regulation compliance; s9: disaster preparation and disaster recovery are carried out; the method is helpful for establishing a government affair data sharing system with safer, more credible and privacy protection. The transparency and privacy protection of the information can be balanced in data sharing, and sensitive information is ensured not to be abused. This has a positive driving effect on promoting a wider sharing and rational utilization of government data, while maximally protecting public interests.

title: Dynamic differential privacy for federated learning systems
abstract: Embodiments of the present invention provide hierarchical differential privacy enhancement for federated machine learning. Local machine learning models can be generated and/or trained by data owners participating in the federated learning framework based on their respective data sets. Noise corresponding to and satisfying the first privacy loss requirement is introduced into the data owner's respective data set, and noise corresponding to and satisfying the first privacy loss requirement is introduced into a local model generated and/or trained by the data owner. The data owners communicate model data corresponding to their respective local models to the coordinator, which in turn aggregates the model data of the data owners. After introducing noise to the aggregated model data that corresponds to and satisfies the third privacy loss requirement, the mediator communicates the aggregated model data to the data owner to facilitate updating and/or retraining their respective machine learning models.

title: Systems and methods for providing a systemic error in artificial intelligence algorithms
abstract: Disclosed is a process for testing a suspect model to determine whether it was derived from a source model. An example method includes receiving, from a model owner node, a source model and a fingerprint associated with the source model, receiving a suspect model at a service node, based on a request to test the suspect model, applying the fingerprint to the suspect model to generate an output and, when the output has an accuracy that is equal to or greater than a threshold, determining that the suspect model is derived from the source model. Imperceptible noise can be used to generate the fingerprint which can cause predictable outputs from the source model and a potential derivative thereof.

title: Systems and methods for determining users associated with devices based on facial recognition of images
abstract: Systems, methods, and non-transitory computer readable media can identify a user associated with a device based on a subset of media content items on the device based at least in part on analysis of the subset of media content items. A relationship between the user and one or more other users depicted in the media content items can be determined. A recommendation relating to sending at least one media content item on the device to at least of the one or more other users can be generated based on the determined relationship.

title: Method and system for providing multi-layer identification, verification, tracking and location information for people and objects
abstract: A method and system for providing multi-layer identification, tracking, verification and location information for people and events is presented. Multi-layer security permissions and multi-layer security functionality is provided. An identity and a physical location of a person or an object is verified in real-time as the person or object engages in current habits, actions and events and with analysis of previous habits, actions and events. Summary identification, verification, tracking and location information and comprehensive identification, verification and location information is provided in real-time for a desired person or an object. Feedback and adaptive learning with artificial intelligence (AI) and using blockchains and other methods provide comprehensive identification, tracking and verification information, adaptable across various different situations and circumstances.

title: Educational administration management interaction method and system based on AI intelligent campus
abstract: The invention relates to the technical field of educational administration management, and discloses an AI-based intelligent campus educational administration management interaction method and system, wherein the method comprises the following steps: extracting technical terms, concepts and relations thereof from an education database through deep learning technology and natural language processing to construct an education knowledge map; by using the federal learning framework, different schools or departments are allowed to train models together on the premise of not exposing original data, the differential privacy technology is combined, personal privacy during data query and statistics is protected, and meanwhile, homomorphic encryption calculation means are adopted to process data under the state of not decrypting. The invention breaks the information island through the data integration platform, can acquire comprehensive and real-time data, can automatically identify and eliminate data redundancy by utilizing the deep learning and clustering algorithm, optimizes the storage structure, accelerates the data processing speed, reduces the data maintenance cost, improves the data quality, and provides a more reliable data basis for educational administration.

title: Systems and methods for audio-based augmented reality
abstract: Systems, methods, and non-transitory computer readable media are configured to receive a user request to identify at least one object of an environment in which a computing device is situated. A classification for the at least one object can be received. Subsequently, an audio tag based on the classification for the at least one object can be placed in a representation of the environment. The audio tag can be associated with a sound perceived by a user to be emanating from the least one object.

title: Method and system for managing, storing, connecting and displaying medical information
abstract: The invention discloses a method and a system for managing, storing, connecting and displaying medical information. The method and system of the present invention may be used to create an assembly line of information that may be used as an operating system for medical and health information. The medical information and the health information are stored in a hierarchical format. The medical and health information is selected and displayed in one or more display colors to highlight selected portions of the displayed information. The method and system of the present invention can be used as a teaching tool, a review tool and a diagnostic tool for medical professionals, and an information tool for medical patients.

title: Secure and verifiable federated learning method
abstract: The invention discloses a secure verifiable federal learning scheme with smaller traffic and capability of resisting tamper attacks and deletion attacks, which comprises the following steps of (1) initializing a trusted third party to generate initialization parameters and public and private key pairs of each user and distributing the initialization parameters and the public and private key pairs to corresponding users, (2) secret sharing, wherein each user generates a mask and shares the mask to each user through a secret sharing technology, (3) encrypting and generating a certification, wherein the user encrypts local updates to be uploaded by using the mask and generates a certification for unencrypted local updates for later correctness verification and fraud attack resistance, (4) aggregating and verifying that the trusted third party collects the certification of the user to generate verification certification, and a server requests to restore the mask of a offline user, (5) aggregating and updating, if the verification is passed, the server restores the mask and then aggregates the updating uploaded by the user, (6) verifying the correctness of an aggregation result issued by the user.

title: Gradient inversion method and system and electronic equipment
abstract: The invention relates to a gradient inversion method, a gradient inversion system and electronic equipment. According to the method, after labels of original training privacy data and random noise data distributed from Gaussian are input to a model to be inverted to be trained to generate a group of virtual gradients, stable and meaningful gradients can be provided all the time by adopting the Wassertein distance, and the stable and meaningful gradients are used as loss functions for measuring two distribution differences of the virtual data and the original training privacy data to be recovered, so that the gradients can be smoother, the convergence of a training process is more stable, and the effect of gradient inversion data recovery can be improved.

title: Course prediction model updating method, course prediction model updating device, computer equipment and storage medium
abstract: The application relates to the field of artificial intelligence, and discloses a course prediction model updating method, which comprises the following steps: the method comprises the steps that a first client side obtains training samples, wherein the training samples comprise learning information of students and learning intention information of the students on courses; training a course prediction model by using a training sample to obtain a first model parameter; transmitting the first model parameters to a second client and receiving the second model parameters transmitted by the second client; generating a third model parameter according to the first model parameter and the second model parameter; uploading the third model parameters to a server; the server generates a fifth model parameter according to the third model parameter and the fourth model parameter; and when the fifth model parameter sent by the server is received, updating the course prediction model according to the fifth model parameter. The application also relates to blockchain techniques. The application also discloses a course prediction model updating device, computer equipment and a computer readable storage medium. The method improves the accuracy of the course prediction model.

title: A privacy-enhanced intelligent search method and system based on multi-round iteration
abstract: The invention discloses a privacy enhanced intelligent searching method and a system based on multiple rounds of iteration, wherein the method comprises the steps of carrying out hierarchical semantic analysis on a query input by a user; the method comprises the steps of decomposing complex queries into sub-queries based on a task dependency graph algorithm, executing multi-round iterative search, namely searching evidence segments from multi-source data according to the sub-queries, constructing a semantic element coverage matrix to detect knowledge gaps, generating supplementary sub-queries to conduct iterative completion until preset termination conditions are met if uncovered elements exist, integrating cross-modal data through a federal learning technology, generating structured knowledge graph segments by combining semantic vector alignment and an evidence fusion algorithm, conducting dynamic desensitization processing on search results, and optimizing a search strategy based on user explicit feedback and implicit feedback to form a closed-loop iterative update mechanism. The method and the device effectively solve the problems of the traditional intelligent search in terms of semantic understanding depth, complicated problem reasoning, search result accuracy and integrity, user privacy safety and the like.

title: User data validation for digital identifications
abstract: In general, one innovative aspect of the subject matter described in this specification may be embodied in methods that may include validating user data pages extracted from a digital identification in circumstances where a user device that includes the digital identification is either unavailable or presently lacks network connectivity. For instance, an authorized device may be used to extract user data pages from the digital identification by either exchanging communications with the user device using a proximity-based data exchange protocol, or by using a physical identification card to identify the digital identification on a user record. The user data pages may then be validated by comparing checksums associated with user data pages against the checksums within the user record, and decrypting the user data pages using a decryption key that is variably designated by a security status assigned to the digital identification.

title: Information infrastructure management tools with extractor, secure storage, content analysis and classification and method therefor
abstract: Data processing method organizing and processing data in a distributed computing system. By organizing select/secret content with [enterprise and external designated] categorical filters (content, contextual and taxonomic) to create further search terms for data mining both enterprise and external data sources (databases, data collections, data stores). The result being aggregated select/secret content. The aggregated select/secret content is stored in the corresponding select/secret content data store. The aggregated select/secret content is further processed for convergent or divergent characteristics. By identifying unknown data elements, another search gathers supplemental documents. Data element ranges are set by taxonomic filter and said contextual filters. Relevancy factors are identified by relationship between input and supplemental documents. Search is controlled by user selection, continuous search, iterative search (n cycles), search within m search terms, and search time.

title: Method and system for updating model parameters based on federal learning
abstract: The specification provides a method and a system for updating model parameters based on federal learning, wherein the method is realized by any training member device in a participant, the participant comprises a plurality of training member devices and a server, the method comprises the steps of carrying out multiple rounds of iterative updating on the model parameters, and one round of iterative updating comprises the following steps: acquiring a model to be trained of a current round of training member equipment and an aggregation model issued by the current round of a server; calculating a correlation coefficient between model parameters corresponding to a model to be trained and a model aggregation; determining a first correlation coefficient and a second correlation coefficient from the correlation coefficients; updating the model parameters of the model to be trained, which correspond to the first correlation coefficient, into the model parameters of the aggregation model, which correspond to the first correlation coefficient, and keeping the model parameters of the model to be trained, which correspond to the second correlation coefficient, unchanged; and training the updated model to be trained based on the training samples held by the training member devices.

title: Systems and methods for protecting data
abstract: Systems, methods, and non-transitory computer-readable media can be configured to train a featurizer based at least in part on a set of training data. The featurizer can be applied to at least one input to generate at least one tensor. The at least one tensor obfuscates or excludes at least one feature in the at least one input.

title: Data set processing method, data processing method, device and storage medium
abstract: The application discloses a data set processing method, a data processing device and a storage medium, wherein an intersection data set of a first data set and a second data set is firstly obtained, then target data elements are determined from the intersection data set in a complement set of the second data set, the target data elements are added into the intersection data set to obtain a target set, and then the target set is respectively sent to a first participant and a second participant, so that each participant can perform federal learning training on a prediction model according to the target set to support realization of big data analysis in cloud computing. Because the intersection data set and the target data element in the target set are both subsets of the second data set, the second party cannot determine the data information of the first party from the target set, so that the confidentiality of the privacy information of the first party can be improved under the condition that the data confidentiality requirement of the first party is higher. It can be seen that the present application can be widely applied to information processing technology.

title: Real-time intrusion detection method, device and system for Internet of Vehicles
abstract: The invention discloses a real-time intrusion detection method, device and system for the Internet of vehicles, wherein the real-time intrusion detection method for the Internet of vehicles comprises the steps of obtaining an intrusion behavior detection model which is built in advance based on a self-attention mechanism and a residual error network, wherein the intrusion behavior detection model is obtained based on the training of a federal learning method; preprocessing the acquired real-time internet of vehicles flow data to generate corresponding image data; and sending the image data into the intrusion behavior detection model, and calculating the abnormal probability of the real-time Internet of vehicles flow data to finish the real-time Internet of vehicles intrusion detection. The invention has the capability of efficiently detecting network traffic attack and can improve the attack detection capability and the security of user privacy in the environment of the Internet of vehicles.

title: Knowledge distillation-based federal graph learning method and automatic driving method
abstract: The invention discloses a federal graph learning method based on knowledge distillation, which comprises the steps of training a graph neural network on a server to obtain a teacher model; the client acquires a teacher model; the client trains a graph neural network model of the client by adopting a teacher model to obtain a local model; the client trains the local model and fine-tunes the teacher model; the server updates the teacher model on the server by adopting the finely-adjusted teacher model; repeating the steps until the teacher model and the local model are updated, and completing federal graph learning based on knowledge distillation. The invention also discloses an automatic driving method comprising the knowledge distillation-based federal graph learning method. The method solves the problems of data island and model heterogeneity in a real scene, and has high reliability and good accuracy.

title: Calculation system, calculation method, and information storage medium
abstract: Provided is a computing system including: a first device configured to securely manage first secret information; and a second device configured to securely manage second secret information, wherein first public product being a product of first computation information and first public information, third secret information securely managed by the first device, and fourth secret information securely managed by the second device are used to compute a secret product being a product of the first secret information and the second secret information with the first secret information and the second secret information being securely managed.

title: Business information recommendation method and device based on multi-party high-dimensional data vertical federated learning
abstract: The invention relates to a business information recommendation method and a device based on multi-party high-dimensional data longitudinal federal learning, belonging to the technical field of big data and comprising the following steps: s1: a homomorphic encrypted key pair is created. Preprocessing multi-party data and aligning encrypted samples; s2: constructing a longitudinal federal LightGBM model; s3: converting the longitudinal federal LightGBM model into a neural network as part of GBDT2NN of the longitudinal federal ECA-DeepGBM model; s4: calculating a CatNN part feed-forward process of a longitudinal Federal ECA-DeepGBM model; s5: and constructing a loss function and model integral training, and realizing business information recommendation based on multi-party high-dimensional data based on a trained high-dimensional data classification prediction model. The invention achieves the purpose of accurate business information recommendation by increasing the characteristic dimension through multi-party data.

title: Virtual badge, device and method
abstract: A system, method, and device comprising a virtual badge are disclosed. A virtual badge can be displayed on a cell phone or in another linked portable device, and for security purposes, has images which can be scanned, and the capability to alternate colors and/or self-destruct on a pre-set schedule. Whether for after a disaster or for daily use, the system uses cell phones or mobile devices loaded with specialized software. Using plugin technologies, the system optionally can enable field collected photos and notes on customizable forms to be mapped, tracked, and time/date stamped—including in a 100% disconnected environment. A modifiable virtual badge can aid in inventory, accountability, organization, and efficiency. The system can be employed by the “Whole Community”—citizens, businesses, not-for-profits, and government agencies—for social media, business, cleanup, insurance adjusters, or personnel focused on day to day operations or on mitigation, preparedness, response, and recovery.

title: Method and device for evaluating federal learning model
abstract: Embodiments of the present disclosure provide a method and apparatus for evaluating federal learning models. The first participant participating in federal learning has a weight matrix of leaf nodes of the federal learning model and a sample tag matrix of input samples. The second participant participating in federal learning has a prediction result matrix generated by the federal learning model according to the input samples. The method is performed by a first party. The method comprises the following steps: homomorphic encryption is carried out on the weight matrix of the leaf node and the sample label matrix; transmitting the homomorphically encrypted weight matrix and the homomorphically encrypted sample tag matrix to a second party; receiving a first matrix generated by a second participant, wherein the first matrix is generated by splicing a prediction tag matrix and a homomorphic encrypted sample tag matrix according to columns and performing dense state confusion and column disorder operation, and the prediction tag matrix is a matrix product of the homomorphic encrypted weight matrix and a prediction result matrix; and homomorphic decryption is performed on the first matrix to obtain a second matrix.

title: Integrated sharing method, device, equipment and storage medium for digital pathology data
abstract: The invention discloses an integrated sharing method, device and equipment for digital pathology data and a storage medium, wherein the method comprises the following steps: the method comprises the steps of obtaining a pathology image, carrying out feature extraction and labeling on the pathology image to obtain pathology data, constructing a pathology data alliance chain, storing the pathology data into the pathology data alliance chain, and constructing a pathology visualization module based on a meta universe mode so as to enable the pathology data alliance chain to be stored for visual display according to needs. The pathological data are linked up through the alliance chains, so that the security of multiple layers is increased, the visibility of the data can be improved, the data exchange between different hospitals and departments is more transparent, and the data sharing and cooperation are convenient; the alliance chain can support more nodes and users, provide multi-layer redundancy and can improve the usability and reliability of the network.

title: Systems and methods for filtering page recommendations
abstract: Systems, methods, and non-transitory computer-readable media can determine a profile model for a page that is accessible through the social networking system, the profile model describing one or more modal characteristics of users of the social networking system that have fanned the page. A determination can be made that the page should be recommended to a first user of the social networking system based at least in part on the profile model. At least one page recommendation that references the page can be provided to the first user.

title: Method and system for privacy and security computing verification based on blockchain and federated learning
abstract: The invention provides a privacy security calculation verification method and a system based on a block chain and federal learning, wherein the method comprises the following steps: for the model training of the Federal learning, K terminals are arranged in the system, and each terminal holds a model containing n i Local data set DB of individual samples i Obtaining a server loss function; minimizing a loss function by adopting an SGD (serving gateway device) until the specified iteration times or model accuracy is reached; determining differential privacy budgets by utilizing a data input stage and a loss function calculation stage of a differential privacy Gaussian mechanism interference model; loss function sensitivity is calculated, and differential privacy is achieved by adding gaussian noise to the output of the loss function. The invention establishes a collaborative training platform for multiple devices by using federal learning, introduces a block chain to realize decentralization and auditability of a training process, designs a self-adaptive differential privacy mechanism to protect parameter privacy and reduce the influence of noise on model accuracyPrivacy protection is achieved with high model accuracy.

title: System and method for statistical federated learning
abstract: A method for distributed machine learning (ML) at a central computing device is provided. The method includes: providing a global ML model to a plurality of local computing devices, wherein the global ML model includes a plurality of parameters; receiving, from each local computing device in a subset of the plurality of local computing devices, a local ML model updated based on the global ML model, wherein the local ML model includes weights with values corresponding to one or more of the plurality of parameters; constructing, for each weight value in each of the received local ML models, a probability distribution for each of the plurality of parameters with corresponding received weight values; sampling, using the constructed probability distribution for each weight value for each of the plurality of parameters, for all of the plurality of local computing devices to generate representative values for each weight; and updating the global ML model by averaging the representative values for each weight for each of the plurality of parameters.

title: Document signing and digital signatures with human as the password
abstract: A security platform architecture is described herein. A user identity platform architecture which uses a multitude of biometric analytics to create an identity token unique to an individual human. This token is derived on biometric factors like human behaviors, motion analytics, human physical characteristics like facial patterns, voice recognition prints, usage of device patterns, user location actions and other human behaviors which can derive a token or be used as a dynamic password identifying the unique individual with high calculated confidence. Because of the dynamic nature and the many different factors, this method is extremely difficult to spoof or hack by malicious actors or malware software.

title: Processing of data
abstract: Disclosed in the embodiments of the present description are a method and apparatus for processing data, and a device. The method is applied to a terminal device, wherein the terminal device comprises a trusted execution environment. The method comprises: acquiring service data of a target service by means of a trusted application corresponding to the target service, and transmitting the service data to a trusted execution environment, wherein the trusted execution environment is provided with a privacy protection rule for performing differential-privacy processing on the service data of the target service; in the trusted execution environment, performing differential-privacy processing on the service data on the basis of the privacy protection rule, so as to obtain differential-privacy service data; and transmitting the differential-privacy service data to a trusted execution environment of a server, so as to trigger the server to acquire risk label information corresponding to the service data, and in the trusted execution environment of the server and on the basis of the risk information and the differential-privacy service data, determining risk information corresponding to the service data.

title: Image processing method, device, equipment, medium and product based on longitudinal federation
abstract: The application discloses a longitudinal federation-based image processing method, a device, equipment, a medium and a product, wherein the longitudinal federation-based image processing method is applied to a first participant and comprises the following steps of: acquiring initial training sample data and target identification data; the method comprises the steps that initial training sample data and target identification data are input into a convolutional neural network model, feature extraction is conducted on the initial training sample data, and target training sample features are obtained, wherein the convolutional neural network model comprises an identification layer, parameters of the identification layer are determined according to the target identification data, and the identification layer is used for conducting transformation processing on the initial training sample data after convolution processing; and transmitting the target training sample characteristics to a second participant with the tag information so that the second participant trains the second participant prediction model based on the target training sample characteristics. The method solves the technical problem that the prediction effect of longitudinal federal learning is poor after privacy protection in the prior art.

title: Methods and systems for improved federated learning and implementations thereof
abstract: This disclosure provides novel methods and systems for novel two-way knowledge distillation-based federated learning framework (referred to as Fed2KD) that can work homogeneous models, e.g., models with different configurations, user preferences, and/or different properties of user devices. In the disclosed Fed2KD, the knowledge exchange between the global and local models is achieved by distilling the information into or out from a tiny model with unified configuration using a proxy dataset generated by conditional variational autoencoder (CVAE). In another aspect, an improved federated learning framework is disclosed that implements a federated learning-based Next Generation Radio Access Networks (NG-RAN) algorithm (referred to as FedNG). The disclosed FedNG can be implemented to address the limited capacity of the fronthaul links as well as privacy concerns.

title: Multi-mode network content security intelligent auditing system and method thereof
abstract: The invention provides a multimode network content security intelligent auditing system and a method thereof, belonging to the network content security field, wherein the system comprises: the data access and preprocessing module is used for receiving the multi-mode network content data from different sources and preprocessing the multi-mode network content data; the multi-mode analysis module is used for extracting the characteristics of different modes of content from the multi-mode network content data; the strategy management module is used for configuring and managing auditing strategies of different-mode contents; the auditing engine module is used for comprehensively utilizing the rule engine and the machine learning model and auditing the multi-mode network content data according to the characteristics of different-mode content and auditing strategies; the auditing result disposal module is used for outputting and storing auditing results and triggering corresponding manual auditing or automatic disposal flow according to the auditing results. The invention comprehensively utilizes a plurality of artificial intelligence technologies to comprehensively audit texts, pictures, videos and audios, thereby greatly improving the content security management and control capability.

title: Longitudinal Federated Logistic Regression Training Method and System Separated from Data Cube and Computing Cube
abstract: The disclosure relates to a longitudinal federal logistic regression training method and system with data party and computing party separated. The training of the model is completed by a plurality of participants, the computing node of each participant is a first network node, the data node of each participant is a second network node, each participant comprises a label holder and a label non-holder, and the longitudinal federal logistic regression training method for separating the data and the computing nodes comprises the following steps: the data node of the label holder deforms the private original data and sends the deformed data to the computing node of the user, and the data node of the label non-holder deforms the private original data and sends the deformed data to the computing node of the user; the computing nodes of the label holder and the label non-holder interactively communicate to perform model training based on the deformed data. Model training based on longitudinal federal learning, which is separated from a data party and a calculation party, can be completed, so that the application range of model training is improved.

title: Augmenting gesture based security technology for improved differentiation
abstract: A method, apparatus and computer program product for improving differentiation in a gesture based security system is described. An image based feed from a camera is received by a gesture based security system. The camera views a secured area. The system recognizes a gesture within the feed. Non-gesture metadata is associated with the recognized gesture. The system determines whether the recognized gesture is an approved gesture within the secured area according to the non-gesture metadata associated with the recognized gesture.

title: Gps pathfinder cell phone and method
abstract: A device and system for use before and after a disaster which incorporate a "Whole Community" response. The system can be readily customized for use in other markets and scenarios and is easily adapted into uses by emergency management. The device incorporates a GPS radio and/or cell phones with very simplified, pre-programmed instructions which are uploaded automatically in the device's memory via wireless technology prior to the unit's first use. Radios on the units can enable the searchers to audibly communicate with each other without cell towers. The system can be employed by cleanup teams, insurance adjusters, and any number of pre or post response teams focused on mitigation, preparedness, response, and recovery operations. The system can also export data gathered in the field as well as integrate this data with other, pre-existing software via software APIs contained within the system and cell phone software.

title: Distributed trusted privacy computing system
abstract: The invention discloses a distributed trusted privacy computing system, which comprises a trusted privacy computing system and a distributed verification system; the distributed verification system comprises a node verification port module, a node identity verification module, an identity information storage module and an access record storage module, wherein the node verification port module is connected with the identity information storage module and the access record storage module through the node identity verification module. The invention relates to a trusted privacy computing system and a distributed verification system comprising a node verification port module, a node identity verification module, an identity information storage module and an access record storage module, wherein before a visitor accesses the distributed verification system, strict supervision records are carried out on the visitor accessing the privacy computing system in the modes of node verification, node identity storage and node access records, so that the safety and the reliability of the distributed trusted privacy computing system are ensured.

title: Detection method and device for room camera device and detection equipment
abstract: The application discloses a detection method, a detection device and detection equipment for a room camera device, a detection method, a detection device and a user terminal for the room camera device, a management method and a management device for the room camera device, a merchant terminal and a detection system. The detection method comprises the following steps: receiving merchant dimension data submitted by a merchant terminal and merchant detection data obtained by detecting a camera device aiming at least one room local area network; judging whether a camera device exists in the room local area network or not according to the merchant detection data, obtaining a merchant detection result, and sending the merchant detection result to the merchant terminal; and storing the merchant dimension data and the merchant detection result corresponding to the merchant dimension data in a database. According to the method and the system, the server is used for detecting the local area network in the room, the detection result is synchronously updated in the database, whether the suspicious camera device exists can be accurately and efficiently detected, and the false alarm rate is low.

title: Systems and methods for automated candidate recommendations
abstract: Systems, methods, and non-transitory computer-readable media can generate a relevance score for each candidate of a plurality of candidates based on a relevance model. The relevance score is indicative of a relevance of the candidate in relation to a talent pipeline. A quality score is generated for each candidate of the plurality of candidates based on a quality model. The quality score is indicative of a likelihood of the candidate to receive a job offer if the candidate is interviewed. A candidate score is generated for each candidate of the plurality of candidates based on the relevance score and the quality score.

title: Systems and methods for managing shared content
abstract: Systems, methods, and non-transitory computer-readable media can determine that a content item has been shared by a first user through a computing system, wherein the shared content item is distributed to one or more other users of the computing system through respective news feeds corresponding to the one or more other users. A determination can be made that the shared content item has been selected for isolation by at least one second user. The content item can be isolated from the respective news feeds corresponding to the one or more other users, wherein the isolated content item is removed from the respective news feeds.

title: Call and response processing engine and clearinghouse architecture, system and method
abstract: A computer-based method to identify and solve problems that exist in a real-world system by cross-functional, cross-industry logic methods and technology-enabled infrastructure to facilitate inventive business problem solving through integrated system and method to (1) formulate search questions and send a call request, (2) receive the call and execute the search question, (3) receive the search question results and packages them into a response message, (4) sends response message corresponding to the call request.

title: Data processing and communications systems and methods for the efficient implementation of privacy by design
abstract: Data processing systems and methods for: (1) receiving from a first set of users, respective answers for question/answer pairings regarding a product's proposed design; (2) using the question/answer pairings to prepare an initial privacy impact assessment for the product; (3) displaying the plurality of question/answer pairings to a second set of users; (4) receiving recommended steps to be implemented, before the product's implementation date, as part of the design of the product to address any privacy-related concerns identified in the initial privacy impact assessment; and (5) after the tasks have been completed, generating a report documenting that: (a) the initial privacy assessment has been conducted for the product; (b) one or more revisions have been made to the product to facilitate the compliance of the product with the one or more privacy standards; and (c) an updated privacy assessment has been conducted for the product.

title: System and method of a requirement, active compliance and resource management for cyber security application
abstract: A system and/or a method based on a scalable requirement, active compliance and resource management for enhancing real-time and/or near real-time Cyber security, utilizing a learning (self-learning) computer integrated with (a) one or more learning/quantum learning/fuzzy/neuro-fuzzy logic algorithms in real-time or near real-time and/or (b) one or more software agents in real-time or near real-time and/or (c) encrypted data or a set of encrypted data blocks identified with a blockchain, further coupled with a (quantum computing resistant) public key/private cryptosystem and/or semantic web and/or hardware authentication is disclosed.

title: Machine learning lite
abstract: A security platform architecture is described herein. A user identity platform architecture which uses a multitude of biometric analytics to create an identity token unique to an individual human. This token is derived on biometric factors like human behaviors, motion analytics, human physical characteristics like facial patterns, voice recognition prints, usage of device patterns, user location actions and other human behaviors which can derive a token or be used as a dynamic password identifying the unique individual with high calculated confidence. Because of the dynamic nature and the many different factors, this method is extremely difficult to spoof or hack by malicious actors or malware software.

title: Personalized electrocardiosignal monitoring method based on federal learning
abstract: A personalized electrocardiosignal monitoring method based on federal learning is characterized in that an initialization model trained by a cloud is divided into a basic feature extraction network and a personalized classification network, and the basic feature extraction network uploaded by a plurality of terminals is trained only by adopting a federal strategy. Because each terminal only uploads part of the model parameters, malicious persons can be prevented from recovering the original data through the whole model parameters. Model training by federal strategy has higher communication efficiency than passive sequence parameter update. In order to better learn individual personalized features and improve the accuracy of a classification model, a plurality of terminals fully learn the basic features through a collaborative training basic feature extraction network, and the personalized classification network is only reserved at the terminals for extraction of the personalized features. When a new individual is added, the basic feature extraction network can be directly used as a basic feature extraction part of the new individual, and the personalized electrocardiosignal monitoring model can be obtained only by a small amount of individual data.

title: Feature screening method, device, equipment and storage medium in federal feature engineering
abstract: The application discloses a feature screening method, device and equipment in federal feature engineering and a storage medium, and relates to the technical field of federal learning. Comprising the following steps: executing circuit privacy set intersection with a second party to obtain an intersection fragment, wherein the intersection fragment is used for representing a sample intersection situation between the first party and the second party, and comprises a first intersection fragment owned by the first party and a second intersection fragment owned by the second party; performing federal feature engineering processing on the intersection fragments through secure multipartite calculation with a second participant to obtain feature indexes of sample features to be analyzed, wherein the feature indexes are used for evaluating the prediction capability of the sample features to be analyzed on sample classification; and carrying out feature screening based on the feature indexes, wherein the sample features obtained by screening are used for federal learning. The embodiment of the application realizes federal characteristic engineering of the hidden state and improves the safety of data of all parties in the federal learning process.

title: A fine-grained and configurable universal identity privacy protection system for blockchain
abstract: The invention relates to a block chain-oriented fine-granularity configurable universal identity privacy protection system which comprises an application layer, a service layer and a base layer, wherein the application layer is used for receiving user attribute information input by a user corresponding to any node in a block chain and part of user attribute information selected by the user in the user attribute information, the block chain is pre-deployed in the service layer, the block chain is a public chain corresponding to a distribution mode without a trust center or a alliance chain corresponding to a distribution mode with a half trust center or a private chain corresponding to a trust center, the service layer is used for executing an intelligent contract pre-deployed on the block chain according to the user attribute information input by the user and part of user attribute information, so that when the user in the block chain interacts with other nodes on the block chain, part of user attribute information selected by the user in the user attribute information on any node is hidden, and the base layer is used for pre-storing a plurality of functional algorithms.

title: Information sharing for cyberattack recognition and response
abstract: This disclosure describes techniques for maintaining and using a warehouse of data about potential or actual cyberattack threats for an industry. In one example, this disclosure describes a method that includes outputting, by a computing system operated by a first entity and to a data warehouse, information about activity within a first network operated by the first entity; receiving, by the computing system and from the data warehouse, information about attributes of a peer attack directed to a second network operated by a second entity, wherein the first entity and the second entity may be marketplace competitors; applying, by the computing system, a model to identify a network asset included within the first network that is vulnerable to an attack having the attributes of the peer attack; and outputting, by the computing system and to the network asset, a control signal to modify the operation of the network asset.

title: Containing disinformation spread using customizable intelligence channels
abstract: Techniques are provided for rating the veracity of content distributed via digital communications sources by creating an ontology and selecting keywords for a topic of the content, creating a customizable intelligence channel for the topic, and extracting from the customizable intelligence channel a first list of potential experts on the topic sorted by at least relevance and influence. The list of experts may be supplemented by mining trusted media sources to extract a second list of potential experts or witnesses on the topic. The first and second lists of potential experts are evaluated as a function of at least one of professionalism, reliability, proximity, experience, responsiveness, and lack of self-interest in the topic to identify a short list of experts. The content is provided to the short list of experts, who are polled about the veracity of the content to create a veracity score for delivery with the content.

title: Audio and video program recording, editing and playback systems using metadata
abstract: A system for utilizing metadata created either at a central location for shared use by connected users, or at each individual user's location, to enhance user's enjoyment of available broadcast programming content. A variety of mechanisms are employed for automatically and manually identifying and designating programming segments, associating descriptive metadata which the identified segments, distributing the metadata for use at client locations, and using the supplied metadata to selectively record and playback desired programming.

title: Interactive image segmentation
abstract: A first subset of pixels of an image may be labeled with an object identifier based on user interactions with the image. Pixel data representing the pixels of the image may be passed through an embedding neural network model to generate pixel embedding vectors. A prototype embedding vector associated with the object identifier may be generated based pixel embedding vectors corresponding to the first subset of pixels. For each pixel of a second subset of pixels of the image, a probability that the pixel should be labeled with the object identifier may be determined based on the prototype embedding vector and pixel embedding vectors corresponding to the second subset of pixels. Pixels of the second subset of pixels may be labeled with the object identifier based on the determined probabilities, and the pixels in the image may be segmented based on the pixels labeled with the object identifier.

title: Systems and methods of identifying and managing remotely piloted and piloted air traffic
abstract: Embodiments of the present disclosure provide improved systems (200, 400) and methods (500, 600, 700, 800) of identifying and managing unmanned (230) and manned (120 a-b) air traffic. The systems and methods of the present disclosure allow for the establishment of communications that both protects and shares identity and other informational data. The exemplary system is a dynamic secure identification network system enabling users of the system, including aircraft and aircraft operators 250, to engage with all users of the system and share identification information through a permission-based network system, for example, a blockchain based system. The system enables varying levels of identity and other information to be communicated about each aircraft system located within the ecosystem and being queried by a user. Aircraft systems may include operated and/or autonomous aircraft systems.

title: Method for protecting data in a wireless body area network (WBAN) system
abstract: A method for protecting data in a Wireless Body Area Network (WBAN) system is performed as follows. A current status of a data in a WBAN system is monitored and obtained. A potential risk to the data in the current status is assessed based on nodes in the WBAN system and a path between the nodes. A risk level of the WBAN system is quantified by calculating a risk degree of the potential risk under attack methods. First protection schemes are selected from a second protection schemes based on the risk level of the WBAN system. The first protection schemes are evaluated based on Analytic Hierarchy Process (AHP), by taking the attack methods, an utility and an efficiency of the first protection schemes as evaluation indicators to select a third protection scheme from the first protection schemes. The data is processed according to the third protection scheme.

title: Method, apparatus and device for training federated neural network model, and computer program product and computer-readable storage medium
abstract: A method, apparatus and device for training a federated neural network model, and a computer program product and a computer-readable storage medium. The method comprises: performing forward calculation processing on sample data by means of a first model, so as to obtain an output vector of the first model; performing, by means of an interaction layer, forward calculation processing on the output vector of the first model, a model parameter of the interaction layer and an encryption model parameter, so as to obtain an output vector of the interaction layer; performing forward calculation processing on the output vector of the interaction layer by means of a second model, so as to obtain an output vector of a federated neural network model; performing backpropagation processing on the federated neural network model according to a loss result corresponding to the output vector of the federated neural network model, and according to a backpropagation processing result, updating the model parameter of the interaction layer, a parameter of the first model and a parameter of the second model; and generating a trained federated neural network model on the basis of the updated model parameter of the interaction layer, an updated model parameter of the first model and an updated model parameter of the second model.

title: Systems and methods for intelligently managing multimedia for emergency response
abstract: Described herein are systems, devices, methods, and media for connecting a user for transmitting multimedia from electronic devices to emergency service providers. In some embodiments, a method for transmitting multimedia from an electronic device to an emergency service provider by an emergency management system includes the steps of: detecting an emergency alert indicative of an emergency; wherein each sensor within the set of pertinent sensors is determined to be associated with the emergency; obtaining a first set of multimedia contents from the set of pertinent sensors; determining, based on at least one of the set of pertinent sensors and the first set of multimedia contents, a set of relevant sensors from the set of pertinent sensors; and transmitting a second set of multimedia contents from the set of relevant sensors to an emergency service provider.

title: Parameter identification method system of shield tunneling simulation model based on federated reinforcement learning
abstract: The invention belongs to the field of shield simulation modeling, and relates to a shield tunneling simulation model parameter identification method based on federal reinforcement learning. The method comprises the following steps: each client establishes a parameterized shield tunneling simulation model according to local original data; the central coordinator lowers the reinforcement learning model to each client to perform reinforcement learning training of the shield tunneling simulation model parameter identification; the client encrypts the related data obtained in the reinforcement learning training process in a homomorphic manner and then uploads the encrypted data to the central coordinator; the central coordinator selectively aggregates the client model parameters with larger convergence potential, constructs new global gradient information, and then returns the latest model data to each client; and updating the local model by each client, then performing reinforcement learning training to obtain undetermined parameter values, and performing simulation and iterative training until the error is within an acceptable range. The invention has important function for assisting the shield machine to safely and efficiently carry out tunneling.

title: System and method for internet activity and health forecasting and internet noise analysis
abstract: A system and method for large-scale internet health forecasting and internet noise analysis. The system and method feature the ability to scan for, ingest and process, and then use various data stores for capturing entity data, their relationships, and actions associated with them. This data forms the basis for cyber enrichment service databases which can used to provide information responsive to user submitted queries as well as to produce large-scale (e.g., Internet scale) simulation models using statistical models, generative ML models, massively multiplayer online gaming simulation systems, or full discrete event simulation engines or some combination. User submitted queries can be ran against the raw data or against simulations to provide simulation results that can be used improve cybersecurity for an organization against actual observed behaviors or simulations.

title: Apparatuses, computer program products, and computer-implemented methods for privacy-preserving federated learning
abstract: Privacy-preserving federated learning apparatuses, systems, computer program products, and methods are provided that generate an updated global model based on a set of client models while maintaining privacy regarding the data values embodying each client model and the updated global model. In this regard, masked client models are utilized, which cryptographically obfuscate data values embodying the client model while still enabling combination, or “aggregation,” of the masked client models to generate a masked updated global model. The masked updated global model similarly includes obfuscated data values embodying the updated global model, but may be unmasked to reveal the true values of the updated global model for use. Some embodiments utilize specific steps for communication between environments, systems, devices, and/or the like, to ensure the masked models can only be unmasked by intended entities.

title: Machine learning assisted image prediction
abstract: A device implementing a system for providing predicted RGB images includes at least one processor configured to obtain an infrared image of a subject, and to obtain a reference RGB image of the subject. The at least one processor is further configured to provide the infrared image and the reference RGB image to a machine learning model, the machine learning model having been trained to output predicted RGB images of subjects based on infrared images and reference RGB images of the subjects. The at least one processor is further configured to provide a predicted RGB image of the subject based on output by the machine learning model.

title: System and method for federated learning with local differential privacy
abstract: In one embodiment, a method includes accessing a plurality of initial gradients associated with a machine-learning model from a data store associated with a first electronic device, selecting one or more of the plurality of initial gradients for perturbation, generating one or more perturbed gradients for the one or more selected initial gradients based on a gradient-perturbation model, respectively, wherein for each selected initial gradient: an input to the gradient-perturbation model comprises the selected initial gradient having a value x, the gradient-perturbation model changes x into a first continuous value with a first probability or a second continuous value with a second probability, and the first and second probabilities are determined based on x, and sending the one or more perturbed gradients from the first electronic device to a second electronic device.

title: Database access system
abstract: An improved human user computer interface system, wherein a user characteristic or set of characteristics, such as demographic profile or societal “role”, is employed to define a scope or domain of operation. The operation itself may be a database search, to interactively define a taxonomic context for the operation, a business negotiation, or other activity. After retrieval of results, a scoring or ranking may be applied according to user define criteria, which are, for example, commensurate with the relevance to the context, but may be, for example, by date, source, or other secondary criteria. A user profile is preferably stored in a computer accessible form, and may be used to provide a history of use, persistent customization, collaborative filtering and demographic information for the user. Advantageously, user privacy and anonymity is maintained by physical and algorithmic controls over access to the personal profiles, and releasing only aggregate data without personally identifying information or of small groups.

title: Privacy-preserving asynchronous federated learning for vertical partitioned data
abstract: System and method for training a federated learning model asynchronously. The system includes a coordinator, an active computing device and a passive computing device in communication with each other. The active computing device has a processor and a storage device storing computer executable code. The computer executable code is configured to: train the federated learning model in the active computing device using dimensions of an instance in the active computing device; and instruct the at least one passive computing device to train the federated learning model in the at least one passive computing device using dimensions of the instance in the at least one passive computing device. The training instances in the active and the at least one passive computing devices do not correspond to each other at the same training time.

title: Federated learning poisoning detection method based on neuron distribution characteristics
abstract: The invention discloses a federal learning poisoning detection method based on neuron distribution characteristics, which comprises the following steps of: (1) Acquiring a plurality of edge models trained and uploaded at a client, and screening a plurality of edge models meeting screening requirements from the plurality of edge models uploaded each time as candidate poisoning models according to the similarity of the edge models uploaded adjacent times corresponding to each client; (2) Screening at least 1 model from candidate poisoning models according to the distribution state of model parameters, and eliminating the poisoning models, (3) inverting the poisoning models according to sample data and labels to obtain poisoning patch data, optimizing the aggregation model parameters of a server according to the poisoning patch data to obtain an optimized aggregation model, and issuing the optimized aggregation model from the server to a client to serve as an edge model of the client for the edge training of the next round. The federal learning poisoning detection method can be used for rapidly detecting the poisoning model.

title: User attribute prediction method, device, computer equipment and storage medium
abstract: The application discloses a user attribute prediction method, a user attribute prediction device, computer equipment and a storage medium, wherein the method comprises the following steps: the method comprises the steps of obtaining a first user characteristic and a first sub-model of a user to be predicted on a first user characteristic dimension, and generating a first data prediction parameter according to the first user characteristic and the first sub-model; receiving a data prediction random number generated by the second participating device according to the second data prediction parameter based on the private domain transmission channel; the second data prediction parameters are generated by the second participating device according to the second user characteristics of the user to be predicted on the second user characteristic dimension and the model parameters of the second sub-model; performing model prediction parameter synthesis processing on the first data prediction parameter and the data prediction random number to obtain a model prediction parameter for the target model; the target model consists of a first submodel and a second submodel; and predicting and outputting the user attribute of the user to be predicted according to the model prediction parameters. By the method and the device, the prediction efficiency aiming at the user attributes can be improved.

title: Method and system for enhancing privacy of federated learning training data
abstract: A method and a system for enhancing privacy of federated learning training data are provided, the method comprises the following steps: the first server generates public parameters and a master key and sends the public parameters to the second server; a plurality of clients participating in federal learning generate respective public key and private key pairs based on the public parameters; the federal learning procedure is as follows: each client encrypts the model parameters obtained by local training by adopting a respective public key, and sends the encrypted model parameters and the corresponding public key to the first server through the second server; the first server decrypts based on the master key, obtains global model parameters through weighted average, encrypts by adopting the public keys of the clients respectively, and sends the parameters to the clients through the second server; the client-side obtains the global model parameters through decryption based on the respective private key, improves the local model, and repeats the process until the local model of each client-side is converged. The invention ensures the safety of data and model parameters by adopting a double-server mode and combining multi-key homomorphic encryption.

title: Privacy-preserving federated learning
abstract: A plurality of public encryption keys are distributed to a plurality of participants in a federated learning system, and a first plurality of responses is received from the plurality of participants, where each respective response of the first plurality of responses was generated based on training data local to a respective participant of the plurality of participants and is encrypted using a respective public encryption key of the plurality of public encryption keys. A first aggregation vector is generated based on the first plurality of responses, and a first private encryption key is retrieved using the first aggregation vector. An aggregated model is then generated based on the first private encryption key and the first plurality of responses.

title: Distributed key management and encryption for blockchains
abstract: Techniques for enhancing the security and privacy of blockchain are described. One approach implements a blockchain encryption management system. The system includes multiple nodes that are each configured to integrate encryption-related services with a distributed blockchain ledger. The consensus mechanism of the blockchain ledger is used to communicate information, requests, and responses about encryption-related functions performed throughout the system. For example, a new encryption key can be transmitted from a first node to a second node by securely recording the key in the blockchain ledger. The key is communicated to the second node via the blockchain consensus mechanism. This key can then be used by the second node to encrypt the contents of a transaction that is recorded in blockchain ledger, thereby providing privacy to the parties to the transaction.

title: Method and system for confidential sentiment analysis
abstract: A confidential sentiment analysis method includes receiving call data, storing the call data including interaction metadata, generating a speech-to-text transcript corresponding to words spoken by one or more callers, generating an anonymized transcript by anonymizing personally identifiable words, and generating a sentiment score by analyzing the anonymized transcript. A computing system includes a processor, and a memory including computer executable instructions that, when executed by the one processor, cause the system to receive call data, store the call data, generate a speech-to-text transcript, generate an anonymized transcript by anonymizing personally identifiable words, and generate a sentiment score based on the anonymized transcript. A non-transitory computer readable medium contains program instructions that when executed, cause a computer system to receive call data, store the call data, generate a speech-to-text transcript, generate an anonymized transcript by anonymizing personally identifiable words, and generate a sentiment score based on the anonymized transcript.

title: Precision feedback federated learning method for privacy protection
abstract: The invention discloses a precision feedback federal learning method facing privacy protection, which comprises the following steps: each client uses GAN to carry out data enhancement on the local data set, and the obtained generated data is uploaded to a server to form a shared data set; the server initializes the model parameters and broadcasts the model parameters to all clients; each client side performs local model training by using the downloaded global parameters, and uploads the parameters to a server after training; the server tests each local model to obtain model accuracy and then generates new aggregation weight; the server utilizes the aggregation weight to carry out model aggregation on the local model; the server carries out global training on the aggregated parameters by utilizing the shared data set, and broadcasts the parameters to all clients after obtaining a global model; repeating the steps three to six until the performance of the model meets the requirement. The method can improve the influence of the client data dependent co-distribution and the client training weight on the global model performance on the premise of protecting the client data.

title: Systems and methods for securely sharing and processing data between parties
abstract: Systems, methods, and non-transitory computer-readable media can determine a first dataset provided by a first party, wherein the first dataset includes a set of vectors that are each associated with a user identifier. A second dataset provided by a second party can be determined, wherein the second dataset includes a set of vectors that are each associated with a user identifier. One or more vectors in the first dataset can be matched to vectors in the second dataset based on a secure multi-party computation without revealing respective graph information of the first party or the second party. Respective mappings between vectors in the first dataset to a set of shared universal identifiers can be provided to the first party. Respective mappings between vectors in the second dataset to the set of shared universal identifiers can be provided to the second party.

title: Method and system for identifying and addressing potential account takeover activity in a financial system
abstract: Account takeover is one of a number of types of Internet-centric crime (i.e., cybercrime) that includes the unauthorized access/use of a user's account with the user's identity or credentials (e.g., username and/or password). Because fraudsters acquire user credentials through phishing, spyware, or malware scams, it can be difficult to detect unauthorized access of a user's account. Methods and systems of the present disclosure identify and address potential account takeover activity, according to one embodiment. The methods and systems acquire system access data, apply the system access data to one or more predictive models to generate one or more risk scores, and perform one or more risk reduction actions based on the one or more risk scores, according to one embodiment. The financial system is a tax return preparation system according to one embodiment.

title: Systems and methods for zero-trust algorithm deployment and operation on a protected dataset
abstract: Systems and methods for the deployment and operation of an algorithm in a zero-trust environment are provided. In some embodiments, an algorithm is encrypted by an algorithm developer within a zero-trust computing node, using a public key. This generates a payload that is transferred to a core management system which in turn distributes the payload to one or more sequestered computing nodes located within the infrastructure of one or more data stewards. The sequestered computing nodes are designed to preserve privacy of data assets and the algorithm. Next the payloads are decrypted, using a private key, within the sequestered computing nodes. This yields the algorithm that can be run against the data assets of the data steward. A report is generated that can be shared with the appropriate parties.

title: Providing trustworthy workflow across trust boundaries
abstract: Methods, systems and apparatuses for providing trustworthy workflow across trust boundaries are disclosed. One method includes a curator generating a first public key (PKC1) and a second public key (PKC2), publishing the first public key (PKC1) and the second public key (PKC2), and generating a first proxy re-encryption key (RKC1-C2) and a second proxy re-encryption key (RKC2-B). Further, a first party encrypts data having a key k, wherein k is encrypted according to the first public key (PKC1). A custodian proxy re-encrypts k from the first public key (PKC1) to the second public key (PKC2) using the first proxy re-encryption key (RK C1-C2), and the custodian proxy re-encrypts k from the second public key (PKC2) to a public key (PKB) of the second party B using the second proxy re-encryption key (RKC2-B). The second party B receiving the data and decrypting the data with the key k.

title: Data processing method based on trusted execution environment and related device
abstract: The application discloses a data processing method and a related device based on a trusted execution environment, which are applied to the technical field of cloud. The method comprises the steps that equipment which is configured with a trusted execution environment in participating equipment is used as a strong participating party, equipment which is not configured with the trusted execution environment is used as a weak participating party, data in the participating equipment is subjected to a nested encryption process, and the data are transmitted to the trusted execution environment of the strong participating party for processing; and further broadcasting the processing result. The method and the device realize the decentralized data processing process, reduce the risk of data leakage because data are only transmitted among the participating devices in the data processing process, and transmit the private devices of the participating devices to the trusted execution environment of the strong participating party through the symmetric encryption algorithm and the asymmetric encryption algorithm, thereby further improving the security of data processing.

title: Data sharing method and apparatus, and digital gateway and computer-readable storage medium
abstract: Provided are a data sharing method and apparatus, and a digital gateway and a computer-readable storage medium. In the method in the embodiments of the present application, after original data corresponding to a data sharing task is acquired by means of a digital gateway, shared data matching a confidentiality level of the original data is generated, namely, a sharing level matching the confidentiality level of the original data is used to perform data sharing.
