abstract: The invention provides a layered federal learning method, a layered federal learning device, terminal equipment and a storage medium based on asynchronous communication, and relates to the technical field of wireless communication networks; the method comprises the steps that an edge server issues a global model to a client in a cluster to which the edge server belongs; the client updates the model by using local data and uploads the model to each cluster edge server; the edge server determines to update the clients in the cluster according to the update uploading time of the clients; the edge server averages the received model parameters and selects asynchronous uploading to a central server or directly issuing to the client according to the updating times of the current client; the central server carries out weighted average on the parameters uploaded by the edge server and then sends the parameters to the client for training until the local model converges or reaches the expected standard; the invention can efficiently execute the federal learning task, reduce the communication cost required by the federal learning model parameters, dynamically select the edge server butted by the client and improve the integral training efficiency of the federal learning.

title: Systems and methods for training machine learning models for language clusters
abstract: Systems, methods, and non-transitory computer readable media can generate a plurality of language clusters based on one or more of: language similarity between languages or social behavior similarity between languages. A representative language for a language cluster of the plurality of language clusters can be determined. For the language cluster of the plurality of language clusters, a machine learning model can be trained based on the representative language for the language cluster to classify content items in languages included in the language cluster.

title: Model training method based on federal learning
abstract: A model training method based on federal learning is disclosed. In order to protect the privacy (model parameters) of the server side from being leaked, the server side encrypts a model parameter set by adopting a homomorphic encryption algorithm and then sends the model parameter set to the node, and the node performs model calculation in an encryption state by using the encrypted model parameters and a local training sample based on a homomorphic encryption principle to obtain an encryption gradient. Then, the node calculates the difference between the encryption gradient and the encrypted random number based on the homomorphic encryption principle, and the difference is essentially some meaningless value of the encryption. And then, the node uploads the encrypted value to the server. In addition, the server can use the SA protocol to learn the sum of the random numbers on each node without learning the random number on each node. Therefore, the server side can restore the sum of the gradients generated by each node according to the sum of the encrypted value uploaded by each node and each random number, and the model parameters can be updated.

title: Combining personalization and privacy locally on devices
abstract: A profiling service may determine, local to a device, user profile attributes associated with a device user based on interaction of the device user with the device, based on device-local monitoring of device user interactions with the device, and may store the user profile attributes in a memory. The profiling service may be configured as an augmentation to a device operating system of the device. A profile exposure component may manage exposure of information associated with the user profile attributes to applications operating locally on the device, without exposure to the applications or to third parties of information determined as sensitive to the device user.

title: Risk prevention and control methods, apparatuses, and devices
abstract: In an implementation, an initial risk prevention and control model of a to-be-trained target service corresponding to a classification group that a terminal device belongs to is received from a server. To obtain a risk prevention and control sub-model corresponding to the terminal device and based on pre-stored training sample data including at least data related to a user of the terminal device and the to-be-trained target service, performing model training on the initial risk prevention and control model. To obtain a risk prevention and control model corresponding to the classification group that the terminal device belongs to, sending to the server the risk prevention and control sub-model. The risk prevention and control model is received from the server as acquired data of the to-be-trained target service. Risk prevention and control processing is performed on the acquired data of the to-be-trained target service.

title: Systems and methods for providing a systemic error in artificial intelligence algorithms
abstract: Disclosed is a process for testing a suspect model to determine whether it was derived from a source model. An example method includes receiving, from a model owner node, a source model and a fingerprint associated with the source model, receiving a suspect model at a service node, based on a request to test the suspect model, applying the fingerprint to the suspect model to generate an output and, when the output has an accuracy that is equal to or greater than a threshold, determining that the suspect model is derived from the source model. Imperceptible noise can be used to generate the fingerprint which can cause predictable outputs from the source model and a potential derivative thereof.

title: Private data protection-based risk decision making method, apparatus and system, and device
abstract: A private data protection-based risk decision making method, apparatus and system, and a device. Said method is applied to a target member object in target federal learning training, and comprises: inputting a risk feature set belonging to private data into a local first risk control model, and determining a predicted contribution value of a target risk feature dimension, the target risk feature dimension being one of risk feature dimensions corresponding to the risk feature set and the first risk control model, and the first risk control model being obtained by means of target federal learning training; receiving predicted contribution values of the target risk feature dimension sent by other member objects in target federal learning training, a method for determining the predicted contribution values of the target risk feature dimension by the other member objects being consistent with that of the target member object; and on the basis of the predicted contribution values of the target risk feature dimension determined by at least two member objects including the target member object itself, determining interpretation data of the importance of the target risk feature dimension, so as to make a risk decision.

title: Model training method and apparatus, text classification method and apparatus, computer device and medium
abstract: A text classification model training method and apparatus, a text classification method and apparatus, a computer device and a medium, which relate to the fields of artificial intelligence and model construction. By means of uploading a model parameter of a local classification model and a local classification result to a federated learning server for performing joint learning, the security of text data in a model training process can be improved. The training method comprises: acquiring a text training set, and performing text classification training on a local classification model according to the text training set; encrypting a model parameter of the trained local classification model and a local classification result, and then uploading the encrypted model parameter and local classification result to a federated learning server for performing joint learning so as to obtain a learning parameter; and receiving the learning parameter sent by the federated learning server, updating the trained local classification model according to the learning parameter, and taking the updated local classification model as a trained text classification model. The present application further relates to blockchain technology. The text training set can be stored in a blockchain.

title: Systems and Methods for Implementing Smart Assistant Systems
abstract: In one embodiment, a system includes an automatic speech recognition (ASR) module, a natural-language understanding (NLU) module, a dialog manager, one or more agents, an arbitrator, a delivery system, one or more processors, and a non-transitory memory coupled to the processors comprising instructions executable by the processors, the processors operable when executing the instructions to receive a user input, process the user input using the ASR module, the NLU module, the dialog manager, one or more of the agents, the arbitrator, and the delivery system, and provide a response to the user input.

title: Technique to perform neural network architecture search with federated learning
abstract: Apparatuses, systems, and techniques to select a neural network architecture from a plurality of neural networks in a federated learning (FL) setting. In at least one embodiment, a neural network is trained by combining training results from different FL computing systems where each of the different FL computing systems, for example, trains different portions of the neural network.

title: Federal learning method, apparatus, device and storage medium
abstract: The application provides a federal learning method, a federal learning device, federal learning equipment and a storage medium, wherein the federal learning method comprises the following steps: establishing an initial model about the blockchain node, and taking the initial model as a local model of the blockchain node; performing model training on the local model by combining local data of the blockchain node by using a meta learning method to obtain an updated local model; and carrying out model training on the updated local model by combining the local data of the block chain node until the local model converges to a preset range, so as to determine a result model of the block chain node. According to the application, through a meta learning algorithm, the optimal solution can be quickly converged by only a small amount of training, the initial model can ensure that the similar tasks can be quickly converged in the future, and the corresponding result model is obtained, so that the computing resource is saved, and the benign operation of the system is facilitated.

title: Correction and completion of search queries
abstract: Aspects of subject technology provide systems and methods for simultaneously spell-correcting and completing partial search queries being entered by a user on the user's electronic device. An apparatus such as a computing device may receive partial search queries from the user's electronic device as each character of the partial search query is entered by the user. The apparatus may utilize a machine-learning model to generate suggested queries that include spelling-corrected versions of the received partial query, query completion suggestions for the partial query, and/or spelling-corrected completion suggestions for the partial query.

title: Systems and Methods for Implementing Smart Assistant Systems
abstract: In one embodiment, a system includes an automatic speech recognition (ASR) module, a natural-language understanding (NLU) module, a dialog manager, one or more agents, an arbitrator, a delivery system, one or more processors, and a non-transitory memory coupled to the processors comprising instructions executable by the processors, the processors operable when executing the instructions to receive a user input, process the user input using the ASR module, the NLU module, the dialog manager, one or more of the agents, the arbitrator, and the delivery system, and provide a response to the user input.

title: Federal learning method, apparatus, computer device and medium
abstract: The embodiment of the application discloses a method and a device for federated learning, computer equipment and a medium, and belongs to the technical field of computers. The method comprises the following steps: the method comprises the steps that a first computer device obtains sample label information corresponding to a sample identifier and obtains first fusion information corresponding to the sample identifier; the second computer equipment acquires second fusion information corresponding to the sample identifier and sends the second fusion information to the first computer equipment; the first computer equipment acquires a gradient operator corresponding to the sample identifier based on the first fusion information, the second fusion information and the sample label information, and sends the gradient operator to the second computer equipment; and the first computer equipment and the second computer equipment respectively adjust the model parameters of the first sub-model and the second sub-model in the machine learning model based on the gradient operator. The method improves the training speed of the model while ensuring the privacy of the user, enriches the characteristic information quantity of the sample and improves the accuracy of the model.

title: Systems and Methods for Implementing Smart Assistant Systems
abstract: In one embodiment, a system includes an automatic speech recognition (ASR) module, a natural-language understanding (NLU) module, a dialog manager, one or more agents, an arbitrator, a delivery system, one or more processors, and a non-transitory memory coupled to the processors comprising instructions executable by the processors, the processors operable when executing the instructions to receive a user input, process the user input using the ASR module, the NLU module, the dialog manager, one or more of the agents, the arbitrator, and the delivery system, and provide a response to the user input.

title: Methods and apparatuses for federated learning
abstract: Methods and apparatuses for implementing federated learning are described. A set of updates is obtained, where each update represents a respective difference between a global model and a respective local model. The global model is updated using a weighted average of the set of updates. A set of weighting coefficients is calculated, to be used in calculating the weighted average. The set of weighting coefficients is calculated by performing multi-objective optimization towards a Pareto-stationary solution across the set of updates. The weighted average is calculated by applying the set of weighting coefficients to the set of updates, and the global model is updated by adding the weighted average to the global model.

title: Method for federated-learning-based mobile edge cache optimization
abstract: The invention relates to an optimization method for mobile edge cache based on federated learning, and belongs to the field of Internet of things and artificial intelligence. According to the method, the situation that the user mobility and the content popularity change continuously in the range of a single base station is considered, and the cache hit rate is increased by predicting the content popularity and placing the request content in an edge cache in advance. The method specifically comprises the steps of obtaining a user moment trajectory table to simulate a moving path of a user by using an RWP random path point model, selecting the user participating in FL local training in a clustering, and threshold value combination mode in consideration of local training consumption, performing global model aggregation by using an attention mechanism to control model weight, and performing global prediction according to an obtained global prediction model. The predicted request content is cached to the server in advance to improve the cache hit rate. According to the method, a federated learning method is utilized; user selection and weight aggregation are optimized; and the effective federated learning method is implemented, so that the local training consumption is reduced, and the cache hit rate is increased.

title: Network training pedestrian re-identification method and storage medium
abstract: The embodiments of the present disclosure relate to a network training, a pedestrian re-identification method and a storage medium. The cloud server includes a first pedestrian re-identification network, and the method includes: sending to multiple side-end servers corresponding to the first pedestrian re-identification network The first network parameter; receiving the second network parameters returned by multiple side-end servers, the second network parameter is that each side-end server re-weights the second pedestrians included in itself according to the local image data set, the identity classification network and the first network parameter The recognition network is obtained by training; according to the second network parameters returned by multiple side-end servers, the first pedestrian re-recognition network is updated to obtain the updated first pedestrian re-recognition network.

title: Federated learning free-rider defense method and device based on model weight iteration
abstract: The invention discloses a federal learning and taking defense method and device based on model weight alternation, which comprises the steps of initializing a federal learning training environment, sending an initial global model to each client side by a server to start federal learning training, storing model parameters and calculating an updated change frequency F matrix after training is finished by each client side, uploading the model parameters and the weight change frequency matrix to a server side by each client side, obtaining the global model by the server side through an aggregation algorithm, calculating Euclidean distance between each client side and calculating average change frequency of each weight, marking the clients with abnormal Euclidean distance and average frequency, sending the updated global model to each client side by the server side, repeatedly carrying out primary screening on the parameters when the client side is marked for 3 times by the abnormality, and taking the client side as a taking attacker to take the federal learning training.

title: User identity based on human breath analytics
abstract: A security platform architecture is described herein. A user identity platform architecture which uses a multitude of biometric analytics to create an identity token unique to an individual human. This token is derived on biometric factors like human behaviors, motion analytics, human physical characteristics like facial patterns, voice recognition prints, usage of device patterns, user location actions and other human behaviors which can derive a token or be used as a dynamic password identifying the unique individual with high calculated confidence. Because of the dynamic nature and the many different factors, this method is extremely difficult to spoof or hack by malicious actors or malware software.

title: Model training method and device, data processing method and device, client and storage medium
abstract: The present invention relates to model construction in artificial intelligence, and provides a model training method and device, a data processing method and device, a client and a storage medium. The model training method comprises: obtaining ultrasonic image data containing a target detection object, and pre-training a preset neural network according to the ultrasonic image data to obtain a target neural network (S101); extracting a plurality of pieces of ultrasonic image data from the ultrasonic image data, and training the target neural network according to the plurality of pieces of ultrasonic image data to obtain the training result (S102); determining gradient data of the target neural network on the basis of the training result, encrypting the gradient data, and sending the encrypted gradient data to a federated learning server (S103); receiving target gradient data sent by the federated learning server (S104); and updating model parameters of the target neural network according to the target gradient data until the updated target neural network converges, to obtain an ultrasonic image data processing model (S105). The method can improve the detection effect and accuracy of the ultrasonic image data processing model.

title: Federated learning system
abstract: The invention discloses a federated learning system which comprises a alliance construction unit, a data mart unit, a model training unit, a model publishing unit and a report statistics unit, wherein the alliance construction unit comprises an alliance member module, a platform construction module and an alliance cooperation module, the data mart unit comprises a data uploading module, a data searching module and a subscription management module, the model training unit comprises a visual modeling module, a training task module and a training tracking module, the model publishing unit comprises a publishing module, a prediction task module and a prediction tracking module, and the report statistics unit is used for carrying out model training frequency statistics, ID intersection statistics, model prediction frequency statistics and data use condition statistics on each party of the alliance members.

title: Asynchronous federated learning method based on verifiable aggregation and differential privacy in peer-to-peer network
abstract: The invention discloses an asynchronous federated learning method based on verifiable aggregation and differential privacy in a peer-to-peer network. The federal learning method mainly comprises five stages: the method comprises a system initialization stage, a registration stage, a local model training stage, a model distribution stage and a model aggregation stage. The invention provides a verifiable federal learning scheme based on local data set testing and cosine value detection, aiming at the problems of data privacy protection and model performance in asynchronous federal learning. Before local model updating is carried out, effective model updating is screened out through a model verification scheme, and model updating with poor performance in verification tests is abandoned, so that the performance of the aggregation model is improved. Meanwhile, a privacy protection method combined with a local differential privacy method is designed in the scheme so as to ensure the safety of user data. The invention achieves the design targets of high reliability, high safety and high performance in the asynchronous federal learning scene, and has stronger practical application value.

title: Recommendation model training method, terminal and storage medium based on federal learning
abstract: The invention discloses a recommendation model training method, a terminal and a storage medium based on federal learning, wherein the method comprises the following steps: acquiring a user historical behavior data set recorded by a client application in a preset plurality of types of application projects; extracting a single characteristic user vector of each client application based on each group of user history behavior data sets; extracting a project characteristic vector set and a project evaluation set from a user history behavior data set of a target application; combining each single feature user vector, the project feature vector set and the project scoring set to obtain a local training sample set; and participating in federal learning based on the local training sample set to obtain a recommendation model of the target type application project. According to the recommendation model training method and device, model training is carried out under the federal framework to protect user privacy data, and meanwhile, recommendation model training is carried out based on multi-scene data, so that the recommendation model obtained through training can more accurately position preference characteristics of users, and therefore recommendation effect of the recommendation model is improved.

title: Privacy-preserving machine learning training based on homomorphic encryption using executable file packages in an untrusted environment
abstract: Aspects of the present disclosure provide systems, methods, and computer-readable storage media that support secure training of machine learning (ML) models that preserves privacy in untrusted environments using distributed executable file packages. The executable file packages may include files, libraries, scripts, and the like that enable a cloud service provider configured to provide ML model training based on non-encrypted data to also support homomorphic encryption of data and ML model training with one or more clients, particularly for a diagnosis prediction model trained using medical data. Because the training is based on encrypted client data, private client data such as patient medical data may be used to train the diagnosis prediction model without exposing the client data to the cloud service provider or others. Using homomorphic encryption enables training of the diagnosis prediction model using encrypted data without requiring decryption prior to training.

title: Federated modelling method based on non-uniformly distributed data, and related device
abstract: A federated modelling method based on non-uniformly distributed data, and a related device, which relate to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and may be used in smart hospital systems. The method comprises: splitting samples of original clients having a number of samples which exceeds a preset threshold value, and constructing several corresponding virtual clients according to the split samples; taking un-split original clients and the split virtual clients as training clients, executing local model training in parallel in the various training clients according to an original model, and during the training process, setting a corresponding loss weight for loss of each training client during training; aggregating changes reported by all the training clients after the training, and obtaining an average gradient; using the average gradient to update the original model, and obtaining a global model used for image classification. The method improves a classification effect for non-independent and non-uniformly distributed image data.

title: High-low voltage motor data processing method, system and device based on federal learning
abstract: The invention relates to a federal learning-based high-low voltage motor data processing method, system and device. The method comprises the following steps: obtaining a training sample; after the training model type is determined, starting a training algorithm built in the federal computing node device, and extracting characteristics for independent training; and the training results are encrypted and uploaded to a cloud server for summarizing calculation, the cloud server calculates average gradient and respective loss by homomorphic encryption, the average gradient and respective loss are still returned to each computing node device in an encryption mode, and the device models are updated after decryption, and repeated for a plurality of times until the models are stable. And when the running state of the motor is predicted, the corresponding motor fault state is predicted according to the optimal model, and the real-time waveform data transmitted to the device. The invention adopts the framework of federal learning, can better protect the privacy data of each enterprise, and simultaneously improves the accuracy of model training.

title: Efficient contribution assessment method in federated learning scene
abstract:
An efficient contribution assessment method in a federated learning scene is disclosed, which calculates the weight according to a training log: the server uses the federally learned training logs to calculate the weights of the various users in model aggregation. In the ordinary federal learning, in the t +1 epoch, the server aggregation model is formalized as follows:
and can be written as:
wherein theta ist+1Global model, θ, representing the t +1 th roundtThe method is a global model of the t epoch, the contribution is calculated by the weight of the user during model aggregation, the calculation cost is greatly reduced, the exponential cost is reduced to the linear cost, the model convergence can be accelerated, and the performance is improved; 2) the training log used is information inherent to federal learning, with no additional privacy protection costs.

title: Data processing method, device and system and server
abstract: The specification provides a data processing method, a data processing device, a data processing system and a server. Based on the method, after a first terminal device initiates a model training request, a first terminal device firstly obtains and accurately screens a second terminal device with a second data source with higher data value and better effect according to a test result of a marginal prediction effect promotion parameter of the data source owned by the terminal device to be determined in the system, wherein the test result is used for training a target model; before the joint training, the first terminal device and the second terminal device may respectively upload the data certificates of the owned data sources to the block chain for storing the certificates; in the process that the first terminal device performs joint training locally based on the first data source according to the matched joint training rule and the second terminal device performs joint training locally based on the second data source, the associated data in the joint training process are uploaded to the block chain for evidence storage, so that joint training can be performed safely, and a target model with a good effect and high accuracy is obtained.

title: Secure service isolation between instances of cloud products using a SaaS model
abstract: The disclosed technology teaches initializing an application instance using a SaaS model in a project implemented on a cloud-based computing service, including running a configuration engine that links a service provider for SaaS application to set configuration parameters for the project and initializing the project in which an application instance will be built, then removing the authorization of the configuration engine to access the project and removing access to set the parameters. The technology also includes running a SaaS application infrastructure builder autonomously, without the service provider having access to the builder, to build the instance, and then delivering the application as a SaaS service.

title: Responsive privacy-preserving system for detecting email threats
abstract: Embodiments of the present disclosure provide centralized and coordinate learning techniques for identifying malicious e-mails while maintaining privacy of the analyzed e-mails of different organizations. One or more models may be generated and configured to construct feature sets that may be used to characterize e-mails as malicious or safe. Feedback associated with one or more models trained by a first organization (and other organizations) may be shared with a modelling device to modify parameters of the one or more models, where the modified parameters are configured to improve identification of malicious e-mail threats. The feedback provided by the first organization may not include e-mails received by the first organization, thereby enabling the privacy of the e-mails received by the first organization to be maintained in an confidential manner even though the updated parameters may be shared with a second organization.

title: Training method for detection model, system, device, and storage medium
abstract: This application provides a training method for a detection model, a system, a device, and a storage medium, belongs to the field of network security technologies, and further relates to application of an AI technology in the field of network security technologies. Some embodiments of this application provide a method for training a detection model by using federated learning. In the method, a gateway device serves as a participant of federated learning, and a server aggregates model parameters and delivers shared malicious samples for the gateway device. When the gateway device performs model training, the gateway device exchanges information such as the model parameters and the shared samples with the server, to obtain a detection model through training.

title: Intelligent decision-making implementation method of automatic driving group vehicle based on federal deep reinforcement learning
abstract: The invention discloses an intelligent decision-making implementation method of an automatic driving group vehicle based on federal deep reinforcement learning, which comprises the following steps: the method comprises the steps of observing the driving environment of an automatic driving group vehicle and the driving environment of surrounding vehicles by deep reinforcement learning, training data in the processors of the respective vehicles, encrypting a trained data model, sending the encrypted data model to an edge computing server, comprehensively training an edge neural network by the edge computing server, simultaneously sending the trained model to a cloud computing server, carrying out training data by the cloud computing server through the comprehensive models, sending trained model information to the edge computing server and the vehicle terminals, updating model information of the vehicle terminals, and realizing an intelligent decision function of the automatic driving vehicle by adopting a federal deep learning method. The invention is beneficial to reducing the influence of big data communication conditions, solving the problem of unbalance of training data, being beneficial to realizing more intelligent calculation load and resource allocation and also realizing strong environmental cognition capability of automatic driving automobile group decision.

title: Wireless augmented video system and method to detect and prevent insurance billing fraud and physical assault for remote mobile application
abstract: The present invention discloses a wireless augmented video system and method to monitor medical insurance billing fraud, drug or other theft and elder patient or child abuse by the caregivers. The wireless augmented system comprises; a wireless augmented monitoring devices, a cloud system monitoring center and a caregiver employing agency. The wireless wearable augmented monitoring devices further includes a smart wearable nametag apparatus and smart wearable wristband. A wireless cellular transceiver configured within the nametag apparatus to stream the augmented video stream in response to an event detected. The nametag apparatus also incorporates a memory element to buffer the augmented data prior to transmission, a SIM card to connect to any data cellular network, a Bluetooth to connect peripheral devices, a Wi-Fi component, color LCD screen for displaying current caregiver's name and photograph on the name tag, and LED power status display, a microphone, speaker and a micro USB port.

title: A school-enterprise collaborative vocational skills talent training method based on AR technology
abstract: The application discloses an AR technology-based method for cultivating talents of cooperative professional skills of a school enterprise, which comprises the following steps of S1, establishing a skill pattern model of the skill requirements of the post of the enterprise through an investigation and analysis tool, S2, establishing a training course system based on the skill pattern, S3, establishing an enterprise digital twin scene in an AR practical training environment, supporting multi-mode interaction, carrying out practical training operation training of virtual-real combination, S4, collecting practical training data in real time, monitoring the learning progress through a school platform and dynamically adjusting a cultivation scheme, S5, establishing a talent assessment report according to the practical training data to achieve accurate matching of the student and the post, and S6, optimizing the training course system according to on-duty feedback of the student, and continuously updating the skill pattern model. According to the application, the school resources are integrated through the AR technology, a simulated training environment is constructed, so that students can simulate actual work in the virtual world, seamless butt joint of classroom knowledge and enterprise practice is realized, and employment adaptation period is greatly shortened.

title: Multi-party united information value calculation method, related equipment and storage medium
abstract: The application discloses a multi-party joint information value calculation method, related equipment and a storage medium, wherein the method comprises the following steps: the method comprises the steps that a first participant obtains tag ciphertext information of M samples, and the tag ciphertext information of any sample is determined by a second participant based on a homomorphic encryption algorithm and the tag information of any sample; determining sample distribution ciphertext information of each sub-box according to the label ciphertext information of the sample corresponding to each feature data in each sub-box; in a ciphertext space of a homomorphic encryption algorithm, secret sharing processing is carried out on sample distribution ciphertext information of each sub-box to obtain a target secret sharing result; enabling the second party to calculate the evidence weight of each box according to the decryption result corresponding to the target secret sharing result, and generating target ciphertext information according to the evidence weight of each box; and determining the information value of the target characteristic variable according to the target ciphertext information sent by the second participant, so that the leakage of related information can be effectively avoided, and the information security is improved.

title: Dynamic prevention and control system and method of genetic data privacy domain based on adaptive mechanism
abstract: The invention discloses a gene data privacy domain dynamic prevention and control system and a method based on a self-adaptive mechanism, wherein an identity verification module is used for a maximum frequent sequence analysis mining algorithm, and the identity of a data requester is judged by carrying out frequent item mining on an access log of the data requester so as to confirm the access characteristics of the data requester; the trust level classification module is used for classifying the trust level of the data requester by combining the identity verification result and the access log; and the permission dividing module is used for issuing different data access permissions for the data requesters through the trust levels of the data requesters. The system and the method for dynamically preventing and controlling the gene data privacy domain based on the self-adaptive mechanism provided by the invention are used for realizing the security and privacy of gene data calculation and ensuring that the data privacy is not revealed for malicious data requesters, unreliable third parties, link attacks, parameter reverse-push attacks and other attack behaviors in the gene data calculation process.

title: Controls module
abstract: Methods for minimizing bandwidth associated with transmission of unnecessary queries to third party vendors is provided. Methods may include transmitting initial queries to the third party vendors. Methods may include receiving a result set corresponding to the initial queries. Methods may further include mapping the initial queries, with the result set to a set of controls. Methods may include creating a personalized set of subsequent queries based on the mapping to the set of controls. Methods may include transmitting the subsequent queries to the third party vendor. Methods may include receiving a result set corresponding to the second set of queries.

title: Tenant self-service troubleshooting for multi-tenant identity and data security management cloud services
abstract: A system provides cloud-based identity and access management. The system provides a user interface ("UI") to tenants of an identity management service. The system enables a diagnostic function of a tenant based on user input received via the UI, wherein the diagnostic function allows a user in the tenant to configure and receive diagnostic reports related to the identity management service. The system then receives a request for the identity management service, accesses a microservice based on the request, executes the identity management service by the microservice, collects and records diagnostic information during execution of the identity management service, and displays the diagnostic information to the user via the UI.

title: Device fault diagnosis method and apparatus, and electronic device and storage medium
abstract: Provided in the present disclosure are a device fault diagnosis method and apparatus, and an electronic device and a storage medium. The method comprises: determining a plurality of participants on the basis of a joint learning architecture, and acquiring vibration signals generated by devices of the participants during an operational process; executing a preprocessing operation on the vibration signals, so as to obtain signal feature data, and executing a clustering operation on the devices, so as to obtain a plurality of similar device groups; integrating the signal feature data, which corresponds to the devices in the same similar device group of each participant, so as to obtain training data, and training a multi-fault diagnosis model by using the training data, so as to obtain a local model; and executing an aggregation operation on the local model on the basis of the local model that corresponds to each similar device group and a preset model aggregation method, so as to obtain a global model, updating the local model by using the global model, and performing fault diagnosis on the device on the basis of the updated local model. The present disclosure can improve the accuracy of a device fault diagnosis result and the efficiency of device fault diagnosis.

title: Systems and methods for augmenting content
abstract: Systems, methods, and non-transitory computer readable media can provide a plurality of colored inks for a marker to modify a content item displayed on a display screen of a computing system. A determination can be made that a user has selected a colored ink from the plurality of colored inks, wherein the plurality of colored inks includes a multi-colored ink. One or more lines can be drawn on the display screen based on a user input and the selected colored ink.

title: Graphical model full life cycle modeling method for federal learning
abstract: The invention provides a graphical model full life cycle modeling method for federal learning, which comprises the following steps: analyzing the data sample before modeling to determine a federal learning scheme; according to the joint analysis operation result, a modeling strategy is drawn up; adopting a dragging mode, and processing data by utilizing a federal characteristic engineering means; federal model training process: after the two parties respectively construct the models, the intermediate state model and the loss function obtained by the exchange calculation are obtained; predicting the federal model; and monitoring the running process of the federal model to obtain a model monitoring statistical index, and realizing maintenance iteration of the federal model. According to the method, personnel in each step of federal learning modeling can participate in the optimization points through graphical addition, personnel participation optimization difficulty is reduced, a path for application and maintenance of a later model is provided, and the application scene and usability of federal learning technology are improved.

title: Multi-domain DDoS attack detection method and device based on trusted federated learning
abstract: The invention provides a credible federal learning-based multi-domain DDoS attack detection method and a credible federal learning-based multi-domain DDoS attack detection device, which belong to the technical field of network security detection, register and initial credit setting of a federal learning participant by using a block chain, and wait for and process task application; respectively preprocessing the local federal learning data set after the application is passed, and training a machine learning or deep learning method by using the preprocessed local data set to obtain a local model; encrypting and uploading the local model parameters to an aggregation server to generate a global model, and performing iterative training to generate a final global model; and uploading relevant information of the tasks to the block chain for auditing, calculating a comprehensive credit value by using an intelligent contract and updating the credit of the participants. The invention calculates the comprehensive credit of the participants according to the interaction state, the data state and the resource state of the participants, and trains the DDoS detection model in a multi-domain manner under the credible condition, so that each domain learns the DDoS attack knowledge of all the domains, and the DDoS attack detection capability of each domain is improved.

title: Servers, methods and systems for second order federated learning
abstract: Servers, methods and systems for second order federated learning (FL) are described. Client nodes send local curvature information to the server along with local learned parameter information. The local curvature information enables the server to approximate or estimate the curvature, i.e. a second-order derivative, of an objective function of each respective local model. Instead of averaging the local learned parameter information obtained from the client nodes, the server uses the local curvature information to aggregate the local learned parameter information obtained from each client node to correct for the bias that would ordinarily result from a straightforward averaging of the learned values of the local learnable parameters. The described examples may provide reduced bias and/or reduced communication costs, relative to existing FL approaches such as federated averaging. The described examples may provide greater accuracy in model performance and/or faster convergence in FL.

title: Federated learning optimizations
abstract: The apparatus of an edge computing node, a system, a method and a machine-readable medium. The apparatus includes a processor to cause an initial set of weights for a global machine learning (ML) model to be transmitted a set of client compute nodes of the edge computing network; process Hessians computed by each of the client compute nodes based on a dataset stored on the client compute node; evaluate a gradient expression for the ML model based on a second dataset and an updated set of weights received from the client compute nodes; and generate a meta-updated set of weights for the global model based on the initial set of weights, the Hessians received, and the evaluated gradient expression.

title: Target detection method and apparatus based on federated learning, and device and storage medium
abstract: A target detection method based on federated learning, the method comprising: performing pruning processing on an initial target detection model by using a random weight so as to obtain a lightweight target detection model (S1); training the lightweight target detection model on the basis of a local data set so as to obtain a plurality of corresponding model gradient parameters, and sending the model gradient parameters to a server (S2); receiving a global gradient parameter obtained by fusing of the model gradient parameters by the server according to a federated averaging algorithm (S3); updating the initial target detection model by using the global gradient parameter (S4), and returning to the training step until a pre-set termination condition is met (S5), so as to obtain a target detection model; and performing, by using the target detection model, target detection on an image to be subjected to detection (S6). In addition, the present application further relates to blockchain technology, a local data set can be stored in a blockchain node, and by means of the method, the detection speed and detection accuracy of target detection can be improved.

title: Distributed privacy calculation method and device based on block chain
abstract: The invention provides a distributed privacy computing method and device based on a blockchain, wherein the device comprises a blockchain infrastructure layer, a distributed parallel computing layer and an interface display layer, and the method comprises the steps that a computing request client issues a computing task and decomposes the computing task; the task distribution module distributes tasks, and the computing node returns a task claim confirmation message; the computing request client writes a benefit distribution intelligent contract; the computing node downloads a training model for training, and returns a result to the computing request client; the security verification module verifies the result returned by the computing node and fuses the result to obtain a final federal model; the intelligent contract utilizes a benefit distribution function to distribute benefits to each computing node. Compared with the related art, the distributed privacy calculation method and device based on the blockchain provided by the invention have the advantages that the data privacy safety is good, the calculation cost is reduced, and the enthusiasm of node data sharing is improved.

title: A Federated Learning Model Compression Method Based on Model Sparsification and Weight Quantization
abstract: The invention discloses a federal learning model compression method based on model sparsification and weight quantification, which comprises the following steps: step 1, a client performs local model training by using a local data set; step 2, the client performs model sparsification on the weight matrix generated by the local model training; step 3, the client performs weight quantization on the matrix after the sparsification; step 4, the client transmits the compressed model to the server through a wireless channel; and 5, decompressing the received weight matrix by the server, and finishing federal learning aggregation. The method has the advantages that the problem of insufficient resources in the federal learning training process is effectively solved, and the federal learning training precision is improved through an optimization algorithm.

title: Sample prediction method and device based on federated training, and storage medium
abstract: A sample prediction method based on federated training, comprising the following steps: performing federated training on two aligned training samples by using an XGboost algorithm to construct a gradient boosting tree model (S10), wherein the gradient boosting tree model comprises a plurality of regression trees, and a split node of each regression tree corresponds to a feature of each training sample; and performing joint prediction on a sample to be predicted on the basis of the gradient boosting tree model, to determine a sample category of the sample to be predicted or obtain a prediction score of the sample to be predicted (S20). According to the method, federated training-based modeling is implemented by using training samples of different data parties, and thus sample prediction is implemented on the basis of the established model.

title: Adaptively adjusting influence in federated learning model updates
abstract: Techniques for improved federated learning are provided. One or more queries are issued to a plurality of participants in a federated learning system, and one or more replies are received from the plurality of participants. A first aggregated model is generated based on the one or more relies and a first influence vector. Upon determining that a predefined criterion is satisfied, a second influence vector modifying a weight of a first participant of the plurality of participants is generated. A second aggregated model is generated based on the one or more replies and the second influence vector.

title: Artificial intelligence modifying federated learning models
abstract: Data verification in federate learning is faster and simpler. As artificial intelligence grows in usage, data verification is needed to prove custody and/or control. Electronic data representing an original version of training data may be hashed to generate one or more digital signatures. The digital signatures may then be incorporated into one or more blockchains for historical documentation. Any auditor may then quickly verify and/or reproduce the training data using the digital signatures. For example, a current version of the training data may be hashed and compared to the digital signatures generated from the current version of the training data. If the digital signatures match, then the training data has not changed since its creation. However, if the digital signatures do not match, then the training data has changed since its creation. The auditor may thus flag the training data for additional investigation and scrutiny.

title: Multi-domain knowledge graph data agility management method based on multiple federations
abstract: The invention provides a multi-domain knowledge graph data agility management method based on multiple federations, which comprises the steps of setting a domain control node for a plurality of independent data sources in the domain, wherein each independent data source in the plurality of independent data sources can be accessed through the domain control node; setting inter-domain control nodes for the intra-domain control nodes, wherein the intra-domain control nodes can be accessed through the inter-domain control nodes; and setting a multi-domain control node to realize unified management of the inter-domain control node. By the processing scheme, unified management and sharing exchange capacity of the multi-domain knowledge graph data is improved.

title: Disease data processing method, device, equipment and medium based on federal learning
abstract: The invention discloses a disease data processing method, device, equipment and medium based on federal learning, wherein the method comprises the following steps: acquiring an electronic health record of a patient diagnosed in a local database and disease data; extracting the characteristics of the electronic health record to obtain the disease characteristic vector of each patient; constructing a local training sample set according to the disease feature vector and the disease data of each patient; and participating in federal learning of data ends of all hospitals based on the local training sample set to obtain a disease prediction model. According to the invention, the data of all hospital ends are combined for federal training, and a high-quality disease prediction model can be trained on the basis of not revealing the privacy of patients of the hospital ends, so that a positive auxiliary effect is exerted in the diagnosis process of doctors.

title: Characterizing user behavior in a computer system by automated learning of intention embedded in a system-generated event graph
abstract: An automated technique for security monitoring leverages a labeled semi-directed temporal graph derived from system-generated events. The temporal graph is mined to derive process-centric subgraphs, with each subgraph consisting of events related to a process. The subgraphs are then processed to identify atomic operations shared by the processes, wherein an atomic operation comprises a sequence of system-generated events that provide an objective context of interest. The temporal graph is then reconstructed by substituting the identified atomic operations derived from the subgraphs for the edges in the original temporal graph, thereby generating a reconstructed temporal graph. Using graph embedding, the reconstructed graph is converted into a representation suitable for further machine learning, e.g., using a deep neural network. The network is then trained to learn the intention underlying the temporal graph. The approach operates to understand running behavior of programs, to classify them, and then enable detection of potential malicious behaviors.

title: Establishing trust for conducting direct secure electronic transactions between a user and service providers
abstract: Ensuring security of electronic transactions between a user and a service provider involves establishing electronic trust among a user, device, transaction service provider, and service providers through OTAC processing, key generation and exchange, and verification.

title: Sensor management system in an iot network
abstract: A method for managing and reconfiguring multiple devices of a network includes registering a digital birth certificate based on a private key to a device of the plurality of devices. Authenticating and validating the device may be performed based on the private key. The device can be reconfigurable, and reconfiguration of the device includes one of a physical reconfiguration, a logical reconfiguration, or reconfiguration of a mode of operation of the device.

title: On-Device Machine Learning Platform
abstract: The present disclosure provides systems and methods for on-device machine learning. In particular, the present disclosure is directed to an on-device machine learning platform and associated techniques that enable on-device prediction, training, example collection, and/or other machine learning tasks or functionality. The on-device machine learning platform can include a context provider that securely injects context features into collected training examples and/or client-provided input data used to generate predictions/inferences. Thus, the on-device machine learning platform can enable centralized training example collection, model training, and usage of machine-learned models as a service to applications or other clients.

title: Federal learning execution method, system, client and electronic equipment
abstract: The embodiment of the specification provides a method, a system, a client and an electronic device for executing federated learning. Wherein: after the member object of the target federal learning task created by the server is added into the target federal learning task, the state of the member object is set to be a labeled state so as to label the sample data belonging to the private information and obtain the classification label of the sample data. And after the member object in the marked state is marked, setting the state of the member object to be a ready state so as to receive and respond to a training instruction which is sent by the server and used for starting the target federal learning task. And when monitoring that no less than a preset number of member objects in the ready state, the server sends a training instruction to the member objects in the ready state. After the member object in the ready state receives the training instruction, the state of the member object is set to be an execution state, so that the training operation of the target federal learning task is executed based on the sample data and the corresponding classification label according to the safe multiparty computing protocol.

title: On-device machine learning platform
abstract: The present disclosure provides systems and methods for on-device machine learning. In particular, the present disclosure is directed to an on-device machine learning platform and associated techniques that enable on-device prediction, training, example collection, and/or other machine learning tasks or functionality. The on-device machine learning platform can include a context provider that securely injects context features into collected training examples and/or client-provided input data used to generate predictions/inferences. Thus, the on-device machine learning platform can enable centralized training example collection, model training, and usage of machine-learned models as a service to applications or other clients.

title: Data processing method and system based on node group, and device and medium
abstract: The present application relates to a data processing method and system based on a node group, and a device and a medium. The method is executed by one of first nodes in a node group, and comprises: constructing a mapping relationship according to a local first user identifier, wherein the mapping relationship is used for mapping the first user identifier into a target value; performing homomorphic encryption on a mapping parameter of the mapping relationship to obtain mapping parameter ciphertext, and transmitting the mapping parameter ciphertext to a second node in the node group; receiving a reference value and fragment information, which are correspondingly fed back by the second node; when a homomorphic decryption result of the reference value is consistent with the target value, reserving the fragment information that is fed back correspondingly to the reference value, and triggering the collection of the fragment information reserved in each first node by means of one of the first nodes in the node group, so as to aggregate the collected fragment information to obtain a user identifier intersection between the nodes in the node group, and aggregate user data corresponding to the user identifier intersection.

title: Federated computing processing method and apparatus, electronic device, and storage medium
abstract: The present disclosure relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and in particular to the technical fields of big data, cloud computing, and deep learning. Provided are a federated computing processing method and apparatus, an electronic device, and a storage medium. The specific implementation solution is: obtaining metadata to be processed from each participant on the basis of a task identifier to be executed; splitting each piece of metadata to obtain n data slices corresponding to each participant; generating n data sets according to the n data slices corresponding to each participant; invoking n data processing services corresponding to the task identifier to process each data set by using each data processing service; and determining a federated computing result corresponding to the task identifier according to a processing result of each data processing service. Therefore, during federated computing, parallelization of federated learning is implemented in a data parallel manner, thereby greatly increasing the speed of federated computing and providing technical feasibility for the use of large-scale data privacy computing.

title: Enhanced on-the-go artificial intelligence for wireless devices
abstract: This disclosure describes systems, methods, and devices related to facilitating machine learning-based operations at a User Equipment (UE) connected to a radio access network (RAN). A network AI/ML (artificial intelligence/machine learning) service or function may identify a first request, received from a user equipment (UE) device, for a machine learning model configuration; determine a location of the UE device; select, based on the first request and the location, an available machine learning agent; format a second request to the available machine learning agent for the machine learning configuration; identify the machine learning configuration received from the available machine learning agent based on the second request; and format a response to the first request, the response comprising the machine learning configuration for the UE device.

title: Opt-in directory of verified individual profiles
abstract: The present invention provides a system and method for generating and accessing a verified individual profile on a computer network comprising a registration terminal for entering data into a plurality of profile fields in a profile for an individual, wherein the data in at least one profile field is verified by an agent using a verification method, and a profile database for storing the profile. The opt-in directory system also comprises a search utility for allowing a user to search the profile database for the profile via the network and a configuration utility for allowing the individual to edit and configure the profile via the network.

title: Bedside user device and id and user performance
abstract: A security platform architecture is described herein. A user identity platform architecture which uses a multitude of biometric analytics to create an identity token unique to an individual human. This token is derived on biometric factors like human behaviors, motion analytics, human physical characteristics like facial patterns, voice recognition prints, usage of device patterns, user location actions and other human behaviors which can derive a token or be used as a dynamic password identifying the unique individual with high calculated confidence. Because of the dynamic nature and the many different factors, this method is extremely difficult to spoof or hack by malicious actors or malware software.

title: Systems and methods for federated learning
abstract: In one embodiment, one or more computing systems may generate a knowledge graph representing relationships between a global model and a number of local models for updating the global model. Each local model may have access to a local dataset for machine-learning training. The systems may access, from the knowledge graph, a sharing policy associated with the local dataset of a first local model. The systems may determine, based on the knowledge graph and one or more pre-determined criteria, that the sharing policy permits the local dataset of the first local model to be shared with a second local model. The system may cause the second local model to be trained using at least the local dataset of the first local model and the local dataset of the second local model. The system may update the global model using the trained second local model.

title: Methods and systems for efficiently detecting and recording security anomalies
abstract: In certain examples, an anomaly detection stage involves building an anomalous embedding database. A log embedding is extracted from an input security log using trained machine learning (ML). An anomaly detection method is used to identify the log embedding as anomalous. The log embedding is not necessarily added to the log embedding database. Rather, it is compared with existing anomalous log embeddings already stored in the anomalous embedding database, and is only added to the database if it does not match any of the existing anomalous log embeddings. Once populated, the anomalous embedding database may be used to support threat detection and mitigation in a deployment stage.

title: Wireless location establishing device
abstract: A system, method, service and wireless location-establishing device are disclosed, which locates its position by a plurality of means, including GPS satellite interrogation and triangulation. Alternative methods of location establishment include triangulating location data from nearby location-established objects such as WiFi or cell site towers, as well as from other present Invention location establishing devices (“Survey Eggs”). Once location has been established, the device can transmit and receive a variety of data based upon location, profile, and other factors, facilitating novel interactions and transactions.

title: Device for collecting personal data from user
abstract: A device for collecting personal data from a user includes a processor, a sensing device, a document scanner, and a scene camera. The sensing device is configured to capture a biometric of user. The document scanner is configured to produce a visual representation of an identifying document that includes personally identifying information. The scene camera monitors and captures a video of an uninterrupted area surrounding the kiosk including the user, the sensing device, and the document scanner. The processor transmits the captured video to a remote station that can send a signal back to the device.

title: Virtual data lake system created with browser-based decentralized data access and analysis
abstract: A virtual data lake system created with browser-based decentralized data access and analysis is disclosed herein. As contemplated by the present disclosure, the system provides a single interface that allows a user to access and analyze multiple enterprise data storage locations remotely and simultaneously while presenting and reporting information from the multiple sources in a single, uniform display. Such a solution allows a user to analyze and cross-reference data stored in multiple locations in real time without requiring the actual data files to be displaced or combined. The system further implements interactive artificial intelligence, natural language processing, and workflow-based operations for improved user access and functionality.

title: Selective gradient updating-based federated modeling method and related device
abstract: A selective gradient updating-based federated modeling method and a related device, which relate to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and which can be applied in a smart hospital system. The method comprises: client ends read, from a server end, a global model gradient of a machine learning model (S101); client ends initialize the global model gradient (S102); client ends locally execute model training in parallel according to sample data of each of the client ends, and obtain local model gradients corresponding to each of the client ends, the sample data being medical data (S103); client ends encrypt and upload components of the local model gradients of each of the client ends, or clip the local model gradients of each of the client ends to within a preset range and then performing encryption and uploading, enabling the server end to perform aggregation on the components of the local model gradients uploaded by the client ends or the local model gradients after clipping, and to update the machine learning model according to an aggregated average gradient (S104). The present method implements privacy protection for medical data.

title: Personalized recommendation method, device, equipment and medium based on federal learning
abstract: The application discloses a personalized recommendation method, a device, equipment and a medium based on federal learning, wherein the personalized recommendation method based on federal learning comprises the following steps: receiving uploading data, extracting a target recall set corresponding to the uploading data from a preset recall set storage database, obtaining data to be predicted which are commonly corresponding to the uploading data and the target recall set, inputting the data to be predicted into a personalized recommendation model obtained based on federal learning, obtaining a model output result, and screening the model output result to obtain the personalized recommendation result. The application solves the technical problem of poor personalized recommendation effect in the prior art.

title: Health management
abstract: A method includes capturing continuously vital signs and motion data from one or more sensors adapted to be coupled to a user; capturing food consumption of the user; predicting a predetermined health condition of the user based on the vital signs; generating a plan for the predetermined health condition; and prompting the user to execute the plan with a closed-loop feedback based on sensor data.

title: Method and device for risk identification by combining multiple parties
abstract: An embodiment of the present specification provides a method and an apparatus for risk identification by multi-party federation, the method including: the method comprises the steps that a first station obtains a first sub-model of a safety tree model which is jointly trained with a second station; the security tree model also has a second sub-model deployed at a second site; acquiring a third sub-model obtained according to a tree structure corresponding to a preset risk identification strategy; the tree structure also has a fourth submodel deployed at the second site; when the preset risk identification condition is determined to be met, acquiring first feature data of each feature in a first feature set of a target user; inputting the first characteristic data into a first submodel and a third submodel to respectively obtain a first prediction score and a third prediction score; and providing the first prediction score and the third prediction score by a multi-party safety calculation mode, and combining the first prediction score and the fourth prediction score provided by the second site to comprehensively determine whether the target user has the first risk. The leakage of the privacy information of the user can be prevented.

title: Systems and methods for facial representation
abstract: Systems, methods, and non-transitory computer readable media can align face images, classify face images, and verify face images by employing a deep neural network (DNN). A 3D-aligned face image can be generated from a 2D face image. An identity of the 2D face image can be classified based on provision of the 3D-aligned face image to the DNN. The identity of the 2D face image can comprise a feature vector.

title: Federal learning method, system and device based on hierarchical fragment block chain
abstract: The invention relates to the technical field of block chains and federal learning, in particular to a method, a system and a device for federal learning based on a layered partitioned block chain, wherein the method comprises the steps of constructing a main chain and triggering a plurality of sub-chains by using an intelligent contract; each sub-chain acquires task information and a basic model from a main chain and packages the task information and the basic model into a sub-chain transaction to be submitted to the sub-chain; the intelligent terminal selected by each sub-chain master node pulls task information and a basic model from the corresponding sub-chain to perform multi-round training; the sub-chain main node aggregates sub-chain transactions uploaded by each intelligent terminal to obtain a current round of fragment models, packages the sub-chain transactions into sub-chain transactions and submits the sub-chain transactions to a sub-chain; each sub-chain main node packs the last round of fragment models in each fragment iteration into a main chain transaction and submits the main chain transaction to the main chain, and part of the main chain transaction in the main chain is approved; the layered partitioned block chain structure provided by the invention reduces the transaction processing burden caused by the whole federal learning task borne by a single block chain network, and fully exerts the multidimensional gain caused by the fusion of the block chain technology and the federal learning.

title: Federal learning method and system based on edge digital twin association
abstract: The invention provides a federal learning method and a system based on edge digital twin association for solving the problem of resource allocation between user requirements and an edge server, wherein the federal learning method and the system comprise the following steps: users participating in federal learning respectively generate digital twins; pairing the digital twins with the edge server using a many-to-one matching algorithm; the method comprises the following steps that a server constructs a task and issues the task to an edge server, a digital twin body conducts federal learning by using resources of the edge server matched with the digital twin body, and a model obtained by local iterative training of the digital twin body is transmitted to the edge server; the edge server aggregates the models obtained by training the paired digital twins to obtain local models and uploads the local models to the server; the server aggregates the received local models to obtain a global model, checks whether the precision of the global model reaches a preset threshold value, and if not, sends the current global model to an edge server for training; and if so, finishing the current federal learning.

title: Data anti-leakage method, device and equipment based on federal modeling and computer readable storage medium
abstract: The invention discloses a federal modeling method, which comprises the following steps: the first participant inputs the data to be trained into a public model in the model to be trained to perform model training so as to obtain first public model parameters, and inputs the data to be trained into a private model in the model to be trained to perform model training so as to obtain private model parameters; transmitting the first public model parameters to a coordinator so that the coordinator can determine and feed back global model parameters based on the first public model parameters; and determining a target model based on the private model parameters, the global model parameters and the model to be trained. The invention also discloses a federal modeling device, equipment and a computer readable storage medium. According to the invention, modeling is carried out according to the public model and the private model in the model to be trained, and model parameters such as gradient and the like in transmission are not required to be modified, so that the balance between privacy protection and model convergence or model precision of the model parameters such as gradient and the like is realized; the safety of data in federal study is improved.

title: Method and device for building data bank security system based on functional partition
abstract: The application provides a data bank security system construction method and device based on functional partitions, electronic equipment and a computer readable storage medium.
